ciri.flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
ciri.info:
Deploy: Damage 3 enemy units by 1.
Whenever you lose a Round, return this unit to your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
ciri.name: Ciri

geralt: igni.flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
geralt: igni.info:
Deploy: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 35 or more power.
Initiative: Destroy the highest power units on an enemy row with a total of 20 or more power instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
geralt: igni.name: Geralt: Igni

geralt of rivia.flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
geralt of rivia.info: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
geralt of rivia.name: Geralt of Rivia

regis.flavor: Some consider me a monster. A blood-crazed, savage monster.
regis.info:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
Initiative: If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
regis.name: Regis

regis: higher vampire.flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.
regis: higher vampire.info: Order (Melee): Drain an enemy by the amount of boost it has.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Drain: Damage ignoring the target's armor, then boost self by the damage dealt.
regis: higher vampire.name: Regis: Higher Vampire

triss merigold.flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.
triss merigold.info: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy unit by its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
triss merigold.name: Triss Merigold

villentretenmerth.flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
villentretenmerth.info: After 2 allied turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
villentretenmerth.name: Villentretenmerth

yennefer of vengerberg.flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
yennefer of vengerberg.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
yennefer of vengerberg.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg

zoltan: scoundrel.flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
zoltan: scoundrel.info:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
zoltan: scoundrel.name: Zoltan: Scoundrel

ciri: dash.flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
ciri: dash.info: After 4 allied turns, on turn end, draw a card.
ciri: dash.name: Ciri: Dash

geralt: aard.flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
geralt: aard.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage 3 enemy units by 2, then move them to the Ranged row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
geralt: aard.name: Geralt: Aard

avallac'h: sage.flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.
avallac'h: sage.info: Deploy (Ranged): Play an artifact from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
avallac'h: sage.name: Avallac'h: Sage

yennefer: conjurer.flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.
yennefer: conjurer.info:
Zeal.
Order: Deal 1 damage to the highest enemy unit(s). Cooldown 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
yennefer: conjurer.name: Yennefer: Conjurer

dudu.flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.
dudu.info: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dudu.name: Dudu

eskel.flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…
eskel.info: Deploy (Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}): Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
eskel.name: Eskel

vesemir.flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.
vesemir.info: Deploy (Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}): Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
vesemir.name: Vesemir

lambert.flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.
lambert.info: Deploy (Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}): Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
lambert.name: Lambert

myrgtabrakke.flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
myrgtabrakke.name: Myrgtabrakke

ocvist.flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.
ocvist.info: Order: Damage all enemy units by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
ocvist.name: Ocvist

olgierd von everec.flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
olgierd von everec.name: Olgierd von Everec

operator.flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.
operator.info: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
operator.name: Operator

keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
prize-winning cow.name: Prize-Winning Cow

roach.flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.
roach.info: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
roach.name: Roach

johnny.flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.
johnny.info: Whenever you play a special card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
johnny.name: Johnny

sarah.info: Whenever you play a special card, boost a random allied unit by 2.
sarah.name: Sarah

francis bedlam.flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.
francis bedlam.info: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
francis bedlam.name: Francis Bedlam

cyprian wiley.flavor: Ever since his father died, he's become a real whoreson.
cyprian wiley.info: Deploy: Banish a unit with power 3 or less.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
cyprian wiley.name: Cyprian Wiley

iris von everec.flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.
iris von everec.info: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality (4).
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
iris von everec.name: Iris von Everec

unicorn.flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.
unicorn.info: Deploy: Boost a unit by 3. If you control Chironex, double that amount.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
unicorn.name: Unicorn

chironex.flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.
chironex.info: Deploy: Damage a unit by 3. If you control Unicorn, double that amount.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
chironex.name: Chironex

duda: companion.flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.
duda: companion.info:
Doomed.
Boost all units on a row by 1.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
duda: companion.name: Duda: Companion

duda: agitator.flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.
duda: agitator.info:
Doomed.
Damage all units on a row by 1.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
duda: agitator.name: Duda: Agitator

fiend.flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.
fiend.info: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
fiend.name: Fiend

ragh nar roog.flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.
ragh nar roog.info: Spawn Cataclysm on an enemy row for 4 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
ragh nar roog.name: Ragh Nar Roog

the last wish.flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.
the last wish.info: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
the last wish.name: The Last Wish

decoy.flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.
decoy.info: Shuffle an allied unit on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
decoy.name: Decoy

merigold's hailstorm.flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.
merigold's hailstorm.name: Merigold's Hailstorm

skellige storm.flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.
skellige storm.info: Spawn Storm on an enemy row for 2 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
skellige storm.name: Skellige Storm

stammelford's tremors.flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.
stammelford's tremors.name: Stammelford's Tremors

dimeritium bomb.flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.
dimeritium bomb.info: Damage a unit by 4 and give it Veil.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
dimeritium bomb.name: Dimeritium Bomb

blizzard.flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.
blizzard.info:
Destroy the lowest power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all units with the lowest power.
keywords: Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
blizzard.name: Blizzard

commander's horn.flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.
commander's horn.name: Commander's Horn

vaedermakar.flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.
vaedermakar.info:
Deploy (Melee): Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
If you control Scepter of Storms, increase or decrease durations by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
vaedermakar.name: Vaedermakar

alzur's double-cross.flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.
alzur's double-cross.info: Play the highest unit from your deck.
alzur's double-cross.name: Alzur's Double-Cross

alzur's thunder.flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.
alzur's thunder.name: Alzur's Thunder

biting frost.flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.
biting frost.info: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
biting frost.name: Biting Frost

clear skies.flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…
clear skies.info: Boost all units in an ally row by 1.
clear skies.name: Clear Skies

impenetrable fog.flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.
impenetrable fog.info: Spawn Fog on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
impenetrable fog.name: Impenetrable Fog

manticore venom.flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.
manticore venom.name: Manticore Venom

adrenaline rush.flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…
adrenaline rush.info: Boost an allied unit by 8 if there are no other units on that row.
adrenaline rush.name: Adrenaline Rush

epidemic.flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.
epidemic.name: Epidemic

scorch.flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.
scorch.info:
Destroy the highest-power unit.
Initiative: Destroy all highest-power units instead.
keywords: Initiative: Trigger this ability if using this card is the first action of your turn.
scorch.name: Scorch

swallow.flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.
swallow.name: Swallow

thunderbolt.flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.
thunderbolt.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3. 
Charge: 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt

torrential rain.flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.
torrential rain.info: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
torrential rain.name: Torrential Rain

an craite warcrier.flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.
an craite warcrier.info: Bloodthirst 1: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keywords: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
an craite warcrier.name: An Craite Warcrier

bekker's dark mirror.flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
bekker's dark mirror.info: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
bekker's dark mirror.name: Bekker's Dark Mirror

renew.info: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
renew.name: Renew

dimeritium shackles.flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.
dimeritium shackles.info: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
keywords: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
dimeritium shackles.name: Dimeritium Shackles

mardroeme.flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…
mardroeme.info: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
mardroeme.name: Mardroeme

bloody baron.flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.
bloody baron.info:
Formation.
Order: Reset the power of a unit.
Inspired: If it was boosted, give it Bleeding for the duration equal to the amount of boost it lost.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
bloody baron.name: Bloody Baron

vernon roche.flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
vernon roche.info:
Disloyal. 
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vernon roche.name: Vernon Roche

john natalis.flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.
john natalis.info: Deploy (Melee): Play a Warfare card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
john natalis.name: John Natalis

lined pockets.flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?
lined pockets.info:
Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charge: 6
Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
lined pockets.name: Lined Pockets

shani.flavor: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.
shani.info:
Zeal.
Order: Summon a bronze Human unit from your graveyard to this row and give it Doomed.
Cooldown: 7.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
shani.name: Shani

triss: butterflies.flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!
triss: butterflies.info: Deploy: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
triss: butterflies.name: Triss: Butterflies

keira metz.flavor: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.
keira metz.info:
Zeal.
Order: Give Vitality to adjacent units for the duration equal to their base power.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
keira metz.name: Keira Metz

dandelion.flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.
dandelion.info:
Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 2.
Cooldown: 2.
Inspired: At the end of your turn, boost the top unit in your deck by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
dandelion.name: Dandelion

priscilla.flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.
priscilla.info:
Zeal.
Order: Heal an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown.
Inspired: Boost an allied unit by 4 and reset its Cooldown instead.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
priscilla.name: Priscilla

thaler.flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…
thaler.info:
Formation.
Order: If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, both players draw a card.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
thaler.name: Thaler

ves.flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.
ves.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
Cooldown: 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
ves.name: Ves

s\u00edle de tansarville.flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.
s\u00edle de tansarville.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
s\u00edle de tansarville.name: Síle de Tansarville

sabrina glevissig.flavor: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.
sabrina glevissig.info:
Disloyal.
Deathwish: Damage all units on this row by 3.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
sabrina glevissig.name: Sabrina Glevissig

dethmold.flavor: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails… Ah, good times…
dethmold.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost all allied Mages by 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
dethmold.name: Dethmold

prince stennis.flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.
prince stennis.info:
Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost 4 allied units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
prince stennis.name: Prince Stennis

trollololo.flavor: Join me King Ravodid army. Order got – guard boatses.
trollololo.info:
Zeal.
Order: Lose all Armor and boost self by that amount.
Resupply: Gain 2 Armor.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
trollololo.name: Trollololo

princess pavetta.flavor: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…
princess pavetta.info: Deploy: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
princess pavetta.name: Princess Pavetta

margarita laux-antille.flavor: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.
margarita laux-antille.info:
Zeal.
Order: Lock an enemy unit.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
margarita laux-antille.name: Margarita Laux-Antille

nenneke.flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.
nenneke.info:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 4.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
nenneke.name: Nenneke

odrin.flavor: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.
odrin.info:
Resupply: Boost self by 1.
Inspired: Boost self by 2 instead.
keywords: Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
odrin.name: Odrin

kaedweni sergeant.flavor: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!
kaedweni sergeant.info:
Formation. 
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charges: 2
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
kaedweni sergeant.name: Kaedweni Sergeant

carlo varese.flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.
carlo varese.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each card in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
carlo varese.name: Carlo Varese

ballista.flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.
ballista.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. 
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
ballista.name: Ballista

reinforced ballista.flavor: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.
reinforced ballista.info:
Formation. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
Resupply: Reduce the Cooldown by 1.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
reinforced ballista.name: Reinforced Ballista

bombardment.flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!
bombardment.info: Split 4 damage randomly between all enemy units. Increase the damage by 1 for each Siege Engine you control.
bombardment.name: Bombardment

siege tower.flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.
siege tower.info:
Deploy: Gain Vitality for 4 turns.
Crew: Boost self by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
siege tower.name: Siege Tower

redanian knight.info:
Barricade (Ranged): At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
Exposed: Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest power enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
redanian knight.name: Redanian Knight

siege support.flavor: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.\nDo what by the what now?
siege support.info:
Deploy (Melee): Reduce Cooldown of an allied unit by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 1.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
siege support.name: Siege Support

blue stripes scout.flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.
blue stripes scout.info: Deploy (Melee): Spawn a copy of a bronze allied unit at the bottom of your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
blue stripes scout.name: Blue Stripes Scout

blue stripes commando.flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.
blue stripes commando.info: Order: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
blue stripes commando.name: Blue Stripes Commando

field medic.flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
field medic.name: Field Medic

dun banner.flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.
dun banner.info: Whenever Dun Banner receives a boost, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
dun banner.name: Dun Banner

kaedweni cavalry.flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?
kaedweni cavalry.info:
Shield.
Whenever this unit loses its Shield, boost self by 2.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
kaedweni cavalry.name: Kaedweni Cavalry

reinforced trebuchet.flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.
reinforced trebuchet.info:
Ranged: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on Ranged row by 1.
Crew: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
keywords: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
reinforced trebuchet.name: Reinforced Trebuchet

temerian infantry.flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!
temerian infantry.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each boosted unit in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
temerian infantry.name: Temerian Infantry

redanian elite.flavor: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!
redanian elite.info:
Deploy: Boost self by 6.
Exposed: Reset own power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
redanian elite.name: Redanian Elite

siege master.info:
Order: Boost an ally by 2.
Resupply: Boost adjacent Siege Engines by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
siege master.name: Siege Master

botchling.flavor: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper – else they'll come back to haunt you.
botchling.info:
Every allied turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy unit by 1. 
Order: Transform into Lubberkin.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
botchling.name: Botchling

lubberkin.flavor: I name thee Dea and embrace thee as my daughter.
lubberkin.info:
Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the lowest allied unit by 1. 
Order: Transform into Botchling.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
lubberkin.name: Lubberkin

vicovaro novice.flavor: Mages in Nilfgaard are disposable. If one disappoints the Emperor, a dozen others await to provide what he requires.
vicovaro novice.info: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
vicovaro novice.name: Vicovaro Novice

reinforcements.flavor: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforcements!
reinforcements.info: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze allied unit.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
reinforcements.name: Reinforcements

carapace.flavor: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
carapace.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3. If it's a Monster unit, also give it Veil. Charges: 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
carapace.name: Carapace

ge'els.flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
ge'els.info: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Wild Hunt special card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
ge'els.name: Ge'els

draug.flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.
draug.info:
Zeal.
Order: Transform all Human units on an allied row into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
draug.name: Draug

imlerith's wrath.flavor: He boasted that no weapon would ever pierce his armor. And he was right — even in death.
imlerith's wrath.info:
Damage an enemy unit by the power of your highest unit.
If you control Imlerith, destroy an enemy unit instead.
imlerith's wrath.name: Imlerith's Wrath

force of nature.flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
force of nature.info:
Order: Spawn and play Woodland Spirit.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
force of nature.name: Force of Nature

caranthir ar-feiniel.flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.
caranthir ar-feiniel.info: Deploy: Spawn a 1-power base copy of a Monster unit with a provision cost of 10 or less from your hand on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
caranthir ar-feiniel.name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel

avallac'h.info: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
avallac'h.name: Avallac'h

caretaker.flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.
caretaker.info:
Zeal. Order: Purify a unit.
Cooldown: 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
caretaker.name: Caretaker

kayran.flavor: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword… then sell it, and hire a witcher.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
kayran.name: Kayran

miruna.flavor: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy…
miruna.info: Deathwish: Seize a random enemy unit with 4 or less power.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
miruna.name: Miruna

arachas behemoth.flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.
arachas behemoth.info: Deploy: Spawn 2 Drones and boost all other Insectoids in this row by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
arachas behemoth.name: Arachas Behemoth

mourntart.flavor: Most grave hags feed on rotten remains dug out of graves. Yet some sneak into huts, steal children, kill the elderly and in general make very undesirable neighbors.
mourntart.info: Order (Melee): Banish all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
mourntart.name: Mourntart

abaya.flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!
abaya.info:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Trigger an allied unit's Deathwish ability.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
abaya.name: Abaya

frightener: dormant.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
frightener: dormant.info: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
frightener: dormant.name: Frightener: Dormant

morvudd.info: Deploy: Boost all allied Beast units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
morvudd.name: Morvudd

whispess.flavor: I'd be your best – and last.
whispess.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by {B.P.BB_CronesPlayed*Damage+Damage}. Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play a Crone.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
whispess.name: Whispess

brewess.flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.
brewess.info:
Zeal.
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Charge: {B.P.BB_CronesPlayed+MaxTargets}.
Increase the number of Charges by 1 whenever you play a Crone.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
brewess.name: Brewess

weavess.flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
weavess.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by {B.P.BB_CronesPlayed*Boost+Boost}. Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play a Crone.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
weavess.name: Weavess

imperial manticore.flavor: One of the world's oldest and deadliest monsters. I used to feel excitement at moments like this. Now the beast is only an obstacle in my way. Its meat and hot blood will help me survive this icy hell.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
imperial manticore.name: Imperial Manticore

colossal ifrit.flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.
colossal ifrit.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1.
Cooldown: 3.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
colossal ifrit.name: Colossal Ifrit

nekker warrior.flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
nekker warrior.name: Nekker Warrior

ice giant.flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.
ice giant.name: Ice Giant

primordial d'ao.flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
primordial d'ao.name: Primordial D'ao

nithral.flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.
nithral.info:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Dominance: Damage a unit by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
nithral.name: Nithral

gaunter o'dimm.flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
gaunter o'dimm.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed.
Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
gaunter o'dimm.name: Gaunter O'Dimm

toad prince.flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.
toad prince.info: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit with 4 or less power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
toad prince.name: Toad Prince

celaeno harpy.flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.
celaeno harpy.info:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
Bonded: Spawn a Harpy egg in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
celaeno harpy.name: Celaeno Harpy

keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
old speartip: asleep.name: Old Speartip: Asleep

katakan.flavor: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.
katakan.info:
Zeal. Order: Spawn an Ekimmara on this row.
Cooldown: 4
Reduce the Cooldown by 1 whenever Bleeding is applied to an enemy unit.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
katakan.name: Katakan

foglet.flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.
foglet.info: Deathwish: Spawn Fog on the opposite row for 3 turns.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fog: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the lowest power unit in this row by 2.
foglet.name: Foglet

ancient foglet.flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…
ancient foglet.info:
Veil.
Deploy: Boost self by the total duration of row effects on the opposite side.
Whenever you apply a row effect, boost self by its duration.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
ancient foglet.name: Ancient Foglet

wyvern.flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.
wyvern.info:
Thrive.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
wyvern.name: Wyvern

drone.flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying stay away.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
drone.name: Drone

nekker.flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
nekker.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
nekker.name: Nekker

ghoul.flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.
ghoul.info: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
ghoul.name: Ghoul

griffin.flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.
griffin.info: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no targets, destroy self.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
griffin.name: Griffin

vran warrior.flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.
vran warrior.info: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 1.
vran warrior.name: Vran Warrior

wild hunt warrior.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Dominance: Damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
wild hunt warrior.name: Wild Hunt Warrior

wild hunt rider.flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.
wild hunt rider.info: Deploy, Dominance: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
wild hunt rider.name: Wild Hunt Rider

predatory dive.flavor: Afraid for their lives, the residents of Hengfors cowered behind thick city walls. A lot of good that did them...
predatory dive.info: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
predatory dive.name: Predatory Dive

ekimmara.flavor: Me? 'Fraid o' some ploughin' eki-what's-it? Why, it's just an overgrown bat!
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
ekimmara.name: Ekimmara

drowner.flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.
drowner.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row and damage it by 2.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
drowner.name: Drowner

harpy.flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
harpy.name: Harpy

harpy egg.flavor: A harpy egg omelet - a delicious delicacy, good sir. Quite dear, too, for as you might surmise, the wretches don't part with their eggs willingly.
harpy egg.info: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy and Summon it to this row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
harpy egg.name: Harpy Egg

wild hunt hound.flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.
wild hunt hound.info: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keywords: Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
wild hunt hound.name: Wild Hunt Hound

wolf pack.flavor: Relax, I know how to tame wolves…– Dunbar the Hunter's last words.
wolf pack.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
wolf pack.name: Wolf Pack

enraged ifrit.flavor: A certain mage thought them cute. It was his fate that gave rise to the saying Don't play with fire…
enraged ifrit.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
enraged ifrit.name: Enraged Ifrit

frenzied d'ao.flavor: They're easily mistaken for rocks. Many a troll's been unpleasantly surprised by gastric grief on that very account.
frenzied d'ao.info: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
frenzied d'ao.name: Frenzied D'ao

maerolorn.flavor: No gate nor wall can stop them. Just one tiny crack — that's all they need...
maerolorn.info: Deploy: Trigger a bronze allied unit's Deathwish ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
maerolorn.name: Maerolorn

imperial golem.flavor: The most powerful of Nilfgaard's mages have mastered the art of creating golems. On a few occasions, they've even managed to make them fight for the imperial cause…
imperial golem.info: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
imperial golem.name: Imperial Golem

old speartip.flavor: Oh, you're in a heap of trouble now…
old speartip.name: Old Speartip

hideous feast.flavor: The fool paid heed to superstition, stuffed his ears with wax and didn't hear the warnings. He ran his ship straight into the rocks.
hideous feast.info: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and boost an allied unit by 3.
hideous feast.name: Hideous Feast

wyvern scale shield.flavor: Stronger than your average shield and far more stylish.
wyvern scale shield.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Charge: 4. 
Limit 1 Charge per turn.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
wyvern scale shield.name: Wyvern Scale Shield

arachas nest.flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!
arachas nest.info: Spawn 4 Drones in an allied row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
arachas nest.name: Arachas Nest

saesenthessis.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.
saesenthessis.info:
Immunity.
Order: Remove this unit's Immunity until the start of your next turn.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
saesenthessis.name: Saesenthessis

isengrim faoiltiarna.flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.
isengrim faoiltiarna.info:
Deploy: Boost all other allied Elf units by 1.
Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
isengrim faoiltiarna.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna

iorveth.flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.
iorveth.info: Deploy: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
iorveth.name: Iorveth

milva.flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.
milva.info:
Immunity.
Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
milva.name: Milva

zoltan chivay.flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.
zoltan chivay.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Boost adjacent Dwarves by 2.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
zoltan chivay.name: Zoltan Chivay

agla\u00efs.flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.
agla\u00efs.info: Deploy: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
agla\u00efs.name: Aglaïs

ithlinne aegli.flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.
ithlinne aegli.info: Deploy: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
ithlinne aegli.name: Ithlinne Aegli

schirr\u00fa.flavor: Time to look death in the face.
schirr\u00fa.info:
Zeal.
Order: Destroy self and all other units with the same power.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
schirr\u00fa.name: Schirrú

dennis cranmer.flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.
dennis cranmer.info:
Deploy (Melee): Boost adjacent units by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units on this row by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
dennis cranmer.name: Dennis Cranmer

ida emean aep sivney.flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.
ida emean aep sivney.info:
Deploy (Melee): Purify a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality for 3 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
ida emean aep sivney.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney

yaevinn.flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.
yaevinn.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of Elf units in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
yaevinn.name: Yaevinn

toruviel.flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.
toruviel.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage enemy units at both ends of a row by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage all units on an enemy row by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
toruviel.name: Toruviel

vrihedd dragoon.flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.
vrihedd dragoon.info:
Deploy (Melee): Move an enemy unit to their other row.
Deploy (Ranged): Move an allied unit to your other row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
vrihedd dragoon.name: Vrihedd Dragoon

ciaran aep easnillen.flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.
ciaran aep easnillen.info: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
ciaran aep easnillen.name: Ciaran aep Easnillen

barclay els.flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!
barclay els.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the number of Dwarf units in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
barclay els.name: Barclay Els

morenn.flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.
morenn.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Lock a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
morenn.name: Morenn

braenn.flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.
braenn.info:
Deploy: If you control 2 or more other Dryads, gain Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charge: 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
braenn.name: Braenn

malena.flavor: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.
malena.info:
Zeal.
Order: Move a unit to the other row.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
malena.name: Malena

aelirenn.flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.
aelirenn.info: At the end of your turn, if you control 5 or more Elves, Summon this unit from your deck to your Melee row.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
aelirenn.name: Aelirenn

sheldon skaggs.flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!
sheldon skaggs.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by the amount Sheldon is boosted.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
sheldon skaggs.name: Sheldon Skaggs

yarpen zigrin.flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.
yarpen zigrin.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, lose Armor and boost self by that much.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
yarpen zigrin.name: Yarpen Zigrin

ele'yas.flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.
ele'yas.info: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
ele'yas.name: Ele'yas

hawker healer.flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.
hawker healer.info:
Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
hawker healer.name: Hawker Healer

vrihedd brigade.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Whenever moved, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vrihedd brigade.name: Vrihedd Brigade

vrihedd officer.flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.
vrihedd officer.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 2.
Bonded: Use both abilities.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
vrihedd officer.name: Vrihedd Officer

dol blathanna bomber.flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.
dol blathanna bomber.info: Deploy: Damage 2 random enemy units by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dol blathanna bomber.name: Dol Blathanna Bomber

dwarven skirmisher.flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
dwarven skirmisher.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. If it survived, boost self by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
dwarven skirmisher.name: Dwarven Skirmisher

mahakam defender.flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!
mahakam defender.info: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
mahakam defender.name: Mahakam Defender

vrihedd sappers.flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.
vrihedd sappers.info:
Deploy: Purify an allied unit.
If you control an Elf, Purify any unit instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
vrihedd sappers.name: Vrihedd Sappers

waylay.flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.
waylay.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Spawn an Elven Deadeye in a random row.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
waylay.name: Waylay

vrihedd vanguard.flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.
vrihedd vanguard.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vrihedd vanguard.name: Vrihedd Vanguard

dol blathanna archer.flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.
dol blathanna archer.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 2 units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
dol blathanna archer.name: Dol Blathanna Archer

dwarven mercenary.flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.
dwarven mercenary.info: Deploy: Damage self by 1 for each non-Dwarf unit in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dwarven mercenary.name: Dwarven Mercenary

hawker support.flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.
hawker support.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
hawker support.name: Hawker Support

elven wardancer.flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!
elven wardancer.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If Elven Wardancer is already boosted, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
elven wardancer.name: Elven Wardancer

dol blathanna bowman.flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.
dol blathanna bowman.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dol blathanna bowman.name: Dol Blathanna Bowman

hawker smuggler.flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.
hawker smuggler.info: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
hawker smuggler.name: Hawker Smuggler

blue mountain elite.flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…
blue mountain elite.info: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 3 if it is the only unit on its row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
blue mountain elite.name: Blue Mountain Elite

mahakam guard.flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.
mahakam guard.info: Deploy: Boost self by the number of allied Dwarf units on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
mahakam guard.name: Mahakam Guard

scoia'tael neophyte.flavor: Many nonhumans, fed up with the racism and xenophobia they encounter in the cities, decide to join the Scoia'tael.
scoia'tael neophyte.info:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit on the other row.
Order: Transform an allied Elf into Elven Deadeye.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
scoia'tael neophyte.name: Scoia'tael Neophyte

serpent trap.flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.
serpent trap.info:
Ambush: After your opponent plays a special card, destroy the enemy unit with the highest power.
Spring: Destroy the enemy unit with the lowest power.
keywords: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
serpent trap.name: Serpent Trap

incinerating trap.flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.
incinerating trap.info:
Spring: Damage a unit by 3.
Ambush: Damage the next unit your opponent plays on their side by 5.
keywords: Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
incinerating trap.name: Incinerating Trap

hjalmar an craite.flavor: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!
hjalmar an craite.info: Deploy (Melee): Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy unit by its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
hjalmar an craite.name: Hjalmar an Craite

ermion.flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.
ermion.info: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
ermion.name: Ermion

kambi.flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.
kambi.info: Deploy: Discard the rightmost card in your hand, then your opponent Discards the rightmost card in their hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
kambi.name: Kambi

birna bran.flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.
birna bran.info: Deploy: Draw up to 2 cards, then Discard the same number of cards.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
birna bran.name: Birna Bran

madman lugos.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by twice the number of damaged enemies.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
madman lugos.name: Madman Lugos

coral.flavor: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Ásgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.
coral.info:
Zeal.
Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card.
Whenever you Discard a card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
coral.name: Coral

wild boar of the sea.flavor: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers…
wild boar of the sea.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage all damaged enemy units by 1, then damage all enemy units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
wild boar of the sea.name: Wild Boar of the Sea

blueboy lugos.flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.
blueboy lugos.info: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
blueboy lugos.name: Blueboy Lugos

champion's charge.flavor: At close range, trolls never use weapons. And why would they?
champion's charge.info:
Damage a unit by 5. 
Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.
keywords: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
champion's charge.name: Champion's Charge

djenge frett.flavor: When a warrant says dead or alive, most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.
djenge frett.info: Deploy, Bloodthirst 1: Lock an enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
djenge frett.name: Djenge Frett

donar an hindar.flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.
donar an hindar.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
donar an hindar.name: Donar an Hindar

draig bon-dhu.flavor: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.
draig bon-dhu.info: Deploy: Boost all allied Warrior units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
draig bon-dhu.name: Draig Bon-Dhu

gremist.flavor: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.
gremist.info:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Purify a unit.
Refresh this ability whenever you play an Alchemy card.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
gremist.name: Gremist

holger blackhand.flavor: Now let's drink to the Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!
holger blackhand.info:
Deploy: Damage a unit by 2.
Whenever you play a ship, boost it by 1.
Whenever you play a pirate, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
holger blackhand.name: Holger Blackhand

jutta an dimun.flavor: Some call her the Iron Maiden.
jutta an dimun.info: Deploy: If Jutta an Dimun is the highest unit, damage self by 6.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
jutta an dimun.name: Jutta an Dimun

morkvarg.flavor: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.
morkvarg.info: When this unit enters your graveyard during the round, Summon it to your Melee row and give it Doomed.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
morkvarg.name: Morkvarg

savage bear.flavor: Tame? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…
savage bear.info:
Zeal.
Deploy: Gain 1 Charge for each Savage Bear in your graveyard.
Order: Give Bleeding 2 to an enemy unit.
Charge: 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
savage bear.name: Savage Bear

sigrdrifa's rite.flavor: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.
sigrdrifa's rite.info: Summon a Skellige unit from your graveyard to an allied row and give it Doomed.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
sigrdrifa's rite.name: Sigrdrifa's Rite

svanrige tuirseach.flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
svanrige tuirseach.name: Svanrige Tuirseach
