udalryk an brokvar.flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.
udalryk an brokvar.info:
Deploy, Bloodthirst 2: Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 3
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
udalryk an brokvar.name: Udalryk an Brokvar

svalblod ravager.flavor: A two-handed axe? Seems no one told him that.
svalblod ravager.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Give it Bleeding for 2 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
svalblod ravager.name: Svalblod Ravager

svalblod butcher.flavor: Mercenaries fight for coin. Knights duel for honor. He kills for blood.
svalblod butcher.info: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2, then give an enemy unit Bleeding for 3 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
svalblod butcher.name: Svalblod Butcher

an craite warrior.flavor: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!
an craite warrior.info: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). If played from the graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
an craite warrior.name: An Craite Warrior

brokvar hunter.flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Spikeroog…
brokvar hunter.info:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Beast, reduce Cooldown by 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
brokvar hunter.name: Brokvar Hunter

dimun pirate.flavor: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!
dimun pirate.info:
Deploy: Move the top card from your deck to your graveyard.
Cancel the ability if you control a Ship.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dimun pirate.name: Dimun Pirate

dimun pirate captain.flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!
dimun pirate captain.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
dimun pirate captain.name: Dimun Pirate Captain

drummond queensguard.flavor: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.
drummond queensguard.info: Order, Berserk 3: Spawn a base copy of self and Summon it in the same row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
drummond queensguard.name: Drummond Queensguard

heymaey skald.flavor: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.
heymaey skald.info: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then Discard a card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
heymaey skald.name: Heymaey Skald

dimun light longship.flavor: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.
dimun light longship.info:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Damage self and an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
dimun light longship.name: Dimun Light Longship

freya's blessing.flavor: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.
freya's blessing.info: Play a bronze Skellige unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
freya's blessing.name: Freya's Blessing

an craite blacksmith.flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.
an craite blacksmith.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Warrior.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
an craite blacksmith.name: An Craite Blacksmith

tuirseach axeman.flavor: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.
tuirseach axeman.info: Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with half or less than half of its base power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
tuirseach axeman.name: Tuirseach Axeman

tuirseach skirmisher.flavor: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.
tuirseach skirmisher.info: When this unit is Discarded, Summon it from your graveyard to your Melee row.
keywords: Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
tuirseach skirmisher.name: Tuirseach Skirmisher

an craite longship.flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.
an craite longship.info: Melee: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, deal 1 damage to it.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
an craite longship.name: An Craite Longship

brokvar archer.flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.
brokvar archer.info: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by the amount of damaged units on their side.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
brokvar archer.name: Brokvar Archer

gutting slash.flavor: Man or tree, a Skelligan axe fells it all the same.
gutting slash.info:
Damage a unit by 4. 
Bloodthirst 2: Damage a unit by 6 instead.
keywords: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
gutting slash.name: Gutting Slash

an craite armorsmith.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 2. If it's damaged, boost it by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
an craite armorsmith.name: An Craite Armorsmith

drummond shieldmaiden.flavor: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a craggy shore.
drummond shieldmaiden.info: When this unit is damaged, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
drummond shieldmaiden.name: Drummond Shieldmaiden

hemdall.flavor: When the time of the White Frost comes, Hemdall will sound the call for battle.
hemdall.info: Deploy: Deal 1 damage to random enemy units in a row, multiplied by the number of units in that row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
hemdall.name: Hemdall

delirium.flavor: Ehh, too big for a humpback. That's a finback. A finback? With a snout that short? Those herbs've gone to your head!
delirium.info: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
delirium.name: Delirium

elder bear.flavor: We're going on a bear hunt! We're going to catch a–– THAT THING'S HUGE! RUN!
elder bear.name: Elder Bear

raging bear.info: Deploy: Damage an allied unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
raging bear.name: Raging Bear

restore.flavor: Those cursed sorceresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?
restore.info: Heal an allied unit, then boost it by the amount it was healed.
keywords: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
restore.name: Restore

lacerate.flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.
lacerate.info: Damage all units on a row by 2.
lacerate.name: Lacerate

letho of gulet.flavor: Witchers never die in their beds.
letho of gulet.info: Deploy: If Auckes is in your hand, Lock an enemy unit. If Serrit is in your hand, damage an enemy unit by 3. If both are in your hand, Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
letho of gulet.name: Letho of Gulet

menno coehoorn.flavor: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.
menno coehoorn.info: Deploy (Ranged): Play a Tactic card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
menno coehoorn.name: Menno Coehoorn

vattier de rideaux.flavor: There's never been a problem a well–planned assassination couldn't solve.
vattier de rideaux.info: Order (Melee): Seize a Locked enemy unit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
vattier de rideaux.name: Vattier de Rideaux

cahir dyffryn.flavor: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.
cahir dyffryn.info: Melee: Whenever an enemy receives a boost, boost self by the same amount.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
cahir dyffryn.name: Cahir Dyffryn

vilgefortz.flavor: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.
vilgefortz.info:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an allied unit, then Summon the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
vilgefortz.name: Vilgefortz

stefan skellen.flavor: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.
stefan skellen.info: Order (Ranged): Spawn and play a copy of the last Tactic card you played this round and give it Doomed.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
stefan skellen.name: Stefan Skellen

tibor eggebracht.flavor: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.
tibor eggebracht.info: Deploy: Your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
tibor eggebracht.name: Tibor Eggebracht

xarthisius.flavor: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy…
xarthisius.info: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
xarthisius.name: Xarthisius

albrich.flavor: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.
albrich.info: Deploy (Ranged): Move any card from your deck to the top. If it's a unit, boost it by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
albrich.name: Albrich

assire var anahid.flavor: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.
assire var anahid.info:
Deploy (Melee): Shuffle a card from the opponent's graveyard into their deck.
Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
assire var anahid.name: Assire var Anahid

cynthia.flavor: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.
cynthia.info: Deploy (Melee): Spawn The Guardian and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
cynthia.name: Cynthia

peter saar gwynleve.flavor: These are not the hands of an Excellency, but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.
peter saar gwynleve.info: Deploy: Reset the power of a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
peter saar gwynleve.name: Peter Saar Gwynleve

fringilla vigo.flavor: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.
fringilla vigo.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase the number of targets by 1 for each adjacent Mage or Construct.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
fringilla vigo.name: Fringilla Vigo

sweers.flavor: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.
sweers.info: Deploy (Melee): Seize an enemy unit with 3 or less power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
sweers.name: Sweers

vanhemar.flavor: For a fire mage, he's not very… flamboyant.
vanhemar.info: Deploy (Ranged): Destroy a Locked enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
vanhemar.name: Vanhemar

auckes.flavor: Letho's got a plan… what could go wrong?
auckes.info:
Deploy: Lock an enemy unit.
If Serrit is in your hand, Lock all copies of that unit on the opponent's side.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
auckes.name: Auckes

serrit.flavor: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.
serrit.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If Auckes is in your hand, damage that unit by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
serrit.name: Serrit

cantarella.flavor: Men require constant alluring. Mystique and refinement do the job quite well.
cantarella.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play the top card from your opponent's deck.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cantarella.name: Cantarella

joachim de wett.flavor: To describe the manner in which Duke de Wett led the Verden Group as incompetent would be far too kind.
joachim de wett.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play the top non-Disloyal unit from your deck and boost it by 8.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
joachim de wett.name: Joachim de Wett

false ciri.flavor: Here she comes, he thought, our imperial interest. A mock-princess, a mock-queen for Cintra. A mock-ruler for the mouth of the Yarra, future lifeblood of the empire.
false ciri.info: Deploy: Boost all allied Agents by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
false ciri.name: False Ciri

ceallach dyffryn.flavor: Your Imperial Highness… blurted out the seneschal, whose presence until now had been thoroughly ignored. I beg your pardon, but Cahir… My son...
ceallach dyffryn.info: Deploy: Purify all allied units on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
ceallach dyffryn.name: Ceallach Dyffryn

daerlan soldier.flavor: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.
daerlan soldier.info: Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
daerlan soldier.name: Daerlan Soldier

rot tosser.flavor: Let historians debate whether spreading plague in a besieged city is ethical. We just care if it's effective.
rot tosser.info: Deploy (Ranged): Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
rot tosser.name: Rot Tosser

spotter.flavor: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.
spotter.info: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put one on top, then swap the top card of your opponent's deck with yours.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
spotter.name: Spotter

experimental remedy.flavor: Well... At least, I can't make you more dead...
experimental remedy.info: Play a Bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard.
experimental remedy.name: Experimental Remedy

deithwen arbalest.flavor: I aim for the knees. Always.
deithwen arbalest.info:
Deploy: Give Bleeding 3 to an enemy unit.
Conspiracy: Damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
deithwen arbalest.name: Deithwen Arbalest

fire scorpion.flavor: Name's terribly misleading, makes it sound like some corpulent reddish arachnid, not an exquisitely engineered weapon of mass destruction...
fire scorpion.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Tactic card.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
fire scorpion.name: Fire Scorpion

impera brigade.flavor: The Impera Brigade never surrenders. Ever.
impera brigade.info: Deploy: If you control a Soldier, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
impera brigade.name: Impera Brigade

impera enforcers.flavor: Members of the emperor's fanatic body guard fight to the bitter end.
impera enforcers.info:
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charge: 1.
Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, gain 1 Charge.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
impera enforcers.name: Impera Enforcers

nauzicaa sergeant.flavor: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.
nauzicaa sergeant.info: Whenever you play a unit with Deploy, boost self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
nauzicaa sergeant.name: Nauzicaa Sergeant

nauzicaa brigade.flavor: They call us Death's Heads. Care to find out why?
nauzicaa brigade.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
If the enemy unit is boosted, damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
nauzicaa brigade.name: Nauzicaa Brigade

alba pikeman.flavor: Pledge your allegiance to our Emperor, Emhyr var Emreis… or die.
alba pikeman.info:
Melee: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on the Melee row by 1.
Bonded: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
alba pikeman.name: Alba Pikeman

alba spearman.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each adjacent Soldier.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
alba spearman.name: Alba Spearman

combat engineer.flavor: Want irrefutable proof of civilization's advance? Look at war. Man gets better at killing with each one.
combat engineer.info: Deploy: If you control an artifact, boost self by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
combat engineer.name: Combat Engineer

emissary.flavor: But… but there's no justice in it! One does not kill the messenger!
emissary.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Boost an ally by 7.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
emissary.name: Emissary

imperial diplomacy.flavor: A spy? No, that's saying far too much. I consider myself more of an observer.
imperial diplomacy.info: Create and play a bronze card from your opponent's faction.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
imperial diplomacy.name: Imperial Diplomacy

alchemist.flavor: Two ounces of calcium equum, one ounce of rubedo…
alchemist.info: Deploy (Ranged): Swap the power of 2 allied units.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
alchemist.name: Alchemist

mangonel.flavor: This model specializes in slinging corpses and ripe dung.
mangonel.info: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 1. For every Spying unit adjacent to it, increase the damage by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
mangonel.name: Mangonel

nilfgaardian knight.flavor: Sons of noble houses, born in the City of the Golden Towers, form the elite backbone of the Imperial Army.
nilfgaardian knight.info: Deploy: Boost an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
nilfgaardian knight.name: Nilfgaardian Knight

the guardian.flavor: Stone fists to stop intruders armed with swords. Ironclad logic to stop those armed with lies.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
the guardian.name: The Guardian

cow carcass.flavor: That a bird? That a griffin? Naye! That's a…
cow carcass.info: Doomed. Disloyal. At the end of your turn Poison adjacent units and destroy self.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
cow carcass.name: Cow Carcass

treason.flavor: In Nilfgaard, trustful people are considered an endangered species.
treason.info: Give Spying to an enemy unit and damage adjacent units by its power.
keywords: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
treason.name: Treason

bribery.flavor: Many believe the empire's power rests upon the shoulders of its disciplined army and dutiful mages. In truth, the Nilfgaardian floren rules the world.
bribery.info: Create and play a unit from your opponent's starting deck.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
bribery.name: Bribery

petri's philter.flavor: A mage responsible for dozens of brilliant inventions. The mind of a generation. Commonly referred to around the Continent as that bloke with the dish.
petri's philter.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3 and give it Zeal.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
petri's philter.name: Petri's Philter

korathi heatwave.flavor: Vicovaro scholars have determined that, in the absence of imperial aid, drought-stricken provinces lose half their population, two-thirds of their livestock and all their will to rebel.
korathi heatwave.info: Banish a unit or an artifact.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
korathi heatwave.name: Korathi Heatwave

marching orders.flavor: We are but pawns in a game played by old men, sent to fight and die on their senile whims…
marching orders.info: Play the lowest unit from your deck.
marching orders.name: Marching Orders

necromancy.flavor: We have ways of making you talk… alive or dead.
necromancy.info: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
necromancy.name: Necromancy

summoning circle.flavor: There exist a great many realities outside our own… With the right knowledge, one can contact them and summon beings beyond human fathoming.
summoning circle.info: Deploy: Create and play a bronze unit from any faction.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
summoning circle.name: Summoning Circle

arachas venom.flavor: If substance makes contact with eyes, rinse immediately with cold water, then commence drawing up will.
arachas venom.info:
Damage a unit by 3.
Deathblow: Damage adjacent units by 3.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
arachas venom.name: Arachas Venom

wild hunt navigator.flavor: For hundreds of years, Avallac'h tried to recreate the Elder Blood gene through back breeding - yet the elven children thus fostered were but dim sparks compared to Lara's flame.
wild hunt navigator.info:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Dominance: Boost it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
wild hunt navigator.name: Wild Hunt Navigator

vabjorn.flavor: Blood for Svalblod! Skulls for his throne!
vabjorn.info: Deploy (Melee): Play a Raid card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
vabjorn.name: Vabjorn

milaen.flavor: The old baron treated poachers mercilessly. Luckily for Milaen, the old baron was dead and his men, desperate outlaws.
milaen.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Damage 4 enemy units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
milaen.name: Milaen

leo bonhart.flavor: He would just sit there and stare at me, not saying a word. His eyes, they were… fish-like, somehow. No brows, no lashes… Just these balls of water, with a black stone sunk in each. He would devour me with those eyes in total silence. That frightened me more than the beatings.
leo bonhart.info:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
Deploy (Ranged): Destroy an enemy Witcher.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
leo bonhart.name: Leo Bonhart

rainfarn of attre.flavor: When Cintra fell, Attre followed, leaving its defenders a choice: accept the Nilfgaardian leash or die.
rainfarn of attre.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Conspiracy: Increase damage by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
rainfarn of attre.name: Rainfarn of Attre

aretuza adept.flavor: The adepts' every whim is catered to - they live like princesses at Aretuza. And in turn half the city lives off servicing them: seamstresses, milliners, confectioners, delivery boys…
aretuza adept.info: Whenever an allied unit's Patience is triggered, boost self by 1.
keywords: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
aretuza adept.name: Aretuza Adept

drummond warmonger.flavor: Think o' the greater good?! War's the greatest good, the greatest bad, the greatest damn anythin' man's ever come up with!
drummond warmonger.info:
Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent enemies by 1.
Bloodthirst 5: Damage all enemies on a row by 1 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
drummond warmonger.name: Drummond Warmonger

cyclops.flavor: Don't stare at his eye, he hates that…
cyclops.info: Deploy: Destroy an adjacent ally unit and deal its power as damage to an enemy.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cyclops.name: Cyclops

archespore.flavor: Folklore claims they sprout from soil watered with the blood of the dying. Thus they flourish in grounds consecrated by pogroms, dark rituals or brutal murders.
archespore.info: Deathwish: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
archespore.name: Archespore

dol blathanna sentry.flavor: As long as we stand, no human foot shall trample Dol Blathanna's meadows.
dol blathanna sentry.info:
Melee: Whenever an enemy unit moves, damage it by 1.
Ranged: Whenever an allied unit moves, boost it by 1.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
dol blathanna sentry.name: Dol Blathanna Sentry

an craite greatsword.flavor: Ahh, ye gave me a good laugh there, Nordling! Why, this bastard, ye couldn't even grip it, let alone gut me with it.
an craite greatsword.info:
Deploy: Damage self by 6.
Whenever an enemy unit takes damage, Heal self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
an craite greatsword.name: An Craite Greatsword

hefty helge.flavor: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.
hefty helge.info:
Shield.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Tactic.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
hefty helge.name: Hefty Helge

mahakam marauder.flavor: Hunting on Mahakam's craggy cliffs is not particularly easy… but nor are dwarves particularly put off by danger.
mahakam marauder.info:
Deploy: Gain Vitality for 2 turns.
Bonded: Gain Vitality for 4 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
mahakam marauder.name: Mahakam Marauder

harald houndsnout.flavor: Once proud jarl of Clan Tordarroch, now a muttering madman.
harald houndsnout.info:
Deploy: Spawn 3 of Harald's Pals and Summon them to your other allied row.
Order: Damage an allied unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
harald houndsnout.name: Harald Houndsnout

magne division.flavor: I know the Emperor defends all his lands... but a garrison in this blasted waste is like a chastity belt on a grave hag.
magne division.info:
At turn end, boost self by 1 if this is the only card on the row.
Bonded: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 instead.
keywords: Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
magne division.name: Magne Division

tuirseach veteran.flavor: In my days I've seen wonders no man's ever dreamt of, and done things no man should ever do.
tuirseach veteran.info:
Deploy: Damage self by 3.
Berserk 3: Heal self.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
tuirseach veteran.name: Tuirseach Veteran

ban ard tutor.flavor: I'm constantly comparing the achievements of Aretuza's adepts with the work done by the lads at Ban Ard, and my conclusion constantly falls in favor of the girls.
ban ard tutor.info: Deploy: Boost an allied Mage by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
ban ard tutor.name: Ban Ard Tutor

battering ram.flavor: Not gonna open up, eh? Guess we gotta knock harder.
battering ram.info:
Deploy, Crew: Gain Zeal.
Order (Melee): Move self to the Ranged row.
Order (Ranged): Move self to the Melee row, then damage the highest enemy unit by 3.
Cooldown: 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
battering ram.name: Battering Ram

vreemde.flavor: The Great Sun shall warm the North with its rays, even if it means I must slaughter you all!
vreemde.info: Deploy: Boost an allied Soldier and all copies of it by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vreemde.name: Vreemde

golyat.flavor: Some claim Golyat was once a famous knight. Sadly, one day he earned the wrath of the Lady of the Lake, who turned him into a monster.
golyat.info: Deathwish: Your opponent Summons the highest unit from their deck on the opposite row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
golyat.name: Golyat

artefact compression.flavor: The figurine expanded in a flash, pulsing and throbbing, changing its shape and structure like a puff of smoke crawling over the floor. Beams of light revealed movement and hardening materials. A moment later, in the center of the magic circle a human form suddenly appeared.
artefact compression.info: Reset power of a unit and Lock it.
keywords: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
artefact compression.name: Artefact Compression

white frost.flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.
white frost.info:
Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row and Spawn Frost on its row for 2 turns. Charge: 2
Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, boost it by 1 if there's Frost in the opposite row.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
white frost.name: White Frost

aguara: true form.flavor: Ever heard of an anterion? Think of it as the opposite of a lycanthrope: a beast which can take on human form.
aguara: true form.info: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a special card from any faction.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
aguara: true form.name: Aguara: True Form

uma's curse.flavor: I give you three solid leads, trails as fresh as morning dew, the aid of my spies and my court sorceress. Yet in my daughter's stead, you bring me this… monstrosity?
uma's curse.info: Create and play a gold unit from any faction.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
uma's curse.name: Uma's Curse

aguara.flavor: Smarten up right now, or it's off to an aguara with you!
aguara.info:
Deploy (Melee): Lock a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Remove a unit's Lock.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
aguara.name: Aguara

shilard fitz-oesterlen.flavor: A diplomat is a man who uses many more words than necessary to express much less than he knows.
shilard fitz-oesterlen.info: Deploy: Set the power of the highest unit in your opponent's hand to 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
shilard fitz-oesterlen.name: Shilard Fitz-Oesterlen

adda: striga.flavor: And the striga's doin' fine. Sure, she takes a bite outta someone from time to time, but you get used to that.
adda: striga.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Dominance: Damage it by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
adda: striga.name: Adda: Striga

trial of the grasses.flavor: Imagine a lump of clay. In order to shape it, you must first moisten it or it will crumble. The Trial's initial part does just that. It opens the body to change, so to speak. Only then can the mutagens produce a witcher.
trial of the grasses.info: Set a unit's power to 12. If it's not a Witcher, damage it by 6 first.
trial of the grasses.name: Trial of the Grasses

hanmarvyn's blue dream.flavor: This spell lets you see the last moments of a dead man's life… if you can survive its casting.
hanmarvyn's blue dream.info: Play a unit from your opponent's graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
hanmarvyn's blue dream.name: Hanmarvyn's Blue Dream

xavier moran.flavor: Well? Somethin' wrong? Venison a wee bit rank for ye? Ehh, princess?
xavier moran.info:
Melee: Whenever you play a Dwarf, gain 1 Armor.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
xavier moran.name: Xavier Moran

heymaey herbalist.flavor: We don't burn cunning women in Skellige - we take their advice.
heymaey herbalist.info: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
heymaey herbalist.name: Heymaey Herbalist

iris' companions.flavor: We'd rather keep our names to ourselves. Think of us as… friends of the house.
iris' companions.info:
Deploy: Draw a card of your choice, then Discard a random card.
If you have Iris in hand, choose which card to Discard instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
iris' companions.name: Iris' Companions

dorregaray of vole.flavor: Like the witchers, Dorregaray is a monster aficionado, though he's developed his own classification system. Instead of dividing them into necrophages, ogroids and the like, he just thinks they're all wonderful.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
dorregaray of vole.name: Dorregaray of Vole

hubert rejk.flavor: The coroner is a calm, peaceful person. He even treats corpses with the utmost delicacy.
hubert rejk.info:
Whenever you use an Order ability while this card is in your deck, remove a counter from it. When counter reaches 0, Summon this card from your deck to your Ranged row.
Counter: 10.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
hubert rejk.name: Hubert Rejk

nivellen.flavor: Lost? Well, go be lost somewhere else. Somewhere not on my property, that is. Point your left ear to the sun and keep walking, you'll hit the road soon enough. Well? What're you waiting for?
nivellen.info: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent units to the other row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
nivellen.name: Nivellen

stregobor.flavor: The witcher had met thieves that looked like town councilors, town councilors that looked like beggars and kings that looked like thieves. Stregobor, though, always looked exactly like the commonly accepted imagining of what a mage should look like.
stregobor.info: Ranged: After 2 allied turns, each player draws a unit and sets its power to 1.
keywords: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
stregobor.name: Stregobor

vincent meis.flavor: By day, Captain of the Vizima City Guard. By night, merciless avenger and defender of the downtrodden.
vincent meis.info:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Set the power of a non-boosted enemy to 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
vincent meis.name: Vincent Meis

hym.flavor: The gods' speak to me… I hear them whisper from the shadows…
hym.info: Deploy: Swap this unit's power with a damaged unit's power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
hym.name: Hym

olaf.flavor: 10-time winner of the venerable title of Champion of the An Skellig Arena.
olaf.info: Order: Boost Olaf by twice the amount he is damaged.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
olaf.name: Olaf

ulfhedinn.flavor: Werewolf? Oh, no, no… this is something far, far worse.
ulfhedinn.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by half its current power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
ulfhedinn.name: Ulfhedinn

dimun warship.flavor: Clan Dimun warships are light and fast, perfect for racing down slow merchant frigates.
dimun warship.info:
Whenever you play a Pirate, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1.
Deathwish: Summon the highest-power bronze Pirate from your Graveyard to this row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
dimun warship.name: Dimun Warship

siren.flavor: Legends claim they lure sailors to their doom with their entrancing songs… though more likely, the sailors were more entranced by their other ample charms.
siren.info: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If it's a Beast, boost it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
siren.name: Siren

alpha werewolf.flavor: Some say lycanthropy's contagious - get bit by a werewolf, you turn into one yourself. Witchers know that's nonsense, of course - only a powerful curse can bring on this condition.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
alpha werewolf.name: Alpha Werewolf

assassination.flavor: Assassin — one of the most popular professions at the imperial court, just after scribe and courtesan.
assassination.info: Damage a unit by 6. Decrease the damage by 1 for each unit adjacent to it.
assassination.name: Assassination

infiltrator.flavor: You can run, but you'll never hide.
infiltrator.info: Melee: On round end, shuffle this unit into your opponent's deck.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
infiltrator.name: Infiltrator

kingslayer.flavor: The School of the Viper shall be reborn… Letho saw to that.
kingslayer.info: Deploy: Reveal the top card from your opponent's deck and Banish it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
kingslayer.name: Kingslayer

pyrotechnician.flavor: An extraordinarily risky, and thus much revered, Mahakam trade. Its best-known practitioner was a dwarf by the name of Mikkel Bay.
pyrotechnician.info: Order: Damage a random enemy unit and self by 4.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
pyrotechnician.name: Pyrotechnician

farseer.flavor: Her words might seem unintelligible at times, but they always contain hidden meanings and tremendous wisdom.
farseer.info: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random card from your deck. If it's a special card, boost self by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
farseer.name: Farseer

elven scribe.flavor: Knowledge, my dear, is a privilege, and privileges are only shared among equals.
elven scribe.info:
Remove a Counter whenever you play a Special card.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, boost self by 6.
elven scribe.name: Elven Scribe

panther.flavor: An Oxenfurt scholar once examined a panther and declared it was nothing more than a leopard of a different color. The panther seemed indifferent to this pronouncement and gobbled him up before he could complete his research.
panther.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 4 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
panther.name: Panther

tuirseach bearmaster.flavor: Don't touch him. Don't look him in the eyes. In fact… don't go anywhere near him.
tuirseach bearmaster.info:
Deploy: Give an allied Beast Vitality for 3 turns.
Bonded: Boost an allied Beast by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
tuirseach bearmaster.name: Tuirseach Bearmaster

dimun corsair.flavor: The sea's ours, along with everythin' that floats, swims or sails in it!
dimun corsair.info:
Zeal. Order: Remove up to 2 Armor from an allied unit and boost self by the same amount.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Ship, decrease Cooldown by 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
dimun corsair.name: Dimun Corsair

dimun smuggler.flavor: Spikeroog's a barren backwater, but that don't bother us - everythin' we need, we take from you.
dimun smuggler.info:
Deploy: If played next to a Ship, Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
dimun smuggler.name: Dimun Smuggler

heymaey flaminica.flavor: A flaminica, the highest position among the druidesses, commands a great deal of respect and wields a great deal of power.
heymaey flaminica.info: At the end of your turn, Heal all other units on this row by 1.
keywords: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
heymaey flaminica.name: Heymaey Flaminica

heymaey protector.flavor: He fears nothing save Freya's wrath... and his wife's.
heymaey protector.info: Whenever an adjacent unit takes damage, boost self by 1.
heymaey protector.name: Heymaey Protector

royal decree.flavor: We, Foltest, by divine right King of Temeria, Prince of Sodden, Senior Protector of Brugge, etcetera, etcetera, do hereby decree the following…
royal decree.info: Play a unit from your deck.
royal decree.name: Royal Decree

battle trance.flavor: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.
battle trance.info:
Order: Spawn and play Mardroeme.
Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Heal a random allied unit by 1.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
battle trance.name: Battle Trance

onslaught.flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!
onslaught.info:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Charge: 2.
Whenever an enemy unit becomes damaged, give 1 Armor to all Pirates and Ships in your hand.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
onslaught.name: Onslaught

reckless flurry.flavor: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.
reckless flurry.info:
Order: Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
reckless flurry.name: Reckless Flurry

imprisonment.flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.
imprisonment.info:
Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3. Charge: 2.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
imprisonment.name: Imprisonment

imperial formation.flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.
imperial formation.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2. Charge: 3.
Once all Charges are used up, move a unit from your deck to the top.
Whenever you play a Soldier, give it 1 Armor for each adjacent Soldier.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
imperial formation.name: Imperial Formation

tactical decision.flavor: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.
tactical decision.info:
Order: Spawn and play Morvran Voorhis.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
tactical decision.name: Tactical Decision

nature's gift.flavor: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.
nature's gift.info:
Symbiosis.
Order: Give an allied unit Vitality (2). Charge: 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant in a random allied row and set its power equal to the number of units with Symbiosis you control.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
nature's gift.name: Nature's Gift

precision strike.flavor: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.
precision strike.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charges: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Brokilon Sentinel.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
precision strike.name: Precision Strike

guerilla tactics.flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!
guerilla tactics.info:
Order: Move a unit to the other row. If it's an enemy, damage it by 2; if it's an ally, boost it by 2. Charge: 3

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
guerilla tactics.name: Guerilla Tactics

inspired zeal.flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.
inspired zeal.info:
Order: Boost an allied Northern Realms unit by 2 and give it Zeal. Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
inspired zeal.name: Inspired Zeal

mobilization.flavor: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.
mobilization.info:
Order: Spawn a base copy of a bronze allied Soldier on its row and boost it by 3.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
mobilization.name: Mobilization

tridam infantry.flavor: Soldiers loyal to the old baron of Tridam left the city with Falibor, thus becoming renegades wanted by the law.
tridam infantry.info: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
tridam infantry.name: Tridam Infantry

cerys an craite.flavor: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.
cerys an craite.info:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn a Drummond Shieldmaiden in this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a Drummond Queensguard in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
cerys an craite.name: Cerys an Craite

saskia.flavor: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.
saskia.info:
Harmony.
Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye, Rowdy Dwarf or Young Dryad in this row.
Gain an additional effect based on the unit you Spawned.
Elven Deadeye - Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
Rowdy Dwarf - Boost it by 3 and give it 1 Armor.
Young Dryad - Give it Vitality 3.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
saskia.name: Saskia

skjall.flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!
keywords: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
skjall.name: Skjall

jotunn.flavor: Skellige legend claims the mighty and terrible Jotunn, King of Giants, reigned over the isles in ancient times. He was slain by Hemdall, but with his dying breath he vowed to return for Ragh nar Roog.
jotunn.info: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 2 for every unit more your opponent has on the battlefield.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
jotunn.name: Jotunn

whispess: tribute.flavor: I'd be your best – and last.
whispess: tribute.info: Deploy (Ranged): Play an Organic card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
whispess: tribute.name: Whispess: Tribute

ritual sacrifice.flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.
ritual sacrifice.info: Trigger all allied units' Deathwish abilities.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
ritual sacrifice.name: Ritual Sacrifice

weavess: incantation.flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
weavess: incantation.info:
Zeal. Order: Consume an allied unit.
Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
weavess: incantation.name: Weavess: Incantation

mandrake.flavor: There you all stand! With wonderment awake, doubting the plan and high-discovery. Some, as if grappled by the fell mandrake, some, by the black dog's devilry.
mandrake.name: Mandrake

crow's eye.flavor: A certain famous pirate once so loved this intoxicating herb, he earned the nickname 'Crow's Eye.' The theatrical version of his legend omits this, however, to the great consternation of pirate lore sticklers.
crow's eye.info: Purify an allied unit and boost it by 3.
keywords: Purify: Remove all statuses.
crow's eye.name: Crow's Eye

vigo's muzzle.flavor: Never has there been a beast Fringilla Vigo could not tame.
vigo's muzzle.info: Lock an enemy unit with 5 or less power and Seize it.
keywords: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
vigo's muzzle.name: Vigo's Muzzle

wolfsbane.flavor: Also known as 'the queen of poisons,' wolfsbane is used in many witcher Potions and alchemic brews.
wolfsbane.info: Damage all units with even power by 2, or damage all units with odd power by 2.
wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane

pitfall trap.flavor: Simple, cheap and deadly efficient - no wonder it's one of the Scoia'tael's favorite traps.
pitfall trap.info:
Ambush: After your opponent plays a card face-up, split damage equal to its provision cost between all enemy units.
Spring: Randomly split 6 damage between all enemy units.
keywords: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
pitfall trap.name: Pitfall Trap

cockatrice.flavor: Always strikes between the vertebrae, under your left kidney or straight into your aorta. That way, it only needs to strike once.
cockatrice.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1 for each adjacent Beast.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cockatrice.name: Cockatrice

poor fucking infantry.flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?
poor fucking infantry.info:
Deploy: Spawn Left Fucking Flank and Right Fucking Flank on both sides of this unit.
Bonded: Boost self by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
poor fucking infantry.name: Poor Fucking Infantry

lambert: swordmaster.flavor: Go teach your grandma to suck eggs.
lambert: swordmaster.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit and all its copies by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
lambert: swordmaster.name: Lambert: Swordmaster

eskel: pathfinder.flavor: Heard you panting from three miles away. Just didn't wanna give up that vantage point.
eskel: pathfinder.info: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by 1.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
eskel: pathfinder.name: Eskel: Pathfinder

vesemir: mentor.flavor: Killing monsters is not something to be taken lightly. Ciri must understand that if she's to become one of us.
vesemir: mentor.info:
Deploy: Boost all Witchers you control by 1.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Also boost your Witchers in hand and deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
vesemir: mentor.name: Vesemir: Mentor

dwarven agitator.flavor: Mark me words, if ye dinnae get up off yer arses, humans're gonnae come here an' steal our wenches!
dwarven agitator.info: Deploy (Ranged): Boost a Dwarf in your hand by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
dwarven agitator.name: Dwarven Agitator

standard bearer.flavor: You shall defend this standard if it costs you your lives! Gloir aen Ard Feainn!
standard bearer.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
standard bearer.name: Standard Bearer

rotfiend.flavor: You'll smell them long before you see them.
rotfiend.info: Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 5.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
rotfiend.name: Rotfiend

alba armored cavalry.flavor: The wedge of riders thundered into the phalanx with crushing momentum. Like a dagger thrust into an exposed belly, the Alba Division swept unhindered through everything between it and the vital organs of the Temerian Infantry.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
alba armored cavalry.name: Alba Armored Cavalry

temerian drummer.flavor: Not the career he had in mind when he told mummy he wanted to be a musician.
temerian drummer.info: At the end of your turn, boost a unit to the right by 1.
temerian drummer.name: Temerian Drummer

whale harpooner.flavor: Skelligers have long known that harpoons are effective against more than mere whales...
whale harpooner.info: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row, then damage it by the number of units on that row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
whale harpooner.name: Whale Harpooner

naglfar.flavor: Waves pummel the shore, waves pushed by the prow of the spectral Naglfar. Hemdall's horn rings in the air, and Hemdall stands facing his enemies atop Bifrost, the burning rainbow. The White Frost is nigh, nigh is the time of gale and storm…
naglfar.info: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play one and place the other on top.
naglfar.name: Naglfar

chort.flavor: A member of the Bovine Defense Force. Semper fi!
chort.name: Chort

ice troll.flavor: Trolls come in many varieties, with differing shapes, sizes and predilections, though always with about as much brains as a bucket of rusty nails.
ice troll.info: Every allied turn, on turn end, if you control fewer units than your opponent, boost self by 1.
ice troll.name: Ice Troll

venendal elite.flavor: Ebbing is famed for its top-notch mercenaries and light cavalry.
venendal elite.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Tactic in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
venendal elite.name: Venendal Elite

mahakam ale.flavor: Considered to be the dwarves' greatest contribution to world culture.
mahakam ale.info: Boost a unit by 5 and remove its Lock.
keywords: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
mahakam ale.name: Mahakam Ale

\u00e9ibhear hattori.flavor: Only thing that can rival his swords? His dumplings.
\u00e9ibhear hattori.info: Deploy: Create and play a Trap card from your starting deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
\u00e9ibhear hattori.name: Éibhear Hattori

germain piquant.flavor: The hero Toussaint needs, but not the one it deserves.
germain piquant.info:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Cows to the right, then Spawn 2 Cows to the left of this unit.
Order: Spawn a Cow on this row.
Cooldown: 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
germain piquant.name: Germain Piquant

heymaey spearmaiden.flavor: Skellige women are wild and unpredictable. All units are to treat them as serious threats and never underestimate their capabilities. - General Directive to the Invading Forces of the Imperial Armada
heymaey spearmaiden.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
heymaey spearmaiden.name: Heymaey Spearmaiden

ronvid the incessant.flavor: This self-dubbed knight roams the world defending the honor of his beloved Maid Bilberry - though none are certain where she lives, if she lives still or if she ever lived at all.
ronvid the incessant.info:
Deploy: Boost self by 5.
Whenever you play a Soldier, Summon this unit from your graveyard to a random allied row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
ronvid the incessant.name: Ronvid the Incessant

tainted ale.flavor: That beer supposed to be green…?
tainted ale.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 2. 
Charge: 3.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
tainted ale.name: Tainted Ale

ale of the ancestors.flavor: Boros, the legendary founder of Clan Fuchs, died after overindulging in this beverage - he passed out while reaching for his golden ring, which had fallen into a brook.
ale of the ancestors.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost a unit by 3. 
Cooldown: 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
ale of the ancestors.name: Ale of the Ancestors

she-troll of vergen.flavor: Lover of elf and onion soup.
she-troll of vergen.info: Melee: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, boost self by 2.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
she-troll of vergen.name: She-Troll of Vergen

elven swordmaster.flavor: Combat is a dance, and you must never allow your opponent to lead.
elven swordmaster.info:
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play an Elf, decrease Cooldown by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
elven swordmaster.name: Elven Swordmaster

slyzard.flavor: No man alive, no matter his brawn, no matter his skill, can parry a blow dealt by the tail of a slyzard, the pincers of a giant scorpion or the claws of a griffin.
slyzard.info:
Order: Consume an allied unit on this row.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
slyzard.name: Slyzard

aedirnian mauler.flavor: Ugh, these guys can be a real headache.
aedirnian mauler.info: Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
aedirnian mauler.name: Aedirnian Mauler

geralt: yrden.flavor: He lay down next to Adda's mummified remains, drawing the Yrden Sign on the inner side of her sarcophagus' lid.
geralt: yrden.info: Deploy: Reset the power of all units in a row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
geralt: yrden.name: Geralt: Yrden

mahakam volunteers.flavor: Hoooahhh! Hoooaahhh! Hooo! Prepare yer hineys, clowns! Soon we'll be comin' 'round! Tae kick 'em till ye've feet for frowns!
mahakam volunteers.info: Deploy: If you control a Dwarf, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
mahakam volunteers.name: Mahakam Volunteers

harald's pal.flavor: Tall one's Wilmar. Wilfred's to his right. And the lad with the stutter's Wilhelm.
harald's pal.info:
Doomed.
Deathwish: Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
harald's pal.name: Harald's Pal

cow.flavor: In Beauclair, everything is better: the wine is sweeter, the cows are bigger and all the ladies are above average.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
cow.name: Cow

an craite marauder.flavor: You daft? You mean to sail to Skellige? Those barbarians'll tear you to shreds!
an craite marauder.info: Deploy (Melee): Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
an craite marauder.name: An Craite Marauder

phoenix.flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, that question seems downright trivial.
phoenix.info: On round start, if Phoenix is in your graveyard, Banish it, then Spawn Phoenix Hatchling and Summon it to a random allied row.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
phoenix.name: Phoenix

lockdown.flavor: Why should something as trivial as birth decide who rules over us?
lockdown.info:
Order: Disable opponent's leader ability for the duration of this round. If your opponent's leader has no Charges left or is on Cooldown, Spawn 2 Operatives on your Melee row instead.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
lockdown.name: Lockdown

stribog runestone.flavor: Ofieri runemasters can combine these into runewords of incredible power.
stribog runestone.info: Create and play a bronze Skellige faction card.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
stribog runestone.name: Stribog Runestone

zoria runestone.flavor: I'm getting a palpable chill from this runestone… did I do something to hurt its feelings?
zoria runestone.info: Create and play a bronze Northern Realms faction card.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
zoria runestone.name: Zoria Runestone

dazhbog runestone.info: Create and play a bronze Nilfgaard faction card.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
dazhbog runestone.name: Dazhbog Runestone

devana runestone.flavor: My blades're so sharp, they can cut paper!
devana runestone.info: Create and play a bronze Monster faction card.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
devana runestone.name: Devana Runestone

morana runestone.flavor: I grow faint at the very sight of it…
morana runestone.info: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael faction card.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
morana runestone.name: Morana Runestone

whispering hillock.flavor: It will rise again. Elsewhere, beyond our reach. Blood will flow once more.
whispering hillock.info: Play a Deathwish unit from your deck.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
whispering hillock.name: Whispering Hillock

invigorate.flavor: Though we are now few and scattered, our hearts burn brighter than ever.
invigorate.info:
Order: Boost 5 units in your hand by 1.
Charges: 2.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
invigorate.name: Invigorate

shieldwall.flavor: Her curse was lifted… but her appetite for raw meat remained.
shieldwall.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Shield.
Charge: 3.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
