keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
shieldwall.name: Shieldwall

rage of the sea.flavor: Eist came to Cintra to help Crach an Craite win the hand of Princess Pavetta, yet wound up winning her mother's heart for himself.
rage of the sea.info:
Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns and a Deafening Siren on the opposite row. Charge: 2.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
rage of the sea.name: Rage of the Sea

bone talisman.flavor: The simplest of objects sometimes possess the greatest power.
bone talisman.name: Bone Talisman

werecat.flavor: He hates it when you scratch his belly.
werecat.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Damage all enemy units on the opposite row by 1.
Deathwish: Repeat the Deploy ability.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
werecat.name: Werecat

werewolf.flavor: Some say lycanthropy's contagious - get bit by a werewolf, you turn into one yourself. Witchers know that's nonsense, of course - only a powerful curse can bring on this condition.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
werewolf.name: Werewolf

yennefer's invocation.flavor: It's best not to get in Yennefer's way. Especially when she's in a hurry.
yennefer's invocation.info: Place an enemy unit at the top of your deck.
yennefer's invocation.name: Yennefer's Invocation

letho: kingslayer.flavor: Why does this monk wear studded gloves…?
letho: kingslayer.info: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of a unit without changing power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
letho: kingslayer.name: Letho: Kingslayer

forktail.flavor: As for forktails, bait them thusly: pound a stake in the soil, bind a goat to it, then hide ye in nearto shrubbery posthaste.
forktail.info: Deploy: Damage all other units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
forktail.name: Forktail

slave hunter.flavor: The trick is to break their wills - but not their bodies.
slave hunter.info:
Assimilate.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
slave hunter.name: Slave Hunter

slave infantry.flavor: A free man's got a choice. A slave's choices are made for him.
slave infantry.info: Deploy: Transform an allied unit into Slave Infantry.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
slave infantry.name: Slave Infantry

iorveth's gambit.flavor: Iorveth may have only one eye, but his inner vision is unmatched.
iorveth's gambit.info: If you have 4 or more Traps in your starting deck, play 2 of them at random.
iorveth's gambit.name: Iorveth's Gambit

slave driver.flavor: What drives a slave driver? A solitary purpose: to see his orders carried out to the letter.
slave driver.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Increase damage by 1 for each Locked unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
slave driver.name: Slave Driver

saesenthessis: blaze.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.
saesenthessis: blaze.info:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1. 
Charge: 5.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
saesenthessis: blaze.name: Saesenthessis: Blaze

isengrim's council.flavor: Before us lies Elskerdeg Pass, and beyond that, Zerrikania and Hakland. Before us lies a long and dangerous road. If we are to walk it together… let us put aside our mistrust.
isengrim's council.info: Look at a random Dwarf, Dryad and Elf from your deck, then play one and boost it by 2.
isengrim's council.name: Isengrim's Council

master of disguise.flavor: O Great Sun which dost in Heavens fly, save us from the lice which do so stubbornly infest our bloomers.
master of disguise.info: At the end of every allied turn, boost self by 1 if there is a Locked enemy.
keywords: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
master of disguise.name: Master of Disguise

recruit.flavor: His is not to reason why, his is but… to peel one damned spud after another.
recruit.info: Deploy: Boost an allied Soldier by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
recruit.name: Recruit

seltkirk of gulet.flavor: Though famed for his many virtues, his indomitable courage first and foremost, Seltkirk was not spared the fate which met all those killed in the Battle of Upper Aedirn.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Duel: Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.
seltkirk of gulet.name: Seltkirk of Gulet

ointment.flavor: Will it help? Who knows. Shouldn't do any harm, though. Probably.
ointment.info:
Boost a unit by 5.
If it's a Soldier, Heal it first.
keywords: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
ointment.name: Ointment

vandergrift.flavor: The general thought the war for the Lormark would end quickly, with minimal losses… yet wound up fighting it for all eternity.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
vandergrift.name: Vandergrift

mad kiyan.flavor: We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.
mad kiyan.info:
Formation.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by the amount Mad Kiyan is boosted.
Deathblow: Reset own power.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
mad kiyan.name: Mad Kiyan

kaedweni knight.flavor: Not every man in the Kaedweni Army supports his king's politics. Yet not a single one would dare say that out loud.
kaedweni knight.info: When played or Summoned from the deck, boost self by 3.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
kaedweni knight.name: Kaedweni Knight

giant boar.flavor: Most men, seeing a massive boar in the woods, mess their trousers and scurry up the nearest tree. A Skelliger, though - he just drools.
giant boar.info:
Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 1 for each damaged unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by the amount a unit is damaged.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
giant boar.name: Giant Boar

kaedweni revenant.flavor: Doomed to repeat the same day over and over again, just like the employees of Cianfanelli Bank.
kaedweni revenant.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Deathblow: Spawn a base copy of Kaedweni Revenant and Summon it to this row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
kaedweni revenant.name: Kaedweni Revenant

cursed knight.flavor: He fights an endless war whose beginning he no longer remembers.
cursed knight.info: Deploy: Transform an allied unit that is not a Cursed Knight into a Cursed Knight without changing its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cursed knight.name: Cursed Knight

ciri: nova.flavor: Zireael possesses a great power she cannot control. She is a danger - to herself, to others. Until she learns to control it, she should remain isolated.
ciri: nova.info: Deploy: If your starting deck does not have cards with provision cost 10 or more, gain Resilience, Shield and Veil.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
ciri: nova.name: Ciri: Nova

shupe's day off.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?
shupe's day off.info: If your starting deck has no duplicates, send Shupe on an adventure.
shupe's day off.name: Shupe's Day Off

forbidden magic.flavor: Prohibited? Yes. Eliminated? Far from it.
forbidden magic.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 2. 
Deathblow: Spawn a Kaedweni Revenant and Summon it to a random allied row.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
forbidden magic.name: Forbidden Magic

damned sorceress.flavor: Sabrina's curse spared no one, not even her fellow practitioners.
damned sorceress.info:
Zeal. Order: Destroy a unit's Shield then boost self by 2. 
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
damned sorceress.name: Damned Sorceress

doppler.flavor: Humans despise dopplers so much, they feel mere execution does not suffice - so they tie any they catch to a stake, cover them in thick clay and bake them in a fire.
doppler.info: Deploy: Choose a unit in your hand, then boost self by the total number of units in your hand which have the same primary category as that unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
doppler.name: Doppler

sihil.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.
sihil.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Increase Sihil's Order damage by 1 until moved from the battlefield.
Cooldown: 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
sihil.name: Sihil

bloody flail.flavor: There are weapons banned in all the Northern Realms, for the wounds they deal are horrible beyond all imagining.
bloody flail.info:
Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 8 turns.
For each Soldier you control, decrease the Bleeding duration by 1 and damage that unit by 1 instead.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
bloody flail.name: Bloody Flail

bekker's rockslide.flavor: All it takes is one pebble and we're all done for.
bekker's rockslide.name: Bekker's Rockslide

glorious hunt.flavor: By the gods' gonads, witcher, why'd you bring me this filth?! I want that beast's head! - that was a ploughin' figure of ploughin' speech!
glorious hunt.info: Destroy the unit with the highest base power.
glorious hunt.name: Glorious Hunt

half-elf hunter.flavor: Hated by men, reviled by elves and always picked last during schoolyard games. No wonder half-elves tend to have a chip on their shoulder.
half-elf hunter.info:
Harmony.
Deploy: Spawn an Elven Deadeye into this row.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
half-elf hunter.name: Half-Elf Hunter

dragon's dream.flavor: In Zerrikania, dragon worship dominates every aspect of daily life. Thus it comes as no surprise they name weapons in their honor.
dragon's dream.info: Spawn Dragon's Dream on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Dragon's Dream: At the start of the owner's turn, when timer expires, damage all units in this row by 3.
dragon's dream.name: Dragon's Dream

elven scout.flavor: They say elves leave no tracks in the snow, but if you ask me, they are just a pack of village idiots, babbling nonsense.
elven scout.info: Whenever an allied Trap is triggered, boost self by 2.
elven scout.name: Elven Scout

yoana.flavor: No one'd ever think I could be a skilled armorer - a human, and a woman to boot. A dwarven blacksmith - that's another story…
yoana.info:
Order: Heal an allied unit by 2.
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever an adjacent unit takes damage.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
yoana.name: Yoana

crushing trap.flavor: When this knocks you down, you don't get up again.
crushing trap.info:
Spring: Damage all units on a row by 1.
Ambush: After 2 turns, at the end of your turn, damage all enemy units on the row with the most units by 2.
keywords: Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
crushing trap.name: Crushing Trap

derran.flavor: Whatever caused this madness must have been terrifying…
derran.info: Deploy (Ranged): Damage self by 3, then move a card from your deck to your graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
derran.name: Derran

rock barrage.flavor: Someday, when you are older, you could get hit by a boulder.
rock barrage.info: Damage an enemy unit by 4 and move it to the other row.
rock barrage.name: Rock Barrage

vandergrift's blade.flavor: Seltkirk shattered Vandergrift's sword during a knights' tourney in Ard Carraigh. Afterwards Vandergrift, enraged at his weapon's failure, ordered a new one forged, this time with powerful runestones enchanted into it.
vandergrift's blade.info:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 6. 
Whenever you play a Knight, boost it by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vandergrift's blade.name: Vandergrift's Blade

sabrina's inferno.flavor: With her dying breath, Sabrina Glevissig cast a powerful curse that struck not only her executioners, but all who stood nearby.
sabrina's inferno.info: Damage each non-Specter unit by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability once.
sabrina's inferno.name: Sabrina's Inferno

mahakam horn.flavor: Once upon a time, Mahakam held a horn-blowing contest. That day the dwarves made an important discovery: loud noises and snow-capped peaks do not play well together.
mahakam horn.info:
Spring: Boost adjacent units by 3.
Ambush: When your opponent passes, boost adjacent units by 4.
keywords: Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
mahakam horn.name: Mahakam Horn

mastercrafted spear.flavor: Hold that spear up, weakling! Not a single horse shall pass!
mastercrafted spear.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charge: 4.
Limit 1 Charge per turn.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
mastercrafted spear.name: Mastercrafted Spear

parasite.info: Damage an enemy unit by 6, or boost an allied unit by 6.
parasite.name: Parasite

winch.flavor: It's a winch. Not much to flap your jaw about.
winch.info: Boost an allied unit by 5 and reduce its Cooldown by 3.
keywords: Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
winch.name: Winch

ruehin.flavor: No one has ever entered that forest and lived to tell the tale…
ruehin.info: Deathwish: On allied turn end, Summon this unit from your graveyard to a random allied row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
ruehin.name: Ruehin

watchman.flavor: I can't even see over this bloody thing.
watchman.info: Order: Give an adjacent unit a Shield.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
watchman.name: Watchman

cadaverine.flavor: I don't trust my life to chance. I trust it to a thick coating of Cadaverine on my blade.
cadaverine.info: Poison an enemy unit, then Spawn a base copy of it on the opposite row.
keywords: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
cadaverine.name: Cadaverine

vrygheff.flavor: An eye for an eye only ends when the whole world's blind.
vrygheff.info: Deploy: Trigger the Deploy abilities of adjacent bronze Soldiers.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vrygheff.name: Vrygheff

pavko gale.flavor: No one smuggled as much food to the elves of the Blue Mountains as Gale. He'd bring them sacks of turnips and, prized most of all, leeks.
pavko gale.info:
Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
If you control only Scoia'tael units, damage a unit by 2 instead.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
pavko gale.name: Pavko Gale

paulie dahlberg.flavor: Move yer arses! It's a ploughin' trap!
paulie dahlberg.info:
Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
Order: Give an allied unit 2 Armor.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
paulie dahlberg.name: Paulie Dahlberg

black blood.flavor: Vampires all agree: use of this potion is bad sportsmanship.
black blood.info: The next time an enemy receives a boost, destroy that unit and self.
black blood.name: Black Blood

ozzrel.flavor: Some necrophages have taken such a liking to human flesh, they no longer are content to merely dig up corpses...
ozzrel.info:
Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard.
Deploy (Ranged): Consume a unit from your graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
ozzrel.name: Ozzrel

bridge troll.flavor: This here bridge? Trolls built it a long time ago. Sat under it, made folk pay 'em a hefty copper to pass. Thing is, not many folk pass this way. So they all packed up, went their way. Not the bridge, though. It stayed.
bridge troll.info: Deathwish: Boost the highest allied unit by 4.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
bridge troll.name: Bridge Troll

barbegazi.flavor: What moments before looked like round rocks among the stalagmites now stared at him with enormous, bright, menacing eyes.
barbegazi.info:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Charge: 2.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
barbegazi.name: Barbegazi

scout.flavor: If our scouts don't come back, we turn around. The yokels claim these woods are full o' squirrels - and I don't mean the nut-gatherin' kind.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
scout.name: Scout

equalize.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.
equalize.info: Damage all units with odd power by 2.
equalize.name: Equalize

disrupt.flavor: What's written on this blade? That a curse? No. An insult.
disrupt.info: Damage all units with even power by 2.
disrupt.name: Disrupt

shupe: mage.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?
shupe: mage.info: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a random unit to a random row on each side.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
shupe: mage.name: Shupe: Mage

shupe: hunter.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?
shupe: hunter.info: Deploy: Spawn a random row effect on an enemy row for 3 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
shupe: hunter.name: Shupe: Hunter

shupe: knight.flavor: Other trolls always considered him a bit odd - after all, who in their right mind would prefer colorful scraps of paper to rocks?
shupe: knight.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
shupe: knight.name: Shupe: Knight

arachas swarm.info:
Order: Spawn a Drone on an allied row. Charge: 5. 
Whenever you play an Organic card, Spawn Drone on a random allied row.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
arachas swarm.name: Arachas Swarm

spores.flavor: Carried by the wind across the Continent... Sowing madness and blight where they fall.
spores.info: Reset the power of a unit.
spores.name: Spores

foltest's pride.flavor: As King Foltest likes to say, it's not size that counts, but whether it gets the job done.
foltest's pride.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2 and units adjacent to it by 1.
Cooldown: 4.
Crew: Set Cooldown to 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
foltest's pride.name: Foltest's Pride

golden froth.flavor: Smell that? That's the smell of happiness.
golden froth.name: Golden Froth

peasant militia.flavor: We's the militia. We keep the peace.
peasant militia.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
peasant militia.name: Peasant Militia

geralt: professional.flavor: I accepted a job once, did it. Asked to choose my reward, I invoked the Law of Surprise.
geralt: professional.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. If its power was a multiple of 3, destroy it instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
geralt: professional.name: Geralt: Professional

triss: telekinesis.flavor: Bindings won't suffice. Nor will a gag render her any less dangerous. No, dimeritium is the only solution.
triss: telekinesis.info: Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a bronze special card from either player's starting deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
triss: telekinesis.name: Triss: Telekinesis

dandelion: vainglory.flavor: Dandelion told me all about your adventures. How he'd ready you for battle with his songs, how he tamed the kayran by playin' his lute...
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dandelion: vainglory.name: Dandelion: Vainglory

dandelion: poet.flavor: The quill is mightier than the sword.
dandelion: poet.info: Deploy: Draw a card, then play a card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
dandelion: poet.name: Dandelion: Poet

roche: merciless.flavor: Fear does not befit us. Yet, there is a certain d'hoine... Vernon Roche. Be wary of him.
roche: merciless.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Gain Zeal.
Order: Spawn a Blue Stripes Commando and Summon it to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
roche: merciless.name: Roche: Merciless

call of the forest.flavor: I hold Brokilon dearer than my own life. She is a mother who cares for her children. I will defend her to my final breath.
call of the forest.info: Play a Scoia'tael unit from your deck and boost it by 1.
call of the forest.name: Call of the Forest

yennefer: divination.flavor: Yes, I have seen the future. And you're not in it.
yennefer: divination.info: Deploy (Ranged): Reveal a random unit from your deck, then boost an allied unit by its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
yennefer: divination.name: Yennefer: Divination

imlerith.flavor: The sisters said you would come. They saw you arrive in the water's surface.
imlerith.info: Deploy (Melee): Draw a card, then Discard a card. If the Discarded card was a unit, boost self by its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
imlerith.name: Imlerith

ihuarraquax.flavor: Inconceivable. Impossible, Ciri thought, returning to her senses. Unicorns don't exist, not any more, not in this world. Unicorns are extinct.
ihuarraquax.info:
Deploy (Melee): Each player Summons the highest-provision unit from their deck to their Melee row.
Deploy (Ranged): Each player Summons the lowest-provision unit from their deck to their Ranged row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
ihuarraquax.name: Ihuarraquax

gimpy gerwin.flavor: Keep the vermin on a short leash. And don't be afraid to use that whip!
gimpy gerwin.info: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3 and all copies of it by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
gimpy gerwin.name: Gimpy Gerwin

elf and onion soup.flavor: Garnish each serving with grated cheese. Add eyeballs to taste. Serve hot.
elf and onion soup.info: Destroy 2 allied units of the same border color, then Create and play a unit of the same color from your faction or neutrals.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
elf and onion soup.name: Elf and Onion Soup

ivo of belhaven.flavor: It's not reason I'm devoid of, just emotion.
ivo of belhaven.info:
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Witcher, decrease Cooldown by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
ivo of belhaven.name: Ivo of Belhaven

eyck of denesle.flavor: The Good Book says the world is a garden which the gods once conferred upon man. And we men have this garden neglected!
eyck of denesle.info:
Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal.
Order: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
eyck of denesle.name: Eyck of Denesle

gascon.flavor: Th' Strays of Spalla – 'tis you who lead them? 'Tis you they call the Duke of Dogs?
gascon.info: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
gascon.name: Gascon

prince villem.flavor: The boy's not fit to wear the crown. Hasn't sufficient wit nor valor. I know this, you know this… just, he knows it not.
prince villem.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
prince villem.name: Prince Villem

count caldwell.flavor: Your Majesty… For the queen to question commoners, why, it's simply not proper…
count caldwell.info: At the end of your turn, move this unit to the row with the highest power unit on the battlefield, excluding self. If it changed sides, gain Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
keywords: Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
count caldwell.name: Count Caldwell

xavier lemmens.flavor: Your engineer's got a pate like stewed meat, but he kens his trade, that's for certain.
xavier lemmens.info:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Banish a card from opponent's graveyard.
Order (Ranged): Banish a card from your graveyard.
Cooldown: 1
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
xavier lemmens.name: Xavier Lemmens

keltullis.flavor: When she took roost here, they fought 'er for near a century. Then the dragon got weary o' fightin' and they realized she weren't goin' nowheres, so… they cut a deal. She dinnae bother 'em, they give 'er what she needs.
keltullis.info: Melee: Every allied turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
keltullis.name: Keltullis

frightener: awakened.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
frightener: awakened.name: Frightener: Awakened

glustyworp.flavor: The swamp underfoot suddenly exploded with a powerful splash. Two long, mantis-like forelimbs bristling with spikes shot out from the murk. The monstrous, green hooks seized an unlucky footman, dragging him beneath the water's surface.
glustyworp.info: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
glustyworp.name: Glustyworp

gabor zigrin.flavor: Brouver Hoog wanted to kick him out of Mahakam once for having a llama in his living room… it's a long story.
gabor zigrin.info:
Deploy (Melee): Gain Resilience.
Deploy (Ranged): Gain Immunity.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
gabor zigrin.name: Gabor Zigrin

barnabas beckenbauer.flavor: Arrived here with his peddler's wagon full o' tricks an' gadgets. Went from house tae house, praised his rubbish tae the high heavens. An' what's it he sold us? Bombs that go off in yer hand! Beard-growth formula that makes yer hair catch fire!
barnabas beckenbauer.info: Deploy: Boost an allied Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad unit by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
barnabas beckenbauer.name: Barnabas Beckenbauer

isbel of hagge.flavor: I promised I would never again use magic to harm others.
isbel of hagge.info: Order: (Ranged): If your opponent's hand is not full, look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
isbel of hagge.name: Isbel of Hagge

lippy gudmund.flavor: The coast's picked clean since long! So we set our longships up the Yaruga – for gold and glory!
lippy gudmund.info: Deploy (Ranged): Swap your graveyard with your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
lippy gudmund.name: Lippy Gudmund

dagur two blades.info: Melee: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
dagur two blades.name: Dagur Two Blades

traheaern var vdyffir.flavor: The Nilfgaardians proceeded in the queen's very direction without a sign of panic. The man leading the Nilfgaardians was clad in rich robes. He exuded pride... and the scent of musk.
traheaern var vdyffir.info: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
traheaern var vdyffir.name: Traheaern var Vdyffir

reynard odo.flavor: Under your husband I served ten years, under you another eight. And never in that time did I fight for a more worthy cause.
reynard odo.info:
Formation.
Order: Boost adjacent units by 1.
Whenever you play a unit boost it by 1.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
reynard odo.name: Reynard Odo

black rayla.flavor: Exceptions are a clear road to human blood spilt. All Scoia'tael must die. Leave the gods to sort the wheat from the chaff.
black rayla.info:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Inspired: Damage a unit by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
black rayla.name: Black Rayla

phoenix hatchling.flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, that question seems downright trivial.
phoenix hatchling.info:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Transform into Phoenix.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
phoenix hatchling.name: Phoenix Hatchling

deadeye ambush.flavor: The king once dispatched an envoy to Eldain… despite my advice to the contrary. Found the envoy the next day, eyes gouged out, shaft of his white flag jammed down his throat.
deadeye ambush.info:
Order: Spawn an Elven Deadeye in an allied row.
Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
deadeye ambush.name: Deadeye Ambush

royal inspiration.flavor: We're at war, when rulers don't strive nor choose. When rulers grasp sword and shield and ride out to defend their subjects.
royal inspiration.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Cooldown: 2

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
royal inspiration.name: Royal Inspiration

fruits of ysgith.flavor: Frescoes on the tomb walls depicted Angren's swamps and the beasts that prowled them. Two words were inscribed over the largest of the horrors: Gvaern Ichaer – the Bloody Mistress.
fruits of ysgith.info:
Order: Spawn a Gernichora's Fruit on an allied row. 
At the start of your turn, reset this ability if you do not control any Fruits.

This ability adds 12 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
fruits of ysgith.name: Fruits of Ysgith

enslave.flavor: In my home, in the civilized world, a general commands his force. He does not rush and thrash about like some rabid hound.
enslave.info:
Order: Seize an enemy unit with 3 power or less. 
This value is raised by 1 for every 4 Tactic cards in your starting deck.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
enslave.name: Enslave

patricidal fury.flavor: We're after killin'. Nilfgaardians, Lyrians... 's all the same to us. Strife an' blood an' guts to wash away our shame.
patricidal fury.info:
Order: Spawn and play Arnjolf the Patricide.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
patricidal fury.name: Patricidal Fury

strays of spalla.info: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
strays of spalla.name: Strays of Spalla

bomb heaver.flavor: Knew a young couple once—got separated right after the weddin'. Bomb in the carriage'll do that.
bomb heaver.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
If you have a Bomb in your hand, damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
bomb heaver.name: Bomb Heaver

tactical advantage.flavor: Remember, cadets! He who first draws his blade has the advantage over his foe!
tactical advantage.info: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
tactical advantage.name: Tactical Advantage

stockpile.flavor: My king enjoys life... enjoys pleasures and indulges often. But none of this has hindered his ability to govern the realm bloody well.
stockpile.info:
Order: Spawn a Volunteer on an allied row, then reduce the Cooldown of Northern Realms units in that row by 1.
Charge: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
stockpile.name: Stockpile

angoul\u00eame.flavor: Don't matter if it crawls, slithers, climbs—you name it, I've eaten it. As for things that fly... I once ate a kite just 'cause it had flour stuck to it.
angoul\u00eame.info: Deploy: Spawn and play a random artifact from your opponent's starting deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
angoul\u00eame.name: Angoulême

vysogota of corvo.flavor: It's been near half a century since I last practiced medicine. The years haven't been kind to my memory... Nor the dexterity of my fingers.
vysogota of corvo.info:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever either player plays a card.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
vysogota of corvo.name: Vysogota of Corvo

falibor.flavor: From afar, he looks like a bear. From up close, well... A larger bear.
falibor.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Repeat the Deploy ability and decrease the damage by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
falibor.name: Falibor

anna strenger.flavor: Anna hated her husband so much that she was ready to do anything in order to be free of the man — and the child he had put inside her.
anna strenger.info:
Every allied turn, on turn end, boost the unit to the right by 1.
Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
keywords: Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
anna strenger.name: Anna Strenger

lyrian cavalry.flavor: A horseman's worth no less than his steed. And Lyrian horses are among the Continent's best.
lyrian cavalry.info: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
lyrian cavalry.name: Lyrian Cavalry

rivian pikeman.flavor: Get off your high horse and face me!
rivian pikeman.info:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Resupply: Boost self by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
rivian pikeman.name: Rivian Pikeman

lyrian arbalest.flavor: I can find the bull's-eye from a hundred paces! Perhaps not with my first shot, mind you...
lyrian arbalest.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a card with Orders.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
lyrian arbalest.name: Lyrian Arbalest

lyrian landsknecht.flavor: Best not laugh at their silly-arse hats. Believe me.
lyrian landsknecht.info:
Formation.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Inspired: Damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
lyrian landsknecht.name: Lyrian Landsknecht

lyrian scytheman.flavor: Our folk they feed, and our foes they bleed.
lyrian scytheman.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
lyrian scytheman.name: Lyrian Scytheman

deafening siren.flavor: Easy, mates! Sirens never attack when... Huh? What d'yous mean Right above me?
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
deafening siren.name: Deafening Siren

arnjolf the patricide.flavor: Only death can cleanse me o' shame.
arnjolf the patricide.info:
Doomed.
Spawn 3 Deafening Sirens on the opposite row and damage them by 1.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
arnjolf the patricide.name: Arnjolf the Patricide

gernichora's fruit.flavor: Gernichora's a little like a vampire, they're kindred creatures. 'Cept instead of feasting on the blood of others, she feeds them her own.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
gernichora's fruit.name: Gernichora's Fruit

elven deadeye.flavor: One, two, come into view; Three, four, hide 'hind the door; Five, six, this'll be quick; Seven, eight, come meet your fate!
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
elven deadeye.name: Elven Deadeye

blood scent.flavor: He did not love like a man, but like an animal. Madly, deeply, unconditionally. Wildly.
blood scent.info:
Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 3 turns. Charge: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn an Ekimmara into a random allied row.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
blood scent.name: Blood Scent

double cross.flavor: As head of state, I must judge her fairly. But she is my sister, thus my heart bleeds for her…
double cross.info:
Order: Create and play a card from your opponent's hand.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
double cross.name: Double Cross

pincer maneuver.flavor: They call her the Lioness of Cintra. And not without good reason.
pincer maneuver.info:
Order: Draw a Northern Realms card of your choice, then shuffle a card from your hand back into the deck and Spawn a Volunteer in your Melee row.
Charges: 2

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
pincer maneuver.name: Pincer Maneuver

call of harmony.flavor: She revealeth herself as the Fairhaired Ladie, in flowers all, and all that liveth followeth her path and clingeth to her, as one, plant or beast.
call of harmony.info:
Order: Spawn and play Dana Meadbh.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
call of harmony.name: Call of Harmony

ursine ritual.flavor: He proclaimed to his worshippers but one commandment: Kill.
ursine ritual.info:
Order: Damage an allied unit by 1. Charge: 5
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn a Bear Abomination on a random allied row.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
ursine ritual.name: Ursine Ritual

crimson curse.flavor: When the moon burns red, latch the door and put your lambs to bed...
crimson curse.info: Spawn Blood Moon on an enemy row for 5 turns, then Spawn 2 Ekimmaras in the opposite row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Blood Moon: At the start of the owner's turn, give a random unit in this row Bleeding (2). If the unit is already Bleeding, damage it by 2 instead.
crimson curse.name: Crimson Curse

tesham mutna sword.flavor: Millenia have passed, but its thirst for blood has not.
tesham mutna sword.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 5. If it has a Shield, destroy it instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
tesham mutna sword.name: Tesham Mutna Sword

hen gaidth sword.flavor: Legend tells that wounds carved from this blade never heal. Blood shall flow until not a drop remains...
hen gaidth sword.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Spawn and play a base copy of it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
hen gaidth sword.name: Hen Gaidth Sword

land of a thousand fables.flavor: The girls told me if I ever wished to visit alone, I need but crack open The Land of a Thousand Fables and utter out loud the incantation Expecto ludum!
land of a thousand fables.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Play a special card from your deck.
Order: Transform a special card in your hand into a random unit of the same provision cost from the same faction.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
land of a thousand fables.name: Land of a Thousand Fables

syanna.flavor: Your Majesty... The princess has been touched by the curse o' the Black Sun. There's no hope, I'm afraid...
syanna.info: Order: Repeat the Deploy ability of the next unit you play during this turn.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
syanna.name: Syanna

regis: bloodlust.flavor: I've been called a monster, a bloodthirsty freak. Among other, shall we say, more colorful names.
regis: bloodlust.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Deathblow: Banish it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
regis: bloodlust.name: Regis: Bloodlust

lady of the lake.flavor: Take this sword as a sign of my favor. For centuries it lay in these depths, waiting... for you.
lady of the lake.info:
Shield.
Order: Give an allied unit a Shield.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
lady of the lake.name: Lady of the Lake

fisher king.info: Deploy (Ranged): Move any card from your deck to the top.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
fisher king.name: Fisher King

vivienne: oriole.flavor: Who'd not like to live free as a bird? Well, just ask Vivienne de Tabris.
vivienne: oriole.info: Deploy: Boost self by the provision cost of the card on the right.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vivienne: oriole.name: Vivienne: Oriole

gregoire de gorgon.flavor: Gregoire? That mountain o' muscle wrapped in armor? Course, I 'eard of 'im! Who hasn't?
gregoire de gorgon.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Deathblow: Boost self by 5 and gain a Shield.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
gregoire de gorgon.name: Gregoire de Gorgon

musicians of blaviken.info: Deploy: Gain randomly Shield, Doomed, Resilience or Poison.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
musicians of blaviken.name: Musicians of Blaviken

portal.flavor: Some value them highly. Others hate them.
portal.info:
Deploy: Summon a random 4 provision unit from your deck to the left of this card.
After 3 turns, Summon a random 4 provision unit from your deck to the right of this card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
portal.name: Portal

sangreal.flavor: It is the duchess's exclusive privilege to delight in the prized, oaky flavor of Sangreal... A pleasure she partakes in very, very often.
sangreal.info: Boost a unit by 6 and give it a Shield.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
sangreal.name: Sangreal

tempest.flavor: A Category 10 on the Bekker scale.
tempest.info: Purify 3 adjacent enemy units and damage them by 2.
keywords: Purify: Remove all statuses.
tempest.name: Tempest

curse of corruption.flavor: Black magic – the grislier the better.
curse of corruption.name: Curse of Corruption

sandstorm.flavor: Best case – sand in your teeth. Worst case – buried alive.
sandstorm.info: Damage units at both ends of an enemy row by 3.
sandstorm.name: Sandstorm

dancing star.flavor: A spectacular sight – until it explodes in your face.
dancing star.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Damage the unit to the right by 1 less.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
dancing star.name: Dancing Star

devil's puffball.flavor: As lethal as it is foul.
devil's puffball.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Poison adjacent enemy units.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
devil's puffball.name: Devil's Puffball

northern wind.flavor: That ought to cool your temper.
northern wind.info:
Damage a unit by 4.
Deathblow: Banish it.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
northern wind.name: Northern Wind

moon dust.flavor: The werewolf lifted and tilted his head, mystified by the silvery dust... Then howled in utter agony.
moon dust.info: Purify a unit and damage it by 4.
keywords: Purify: Remove all statuses.
moon dust.name: Moon Dust

samum.flavor: Zerrikanian alchemists have learned to harness the energy of hot desert storms and bind it into an arcane mixture.
samum.info:
Damage a unit by 3.
Deathblow: Move adjacent units to the other row.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
samum.name: Samum

red haze.flavor: Perhaps the most insidious invention of Zerrikanian alchemists. And there's no shortage to choose from.
red haze.info: Choose an enemy unit, then damage one adjacent enemy unit by its power.
red haze.name: Red Haze

inspirational ballad.flavor: War's not so horrific when you put a catchy tune to it.
inspirational ballad.info: Give Vitality to an allied unit for 6 turns.
keywords: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
inspirational ballad.name: Inspirational Ballad

thaw.flavor: It heralds the coming of spring... Which, in turn, heralds the coming of war.
thaw.info: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Veil.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
thaw.name: Thaw

traveling merchant.flavor: Florens, orens, crowns – I accept them all!
traveling merchant.info: Deploy (Ranged): Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck, then draw a card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
traveling merchant.name: Traveling Merchant

pellar.flavor:
Gather spirits for this wake,
A passing soul ne'er forsake,
Hear my call, my humble plea,
Unbind his chains, set him free.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
pellar.name: Pellar

cutthroat.flavor: Ahhh, nothin' so soothin' as the sound o' gurglin' blood.
cutthroat.info: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
cutthroat.name: Cutthroat

oxenfurt scholar.flavor: Balderdash! Your blatant obfuscation of teleological and ontological axioms is an embarrassment to the field! Ostentatious verbiage for its own sake!
oxenfurt scholar.info: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality for 2 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
oxenfurt scholar.name: Oxenfurt Scholar

spring equinox.flavor: The days grow longer and the dresses of maidens grow shorter.
spring equinox.info: Purify all units on a row.
keywords: Purify: Remove all statuses.
spring equinox.name: Spring Equinox

scepter of storms.flavor: Some call it the Stick of Truth.
scepter of storms.info: Deploy: Spawn and play Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, or Torrential Rain.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
scepter of storms.name: Scepter of Storms

queen of the night.flavor: Those seduced by her charms find themselves willing to pay any price.
queen of the night.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give Bleeding (3) to an enemy.
Deploy (Ranged): Purify a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
queen of the night.name: Queen of the Night

orianna.flavor: Lady Orianna's been a blessin' for us... She 'elps the beggarly, supports the arts – why, she even runs a home for them poor orphans!
orianna.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding with a duration equal to the number of allied Vampires.
Ranged: Every allied turn, on turn end, boost self by the number of Bleeding enemy units.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
orianna.name: Orianna

protofleder.flavor: Limited to only one region of the Continent, scholars consider them critically endangered. Gods be praised...
protofleder.info: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3), then boost self by the amount of Bleeding on that unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
protofleder.name: Protofleder

garkain.flavor: Blood on the ceiling, entrails on the wall... Got garkain written all over it.
garkain.info: At the end of every allied turn, boost self by 1 if there is a Bleeding enemy.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
garkain.name: Garkain

gael.flavor: A fondness for shiny trinkets is not a trait unique to magpies.
gael.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1. If it's Bleeding deal 3 damage instead.
Deathblow: Boost self by the destroyed unit's base power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
gael.name: Gael

undying thirst.flavor: Some appetites can never be sated.
undying thirst.info: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 6 turns.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
undying thirst.name: Undying Thirst

feast of blood.flavor: Vampires have been known to fast for years at a time. Yet once the hunt resumes, they feed and feed until frenzied and drunk on blood.
feast of blood.info:
Purify and damage an enemy unit by 3.
If you control a Vampire, also give it Bleeding for 3 turns.
keywords: Purify: Remove all statuses.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
feast of blood.name: Feast of Blood

fleder.flavor: The children o' the night come as punishment from the gods! We's tolerated wizard-folk and non-human filth in our midst too long! Repent! 'Fore yer soul rots, repent!
fleder.info:
When Bleeding is applied to an enemy unit, boost self by the amount applied.
Counter: 1.
Refresh the Counter at the beginning of your turn.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
fleder.name: Fleder

alp.flavor: The townsfolk, long plagued with horrific nightmares, posted a desperate plea for help... Hmm. An alp, gotta be, the witcher grumbled to himself.
alp.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
alp.name: Alp

plumard.flavor: One alone poses no great threat. But a dozen? Gods be with you.
plumard.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns.
Bonded: Give it Bleeding for 4 turns instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
plumard.name: Plumard

nekurat.flavor: No matter how lightly you tread, how soft your step, he will hear you. He will find you.
nekurat.info:
Zeal. 
Order (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns. Cooldown: 2.
Whenever you play a Vampire card, reduce this unit's Cooldown by 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
nekurat.name: Nekurat

bruxa.flavor: The vampiress lunged in a blur, unleashing an inhuman shriek. The wall of sound slammed into the witcher like a battering ram – splintering his ribs, forcing the air from his lungs, and sending tendrils of pain down his spine.
bruxa.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
bruxa.name: Bruxa

vivienne de tabris.flavor: Vivienne's a bit of an odd duck for a lady-in-waitin'. But by the Gods, ye can't deny her beauty an' grace!
vivienne de tabris.info: Deploy: Set a unit's power to its Provision Cost.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vivienne de tabris.name: Vivienne de Tabris

damien de la tour.flavor: I served Beauclair well. At least... I hope I did.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
damien de la tour.name: Damien de la Tour

palmerin de launfal.flavor: Rumor had it the esteemed baron Palmerin de Launfal had fallen into a profane affair with a succubus. The duchess, however, gave no credence to such baseless hearsay.
palmerin de launfal.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. 
Deathblow: Give Spying to adjacent enemy units.
If Milton is in your hand, always trigger Deathblow ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
palmerin de launfal.name: Palmerin de Launfal

milton de peyrac-peyran.flavor: Glinting under the rays of the Beauclair sun, there was no mistaking this knight-errant who bore the head of a great, white bull on his shield.
milton de peyrac-peyran.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. 
Deathblow: Damage adjacent enemy units by 2.
If Palmerin is in your hand, always trigger Deathblow ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
milton de peyrac-peyran.name: Milton de Peyrac-Peyran

artorius vigo.flavor: It is said he created an illusion so realistic that he began to believe it himself...
artorius vigo.info:
Assimilate.
Deploy: Create and play a 1-power copy of a bronze unit from your starting deck.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
artorius vigo.name: Artorius Vigo

roderick of dun tynne.flavor: Roderick lived as a recluse, avoiding society at large. Instead, he preferred the company of a small party of knights. If they can truly be called such...
roderick of dun tynne.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Look at 2 random gold cards from your deck, then play 1 of them.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
roderick of dun tynne.name: Roderick of Dun Tynne

tourney shaelmaar.flavor: Releasing a monster that dangerous in front of a crowd? Plain irresponsible.
tourney shaelmaar.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage a Nilfgaardian enemy unit by 7.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 2 for each allied unit from a different faction.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
tourney shaelmaar.name: Tourney Shaelmaar

tourney joust.flavor: Fame and glory eternal await the victor of this year's annual chivalric tourney!
tourney joust.info: Remove an enemy unit's Shield and damage it by 4, or give an allied unit a Shield and boost it by 4.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
tourney joust.name: Tourney Joust

toussaint knight-errant.flavor: White steed, shiny-arse armor... Aye, 'tis a knight-errant alright. Fetch the coffin maker!
toussaint knight-errant.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If it has at least 6 power, damage it by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
toussaint knight-errant.name: Toussaint Knight-Errant

ducal guard.flavor: And whatever you do, never, EVER, mention the duchess's sister. Right, so... Welcome to Her Majesty's royal guard!
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
ducal guard.name: Ducal Guard

menagerie keeper.flavor: If there's one thing Nilfgaardians love more than blood-soaked arena battles, it's blood-soaked arena battles with exotic beasts.
menagerie keeper.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. If you have a Tactic in your hand, give it Bleeding for 2 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
menagerie keeper.name: Menagerie Keeper

imperial diviner.flavor: Emperor Emhyr var Emreis spared no effort to find his daughter, even resorting to arcane magics of the mages and sorceresses he had so vehemently despised.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
imperial diviner.name: Imperial Diviner

fangs of the empire.flavor: For a courtesan, a single drop. For a rock troll, an entire bottle. And for Nordling scum? Why waste good poison when a rusty dagger will do?
fangs of the empire.info: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Poison.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
fangs of the empire.name: Fangs of the Empire

duchess's informant.flavor: Anna Henrietta wakes every morn to the tune of her songbirds.
duchess's informant.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a non-Disloyal bronze enemy unit.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
duchess's informant.name: Duchess's Informant

king roegner.flavor: King Roegner of Cintra, once grievously wounded at the bottom of a ravine, hollered for aid. Alas... His call was answered only by the hisses of vipers and the howls of ravenous werewolves...
king roegner.info: Deploy (Melee): Remove Shields from all units, then boost self by 3 for every Shield removed.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
king roegner.name: King Roegner

queen adalia.flavor: Queen Adalia of Cintra possessed the power to raise a drawbridge with a twitch of her brow. A frightening thought what she could do with a wave of her hand...
queen adalia.info: Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze Northern Realms unit from your hand, then give it Shield.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
queen adalia.name: Queen Adalia

prince ans\u00e9is.flavor: Your presence at this tourney is an affront to my honor!
prince ans\u00e9is.info:
Formation.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Inspired: Duel an enemy unit instead.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
Duel: Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.
prince ans\u00e9is.name: Prince Anséis

vissegerd.flavor: I will raise Cintra from the ashes no matter how great the cost.
vissegerd.info:
Deploy: Gain Charges equal to the amount of boosted allied units.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Charge: 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
vissegerd.name: Vissegerd

coodcoodak.flavor: Coodcoodak, throwing his head back, howled and growled, screeched and squealed, whined and bleated – all in a medley of voices both known and unknown, domestic and wild, of reality and of myth.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
coodcoodak.name: Coodcoodak

windhalm of attre.flavor: Off with his head! But slowly, drag it out, put on a show for all to see. His death must serve as an example.
windhalm of attre.info:
Shield.
Every allied turn, on turn end, boost this unit by 2 if it has a Shield.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
windhalm of attre.name: Windhalm of Attre

runeword.flavor: Probably best not to utter that.
runeword.info: Create and play a bronze Northern Realm Mage and give it a Shield.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
runeword.name: Runeword

cintrian spellweaver.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Mage or a Spell.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
cintrian spellweaver.name: Cintrian Spellweaver

cintrian enchantress.flavor: The ladies of the Cintrian court are oft touted for their stately elegance – and equally impressive aptitude for magic
cintrian enchantress.info:
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality for 2 turns. 
Bonded: Give it Vitality for 4 turns instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
cintrian enchantress.name: Cintrian Enchantress

cintrian artificer.flavor: What shall I call it? Perhaps Andúril...
cintrian artificer.info:
Formation.
Order: Give an allied unit a Shield.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
cintrian artificer.name: Cintrian Artificer
