cintrian knight.flavor: For whom does the bell toll?
cintrian knight.info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. 
Deathblow: Gain Vitality for 2 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
cintrian knight.name: Cintrian Knight

cintrian royal guard.flavor: Queen Calanthe handpicked her personal guard with meticulous care. Each must serve with unconditional loyalty, stand more than six feet tall, and possess a devilishly handsome jawline.
cintrian royal guard.info: Deploy: Boost self by 3 for every other Cintrian Royal Guard under your control.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cintrian royal guard.name: Cintrian Royal Guard

cintrian envoy.flavor: She thought service in the diplomatic corps would mean a quiet life behind a desk. She and her blistered feet were sorely mistaken...
cintrian envoy.info:
Formation.
Order: Look at 3 random cards from your deck. You may move 1 to the top of it.
Cooldown: 2.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
cintrian envoy.name: Cintrian Envoy

knighthood.flavor: Kneel an everyman, arise a knight!
knighthood.info: Split 6 boost randomly between all units on an allied row.
knighthood.name: Knighthood

fauve.flavor: At the edge of the wood, a lone dryad awaited them. Dandelion recognized her at once – the very same with green hair who had given them light in dark of night and urged the bard to continue his ballads.
fauve.info: Deploy: Play a Nature card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
fauve.name: Fauve

the great oak.flavor: The trees of Brokilon oft rustle amongst themselves, despairing of the ancient oak whose heart now rots with hatred.
the great oak.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by the number of cards to the left of Great Oak, then boost self by the number of cards to the right of Great Oak.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
the great oak.name: The Great Oak

weeping willow.flavor: Its name misleads, for 'tis not the tree who weeps.
weeping willow.info:
Harmony.
Deploy (Melee): Gain Shield.
Deploy (Ranged): Poison an enemy unit.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
weeping willow.name: Weeping Willow

water of brokilon.flavor: Drink, child. Wash away your past, your worries. Drink and become our sister!
water of brokilon.info: Spawn 2 Dryad Fledglings into the row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
water of brokilon.name: Water of Brokilon

sirssa.flavor: With silent grace, a dark-haired dryad nimbly descended a spiralling cascade of mushrooms along the tree's trunk, her lithe body camouflaged with fallen leaves.
sirssa.info:
Harmony.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Boost a unit in your hand by 2.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
sirssa.name: Sirssa

treant boar.flavor: Dryads wield a mystifying power to shape the forest's trees into any form they wish. So why not a giant boar?
treant boar.info:
Deploy: Gain Zeal if you Control a Dryad.
Order (Melee): Move self to the Ranged row and Heal self.
Order (Ranged): Move self to the Melee row and damage enemy by 2.
Cooldown: 1
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
treant boar.name: Treant Boar

dryad's caress.flavor: Shh, shh... Evelienn va maeth, elaine blath...
dryad's caress.info:
Purify an allied unit and boost it by 3.
If you control a Dryad, also give it Vitality for 3 turns.
keywords: Purify: Remove all statuses.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
dryad's caress.name: Dryad's Caress

dryad grovekeeper.flavor: Is it true? That flowers in Brokilon bloom seven times a year? But... How can that be?
dryad grovekeeper.info: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality with a duration equal to the number of other allied Dryad units.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
dryad grovekeeper.name: Dryad Grovekeeper

treant mantis: stalk.flavor: Feel to you like we're bein' followed?
treant mantis: stalk.info:
Spring: Transform into Treant Mantis: Strike.
Ambush: Give the next unit played by your opponent Poison and transform into Treant Mantis: Strike.
keywords: Spring: An ability triggered manually by the player only when the card is face-down. Cards with Spring are flipped over after use.
Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
treant mantis: stalk.name: Treant Mantis: Stalk

forest whisperer.flavor: The dryads of Brokilon mastered a unique craft – to shape trees at will... And breathe into them life.
forest whisperer.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Poison.
Order (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality for 3 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
forest whisperer.name: Forest Whisperer

brokilon sentinel.flavor: Brokilon is not merely the forest you see before you. She yet lives on in the cities, villages, and fields you so callously carved from her flesh. We shall yet reclaim what you have stolen from her.
brokilon sentinel.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
brokilon sentinel.name: Brokilon Sentinel

dryad ranger.flavor: I do not live in the forest of Brokilon. I am a part of it.
dryad ranger.info:
Harmony.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then give it Poison.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
dryad ranger.name: Dryad Ranger

dryad matron.flavor: She teaches young dryads many useful skills: fletching arrows, communing with the forest, slitting the throats of men...
dryad matron.info: Every allied turn, on turn end, move to the rightmost spot on this row, then boost an allied unit to the left by 1.
dryad matron.name: Dryad Matron

dryad fledgling.flavor: Having recently tasted of the Water of Brokilon, she yet feels strange in her new skin... Her gift for killing, on the other hand, bloomed without delay.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
dryad fledgling.name: Dryad Fledgling

knut the callous.flavor: Knut, son of Oluf? Aye, never has a jarl's moniker fit so well.
knut the callous.info: Deploy: Damage an allied unit to the right by half of its current power, then damage an enemy unit by that amount.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
knut the callous.name: Knut the Callous

svalblod totem.flavor: All totems to Svalblod were ordered destroyed, yet on distant, forgotten shores some yet stand tall... And continue to collect new victims.
svalblod totem.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn a Svalblod Fanatic on both sides of this card.
Order: Damage adjacent units by 2.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
svalblod totem.name: Svalblod Totem

artis.flavor: Not all Svalblod priests were forced from the isles... Unfortunately.
artis.info:
Deploy: Play a 4 provision Cultist from your deck.
Ranged: Whenever a unit is played, damage it by half its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
artis.name: Artis

vildkaarl.flavor: Strike me! C'mon, harder! You call this pain?!
vildkaarl.info: Berserk 2: Transform into a Champion of Svalblod.
keywords: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
vildkaarl.name: Vildkaarl

arnvald.flavor: His name on the island was synonymous with loyalty. For a time.
arnvald.info: Deploy: Transform a damaged allied unit into a Bear Abomination.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
arnvald.name: Arnvald

sigvald.flavor: A vildkaarl that lives to old age earns the respect of his clan.
sigvald.info:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1
Berserk 4: Damage by 2 instead.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
sigvald.name: Sigvald

corrupted flaminica.flavor: At times, even druids succumb to Svalblod's whispers...
corrupted flaminica.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for every Beast in your graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
corrupted flaminica.name: Corrupted Flaminica

svalblod priest.flavor: The cruelty of Svalblod priests proved so fierce, so merciless that – upon the cult's collapse – they were condemned and cast out to the high seas aboard longships with nary a paddle nor sail to guide them.
svalblod priest.info: At the end of your turn, damage the unit to the right by 1, then boost self by 2.
svalblod priest.name: Svalblod Priest

svalblod cultist.flavor: They... They's butcherin' folk, Captain! S-sacrifices to a bear god or some such!
svalblod cultist.info: At the end of every allied turn, Heal the unit to the left by 1 and damage the unit to the right by 1.
keywords: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
svalblod cultist.name: Svalblod Cultist

svalblod fanatic.flavor: Not all are worthy of Svalblod's blessing.
svalblod fanatic.info: Berserk 2: Transform into a Bear Abomination.
keywords: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
svalblod fanatic.name: Svalblod Fanatic

primal savagery.flavor: Not all of Svalblod's worshippers wield bow and blade. They've simply no need.
primal savagery.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 2. 
Deathblow: Spawn a Bear Abomination and Summon it to a random allied row.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
primal savagery.name: Primal Savagery

disgraced brawler.flavor: Skellige's no home to murderers and rogues... Their crimes must be repaid in blood.
disgraced brawler.info:
Deploy, Bloodthirst 3: Lock self.
Berserk 3: Destroy self.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
disgraced brawler.name: Disgraced Brawler

bear abomination.flavor: I'm tellin' youse. Bears fear us more than we fear them. Well... Normal bears, I mean.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
bear abomination.name: Bear Abomination

dettlaff: higher vampire.flavor: In his true form, the Beast of Beauclair could cause even a witcher to quake in his boots.
dettlaff: higher vampire.info:
Deathwish: Summon this unit from the graveyard to the same row. 
This unit's ability is limited to 2 uses and does not refresh when it leaves the battlefield.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
dettlaff: higher vampire.name: Dettlaff: Higher Vampire

champion of svalblod.flavor: This bear taste funny to you?
champion of svalblod.info: Order: Destroy an allied unit, then Heal self.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
champion of svalblod.name: Champion of Svalblod

treant mantis: strike.flavor: Don't move! He can't see us if we don't move.
treant mantis: strike.name: Treant Mantis: Strike

courier.flavor: 'Tis not steel and blood that wins wars, but information.
courier.info:
Deploy (Melee): Look at the top 3 cards from your opponent's deck and move one to the top.
Deploy (Ranged): Look at the top 3 cards from your deck and move one to the top.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
courier.name: Courier

renegade mage.flavor: I really hope that's boot leather I smell burning...
renegade mage.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Tribute 1: Damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
renegade mage.name: Renegade Mage

caleb menge.flavor: Deceivers, heretics, witches! They flood our city, corrupt our virtue, and threaten our very way of life!
caleb menge.info:
Profit 3.
Fee 3 (Melee): Place a Bounty on an enemy unit.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
caleb menge.name: Caleb Menge

beggar.flavor: Say what you will about his technique, I think he captured your good side.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
beggar.name: Beggar

philippa eilhart.flavor: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.
philippa eilhart.info: Deploy: Spend a number of Coins equal to an enemy unit's power, then Seize it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
philippa eilhart.name: Philippa Eilhart

sigi reuven.flavor: You sure he don't look the least bit familar...?
sigi reuven.info:
Intimidate.
Profit 4.
For every unique gang category in your starting deck, increase Sigi Reuven's initial Profit by 1.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
sigi reuven.name: Sigi Reuven

vivaldi bank.flavor: We're sorry to lose your business, but we wish ye well with those dunderhe-- er... With those fine folk over at Cianfanelli Bank.
vivaldi bank.info:
Profit 3.
Look at the top card from your deck plus an additional card for every Coin you possess. Play the top card for free, or play another card for a Coin cost equal to its distance from the top. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
vivaldi bank.name: Vivaldi Bank

eavesdrop.flavor: There are always more ears in the room than those you can count.
eavesdrop.info:
Profit 5.
Draw a card, then put a card from your hand at the bottom of your deck.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
eavesdrop.name: Eavesdrop

graden.flavor: Initially, we burned any tomes on black magic we found. Recently we decided it might be wise to read them first.
graden.info:
Deploy (Melee): Destroy an enemy unit with a Bounty.
Tribute 5: Boost self by that unit's base power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
graden.name: Graden

blood money.flavor: A war with Whoreson will see Novigrad's gutters run red with blood.
blood money.info:
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 8, then gain Coins equal to any excess damage dealt.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
blood money.name: Blood Money

kurt.flavor: Oy, Kurt, find out what Merigold's hollerin' about, if she needs anything. A hot iron to the tongue, maybe?
kurt.info:
Deploy (Melee): Place a Bounty on an enemy unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Purify a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
kurt.name: Kurt

moreelse.flavor: Some witch hunters truly believed the eradication of mages and sorceresses would make the world a better place. Moreelse did not require such a lofty justification.
moreelse.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Tribute 6: Destroy it instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
moreelse.name: Moreelse

blindeye apothecary.flavor: After her husband died in a tragic carriage accident, she threw herself completely into her work.
blindeye apothecary.info:
Deploy (Melee): Heal an allied unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 4.
Tribute 2: Combine both Deploy abilities instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
blindeye apothecary.name: Blindeye Apothecary

horst borsodi.flavor: My auction house is, above all, a gathering place for the elite of the elite.
horst borsodi.info:
Deploy: Gain 3 Coins.
If Ewald Borsodi is in your graveyard, gain 6 Coins instead.
Fee 1: Give an allied unit Vitality 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
horst borsodi.name: Horst Borsodi

sly seductress.flavor: The sweeter her words, the more bitter your losses.
sly seductress.info:
Fee 3: Gain a Shield.
Whenever your opponent plays a unit, boost self by 1.
Bonded: Whenever your opponent plays a card, boost self by 1.
keywords: Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
sly seductress.name: Sly Seductress

ewald borsodi.flavor: I've crafted this plan for over a year, but now the time's come for action. Can I count on your help?
ewald borsodi.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
If Horst Borsodi is in your graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
Fee 1: Give an enemy unit Bleeding 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
ewald borsodi.name: Ewald Borsodi

pickpocket.flavor: My apologies, miss... Always been a clumsy one, I have.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
pickpocket.name: Pickpocket

tamara strenger.flavor: Once the heat of the Fire has set your heart aflame, it gives you strength and leads you down the path of truth for the rest of your life.
tamara strenger.info:
Deploy: Boost all allied Witch Hunters by 1.
Tribute 3: Boost all allied Witch Hunters in hand, deck and on the battlefield by 1 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
tamara strenger.name: Tamara Strenger

whoreson senior.info:
Intimidate.
Deploy: Transform an adjacent unit into a Cutup Lackey.
Tribute 3: Transform adjacent units into Cutup Lackeys instead.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
whoreson senior.name: Whoreson Senior

adriano the mink.flavor: Right here, beautiful. Have a sit on daddy's lap.
adriano the mink.info:
Profit 2.
Increase the Profit by 1 for each allied Sly Seductress.
Tribute 5: Spawn a Sly Seductress in this row.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
adriano the mink.name: Adriano the Mink

back-alley chemist.flavor: I do this for my family, always for my family!
back-alley chemist.info:
Zeal.
Order: Poison an allied unit and boost it by 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
back-alley chemist.name: Back-Alley Chemist

adalbertus kalkstein.flavor: Before Kalkstein departed this world, he left us with some rather unflattering words about our gracious king...
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
adalbertus kalkstein.name: Adalbertus Kalkstein

oxenfurt naturalist.flavor: When handling mandrake, you must always remember to don a pair of protective... Wait, where are my gloves?
oxenfurt naturalist.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Give an allied unit Vitality for 1 turn.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
oxenfurt naturalist.name: Oxenfurt Naturalist

rico meiersdorf.flavor: I never did much like bees.
rico meiersdorf.info: Whenever opponent plays a unit while Rico is in your hand or deck, set his power equal to that unit's power.
rico meiersdorf.name: Rico Meiersdorf

witch hunter executioner.flavor: It'd be a right shame if I cut any of your beautiful hair.
witch hunter executioner.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 1 turn. If it has a Bounty, damage it by 1 instead.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
witch hunter executioner.name: Witch Hunter Executioner

slander.flavor: All Novigradians have two great passions: coin and hearsay.
slander.info:
Profit 3.
Place a Bounty on an enemy unit.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
slander.name: Slander

witch hunter.flavor: Long coats, wide-brimmed hats, and crooked grins – witch hunters are hard to miss.
witch hunter.info: Deploy: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
witch hunter.name: Witch Hunter

madame luiza.flavor: We've bedded more men than all Redania's army barracks combined.
madame luiza.info:
Intimidate.
Tribute 3: Gain Zeal.
Order: Your next Tribute this round costs 0.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
madame luiza.name: Madame Luiza

fisstech.flavor: Large pupils, chattering teeth, a mad cackle... Aye, that's fisstech for ye.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
fisstech.name: Fisstech

igor the hook.flavor: In the left corner, a bloodthirsty shaelmaar, and in the right co--oh bollocks... Fight's over, hold your bets!
igor the hook.info:
Insanity.
Fee 5: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze allied unit to Igor's row.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
igor the hook.name: Igor the Hook

tinboy.flavor: Tinboy's old man labored as a metalworker. On his sober days, he smelted tin. On his drinking days, he smelted his son's face.
tinboy.info:
Deploy: Damage all units on an enemy row by 2.
Tribute 8: Damage all enemy units by 2 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
tinboy.name: Tinboy

doadrick leumaerts.flavor: The emperor has high expectations for you. See that you do not disappoint him. Hael Ker'zaer!
doadrick leumaerts.info:
Deploy: If you control an Agent, gain Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Draw a card, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
doadrick leumaerts.name: Doadrick Leumaerts

tatterwing.flavor: She seems a bit sluggish. A few quick jabs to the ribs oughta liven her up.
tatterwing.info: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit and boost self by its base power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
tatterwing.name: Tatterwing

off the books.flavor: Titles and trinkets don't interest me. I desire power, and power alone.
off the books.info:
Order: Gain 2 Coin. Charge: 3.
Your Tributes cost 1 Coin less.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
off the books.name: Off the books

dip in the pontar.flavor: The Pontar's got more bodies than fish these days.
dip in the pontar.info:
Profit 3.
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
dip in the pontar.name: Dip in the Pontar

payday.flavor: I-I already gave ye all me coin!
payday.info: Damage an enemy unit by 5. Gain a Coin for each point of excess damage dealt.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
payday.name: Payday

tidecloak hideaway.flavor: Once a terror of the high seas, it now sits idle and fat with gold, unable to leave port.
tidecloak hideaway.info: Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 1 for every Pirate in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
tidecloak hideaway.name: Tidecloak Hideaway

pugo boom-breaker.flavor: Listen, troll, I can promise you a hundred crowns if you take the fa--AAAAAAGH!!!
pugo boom-breaker.info: Deploy: Damage a random allied unit by 3. If there are no allies, damage self by 5 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
pugo boom-breaker.name: Pugo Boom-Breaker

boris.flavor: After getting a taste of human flesh, he won't eat anything else.
boris.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Gain 3 Coins.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
boris.name: Boris

sewer raiders.flavor: Built for movin' shite, but it moves coin just as well.
sewer raiders.info: Deploy, Hoard 4: Summon copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
sewer raiders.name: Sewer Raiders

wretched addict.flavor: I'd sell me own mum for a whiff. And I'd cut 'er throat for two.
wretched addict.info: Every allied turn, on turn end, if this unit is Poisoned, boost it by 2.
keywords: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
wretched addict.name: Wretched Addict

eventide plunder.flavor: Wouldn't be right to let all this rot in port. We's doin' 'em a favor, really.
eventide plunder.info: Gain 4 Coins. If your opponent controls an artifact, gain 6 Coins instead.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
eventide plunder.name: Eventide Plunder

whoreson's freak show.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 2 (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
whoreson's freak show.name: Whoreson's Freak Show

townsfolk.flavor: You see people, but I see a flock o' sheep that needs fleecin'.
townsfolk.info: Whenever you gain Coins, boost self by 1.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
townsfolk.name: Townsfolk

tidecloak ransackers.flavor: There's more wealth in Novigrad than in all of Skellige – and the number of poor saps to match.
tidecloak ransackers.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Gain 2 Coins.
Hoard 5: Trigger the Deathblow even if the enemy unit survived.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
tidecloak ransackers.name: Tidecloak Ransackers

tax collector.flavor: Just between rat catcher and latrine shoveler on this year's most desirable professions list.
tax collector.info: Ranged: Every allied turn, on turn end, gain 1 Coin.
keywords: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
tax collector.name: Tax Collector

sea jackal.flavor: You ever lift rings off a body that's been left to soak for two weeks? No? Then don't complain.
sea jackal.info:
Fee 2: Boost self by 2.
Hoard 7: Boost self by 3 instead.
keywords: Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
sea jackal.name: Sea Jackal

kikimore warrior.flavor: Come spring, the buggers start to burst through the woodwork. Literally.
kikimore warrior.info: Order: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn a Kikimore Warrior and Summon it to this row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
kikimore warrior.name: Kikimore Warrior

line of credit.flavor: Illiterate, ye say? A moment, if ye could. I'll draw us up another agreement...
line of credit.info: Destroy an allied unit or artifact, then gain 7 Coins.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
line of credit.name: Line of Credit

fence.info:
Deploy (Ranged): Gain Vitality for a duration equal to your Coin count.
Tribute 3: Boost self by your Coin count instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
fence.name: Fence

fisstech trafficker.flavor: Addictive? Why, not at all! I've quit several times before!
fisstech trafficker.info: Deploy: Give Poison to a unit. If it's an ally, gain 3 Coins.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
fisstech trafficker.name: Fisstech Trafficker

hvitr and aelydia.info:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. 
Hoard 5: Damage an enemy unit by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
hvitr and aelydia.name: Hvitr and Aelydia

congregate.flavor: Hierarch of the Eternal Fire, enthusiast of the arena, glutton of feasts, and luster of whores.
congregate.info:
Order: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on an allied row and gain 1 Coin. Charge: 3.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
congregate.name: Congregate

prophet lebioda.flavor: To thine own self be judge and ruler for thou alone shalt answer for thine deeds before thee.
prophet lebioda.info: Whenever you play a unit next to Prophet Lebioda, give it a Shield.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
prophet lebioda.name: Prophet Lebioda

sacred flame.flavor: Do you feel it? I sense something else beyond its warmth, something more...
sacred flame.info:
Deploy: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on both sides of this card.
Order: Boost all allied Firesworn units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
sacred flame.name: Sacred Flame

grand inquisitor helveed.flavor: No sinful wretch shall escape his fate in the Fire. Of that, I will make sure.
grand inquisitor helveed.info:
Profit 4.
Fee 2: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot in this row.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
grand inquisitor helveed.name: Grand Inquisitor Helveed

arena endrega.flavor: Strong as an ox, dumb as a box.
arena endrega.info:
Insanity.
Fee 1: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
arena endrega.name: Arena Endrega

damnation.flavor: I can't bloody breathe! Won't they burn the wretches someplace else?
damnation.info:
Damage 3 enemy units by 2.
Deathblow: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on the opposite row, for each destroyed enemy.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
damnation.name: Damnation

nathaniel pastodi.flavor: Novigrad – where the impossible becomes possible. A professional torturer turned reverend, for instance.
nathaniel pastodi.info: Whenever Nathaniel receives a boost, give Bleeding to a random enemy unit for 2 turns.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
nathaniel pastodi.name: Nathaniel Pastodi

procession of penance.flavor: Careful not to stand too close. Got blood splattered on me favorite tunic last time.
procession of penance.info: Deploy: Damage self by 10. Reduce the damage by 2 for every Firesworn Token you control.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
procession of penance.name: Procession of Penance

sukrus.flavor: One of many who sought fortune in Novigrad. And one of many more who never found it.
sukrus.info: Prevent the unit to the left of Sukrus from taking any damage.
sukrus.name: Sukrus

excommunication.flavor: Aye, better than the pyre, I suppose... But did ye hear the disappointment in his voice? Now that's real sufferin'.
excommunication.info:
Banish an allied unit, then play the top card from your deck.
If the target was a Firesworn, look at the top 3 cards from your deck and play 1 of them instead.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
excommunication.name: Excommunication

arena ghoul.flavor: He'll be a perfect fit for your arena. Just like a mutt lickin' your plate after dinner.
arena ghoul.info:
Deploy: On turn end, destroy self.
Tribute 1: Cancel the Deploy ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
arena ghoul.name: Arena Ghoul

tavern brawl.flavor: About time we had some entertainment! My knuckles are itchin'!
tavern brawl.info: Force an enemy unit to Duel an adjacent unit.
keywords: Duel: Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.
tavern brawl.name: Tavern Brawl

firesworn zealot.flavor: Great is my faith, and great is my ire!
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
firesworn zealot.name: Firesworn Zealot

wheel of fortune.flavor: A game where good aim is considered subjective.
wheel of fortune.info: Damage an enemy unit by a random amount between 1 and 10.
wheel of fortune.name: Wheel of Fortune

bincy blumerholdt.flavor: In all Novigrad, she has the hairiest feet and the stickiest hands.
bincy blumerholdt.info: Ranged: Whenever you gain Coins, boost self by 1 for each Coin gained.
keywords: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
bincy blumerholdt.name: Bincy Blumerholdt

eternal fire priest.flavor: Closer, my sheep, gather closer. May the Eternal Fire warm your souls!
eternal fire priest.info: Whenever you Spawn one or more units to the battlefield, boost self by 1.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
eternal fire priest.name: Eternal Fire Priest

cutup lackey.flavor: The boss always gets to have the most fun. Truth be told, I prefer to watch anyway.
cutup lackey.info:
Whenever you play a Crime card, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
Bonded: Increase the damage by 1.
keywords: Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
cutup lackey.name: Cutup Lackey

hammond.flavor: Once mistaken for a whale calf and nearly harpooned. He's avoided swimming ever since.
hammond.info:
Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row and give it Bleeding (2).
Increase Bleeding by 1 for each adjacent Pirate.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
hammond.name: Hammond

eternal fire inquisitor.flavor: The burning light of the Eternal Fire reveals all!
eternal fire inquisitor.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
eternal fire inquisitor.name: Eternal Fire Inquisitor

eternal fire disciple.flavor: Look into your hearts, dear brethen. Does a contempt for injustice not burn within it?
eternal fire disciple.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 2: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot in this row.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
eternal fire disciple.name: Eternal Fire Disciple

the flying redanian.flavor: Legend tells of a Redanian crew from generations past who unearthed a treasure so great they became forever destined to argue amongst themselves on how to divide their spoils.
the flying redanian.info: Hoard 9: On turn end, Summon this unit from your deck or graveyard to a random allied row.
keywords: Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
the flying redanian.name: The Flying Redanian

casino bouncers.flavor: Junior said our nasty mugs was frightenin' off all the coin. Don't rightly see 'ow this helps any...
casino bouncers.info:
Insanity.
Fee 1: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
casino bouncers.name: Casino Bouncers

keeper of the flame.flavor: The flame shall forever burn, for evil shall forever corrupt!
keeper of the flame.info:
Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 1.
Tribute 4: Boost all units in this row by 1 instead.
Decrease this card's Tribute cost by 1 for every allied Cleric.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
keeper of the flame.name: Keeper of the Flame

imke.flavor: No sooner had she caught Gudrun's attention than sought to exploit it.
imke.info:
Ranged: Every allied turn, on turn end, gain 2 Coins.
Fee 3: Gain a Shield.
keywords: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
imke.name: Imke

bloody good fun.flavor: What do ye mean, Why? The game was beginnin' to drag!
bloody good fun.info:
Profit 4.
Spend all your Coins and damage an enemy by the same amount.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
bloody good fun.name: Bloody Good Fun

temple guard.flavor: Halt! Who goes there?! Firesworn or heretic?
temple guard.info: Deploy (Melee): Boost 3 adjacent allied units by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
temple guard.name: Temple Guard

jackpot.flavor: Any hopes that a woman's presence might soften the city's underbelly proved misguided. Horribly, woefully misguided.
jackpot.info:
Order: Gain 9 Coins, then boost an allied unit by any excess amount gained.
Whenever an allied unit gives you Coins, boost it by any excess amount gained.

This ability adds 13 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
jackpot.name: Jackpot

congregation.flavor: Our church is not this temple, not our scripture. It is our people, our community, we who have faith.
congregation.info:
Spawn 2 Firesworn Zealots in an allied row.
If a Firesworn unit is in that row, Spawn 3 Firesworn Zealots instead.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
congregation.name: Congregation

halfling safecracker.flavor: With ears sharp as his, he could've been a musician. Alas, one cannot get rich as quickly from applause.
halfling safecracker.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Crime in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
halfling safecracker.name: Halfling Safecracker

firesworn scribe.flavor: Wouldn't disturb him if I were you. Those quills are bloody sharp.
firesworn scribe.info:
Ranged: Whenever you Spawn one or more units to the battlefield, gain 1 Coin.
Tribute 2: Boost self by 2.
keywords: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
firesworn scribe.name: Firesworn Scribe

bare-knuckle brawler.flavor: Is tha' all that's left of 'im?\nThink I'm goin' tae boak...
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
bare-knuckle brawler.name: Bare-Knuckle Brawler

shakedown.flavor: Nae need to be stingy, pal. There's plenty to go 'round.
shakedown.info:
Profit 3.
Boost an allied unit by 3.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
shakedown.name: Shakedown

coerced blacksmith.flavor: Do ye prefer a full coin purse or a full set of fingers?
coerced blacksmith.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Boost an allied unit by 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
coerced blacksmith.name: Coerced Blacksmith

swindle.flavor: There are a hundred ways to fleece a sheep. And Cleaver's crew knew them all.
swindle.info:
Profit 4 - 6.
For each allied Crownsplitters, increase the minimal amount by 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
swindle.name: Swindle

cleaver's muscle.flavor: Those who try to cheat Cleaver are in for a rude awakening... And a rough landing.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
cleaver's muscle.name: Cleaver's Muscle

crownsplitter thug.flavor: Frilly frock or Mahakam steel breastplate – wouldn't have mattered.
crownsplitter thug.info:
Intimidate.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
crownsplitter thug.name: Crownsplitter Thug

harald gord.flavor: The last occasion Harald's grim countenance betrayed a smile was in 1211 when Brouver Hoog drunkenly ate five bowls of goat and cabbage stew then promptly shat his trousers.
harald gord.info:
Deploy: Boost self by {B.P.BB_GordSpecialsPlayed+Boost}.
Increase the boost by 1 for every special card you played this game. Boost cannot exceed 12.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
harald gord.name: Harald Gord

novigradian justice.flavor: With both arms tied behind me back, recall ye said. So feel free to start kickin' me in the arse when the mood strikes ye.
novigradian justice.info:
Play a bronze Dwarf or Crownsplitter unit from your deck.
If you already control a Dwarf or Crownsplitter, also Spawn a Cleaver's Muscle on the allied Melee row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
novigradian justice.name: Novigradian Justice

sir skewertooth.flavor: Here he is! My knight in swining armor!
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
sir skewertooth.name: Sir Skewertooth

tunnel drill.flavor: Though originally designed for mining excavations under Mount Carbon, the machine struck more gold under the streets of Novigrad.
tunnel drill.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 2: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
If you played a Crime this turn, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
tunnel drill.name: Tunnel Drill

caesar bilzen.flavor: Avid angler, meticulous collector, and a real piece of work.
caesar bilzen.info:
Deploy: Trigger the Profit abilities of adjacent units.
Fee 2: Boost an allied unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
caesar bilzen.name: Caesar Bilzen

the sausage maker.flavor: Body disposal and sausage makin', that's what I do. And judgin' by that expression, I'd say ye already ken th' answer to your follow-up question.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
the sausage maker.name: The Sausage Maker

ferko the sculptor.flavor: Some call it base thuggery. But me, I consider it the highest art form.
ferko the sculptor.info: Deploy (Melee): Play a Crime from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
ferko the sculptor.name: Ferko the Sculptor

pirate's cove.flavor: Me hogs willnae go hungry th' day thanks to ye.
pirate's cove.info:
Order: Spawn a Sea Jackal on an allied row.
Charges: 2.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
pirate's cove.name: Pirate's Cove

walter veritas.flavor: In a city that feeds on lies, truth can be a weapon.
walter veritas.info: Deploy: Create and play a bronze Syndicate card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
walter veritas.name: Walter Veritas

geralt: axii.flavor: Placing his left arm around the horse's neck, Geralt makes the Axii sign with the fingers of his right hand above the steed's head and whispers the incantation.
geralt: axii.info: Deploy: Purify a unit and reset its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
geralt: axii.name: Geralt: Axii

knickers.flavor: Leave it alone, Knickers! Damn it, leave it alone!
knickers.info: This unit may raid the battlefield to aid you in battle.
knickers.name: Knickers

olgierd: immortal.flavor: All of my dreams have come true. Unfortunately.
olgierd: immortal.info: This card's power cannot be changed by other cards or abilities.
olgierd: immortal.name: Olgierd: Immortal

iris: shade.flavor: Olgierd's betrothed was like a dream…
iris: shade.info: Deploy: Remove a unit's Armor and boost self by that amount.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
iris: shade.name: Iris: Shade

gascon: iron falcon.flavor: I'm doing what I used to do and they're paying me for it!
gascon: iron falcon.info: Deploy: Create and play a bronze Bandit card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
gascon: iron falcon.name: Gascon: Iron Falcon

one-eyed betsy.flavor: Maybe it lacks depth perception, but it sure packs a wallop.
one-eyed betsy.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 4. If it has Armor, damage it by 6 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
one-eyed betsy.name: One-Eyed Betsy

vlodimir von everec.flavor: Vlodimir liked to have a good time when he was alive and greatly missed having fun after his death.
vlodimir von everec.info: Deploy: Swap a unit's power with Armor.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
vlodimir von everec.name: Vlodimir von Everec

free company.flavor: It's because we're free to do whatever we want! Ha, ha, ha!
free company.info: Deploy: Boost all allied Bandits by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
free company.name: Free Company

living armor.flavor: Sure it's expensive. But considering how much you'll save on room and board, you'll get a return on the investment by the end of this century!
living armor.info: This unit's power is always equal to its Armor.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
living armor.name: Living Armor

armory.flavor: Guisarmes? Maces? Spiked Maces? I have everything you could possibly need.
armory.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 6.
Order: Give 3 Armor to an allied unit.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
armory.name: Armory

surrender.flavor: There's no shame in waving the white flag.
surrender.info: Remove 2 Armor from all units in a row and damage them by 2.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
surrender.name: Surrender

wagenburg.flavor: Dh'oine can turn anything into a weapon. Even a simple wagon…
wagenburg.info: Barricade: At the end of your turn, give 1 Armor to adjacent units.
keywords: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
wagenburg.name: Wagenburg

iron falcon knife juggler.flavor: The weapon's short, but its range is long.
iron falcon knife juggler.info: Deploy: Give 2 random enemy units Bleeding for 2 turns.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
iron falcon knife juggler.name: Iron Falcon Knife Juggler

iron falcon infantry.flavor: You have to look good on the battlefield too.
iron falcon infantry.info: Barricade: At the end of every allied turn, boost self by 1.
keywords: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
iron falcon infantry.name: Iron Falcon Infantry

iron falcon troubadour.flavor: When I play even dying's more pleasant.
iron falcon troubadour.info: Deploy: Give 2 Armor to a unit in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
iron falcon troubadour.name: Iron Falcon Troubadour

piercing missile.flavor: There's no armor that can't be pierced.
piercing missile.info: Damage an enemy unit by 4, ignoring its Armor.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
piercing missile.name: Piercing Missile

wagon.flavor: The driver swore he was carrying seeds. But seeds don't clank on bumps in the road…
wagon.info:
Deploy: If you control a Bandit, gain Zeal.
Order: Give an allied unit 3 Armor.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
wagon.name: Wagon

mantlet.flavor: Something like the bastard child of a shield and a palisade.
mantlet.info:
Melee: Whenever you play a unit, give it 1 Armor.
Barricade: Give it 2 Armor instead.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
mantlet.name: Mantlet

sapper.flavor: Aim wherever you want. The shrapnel will take care of it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
sapper.name: Sapper

highwaymen.flavor: We'll torture the merchant and sell the horses.
highwaymen.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. If it has Armor, damage it by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
highwaymen.name: Highwaymen

armorer's workshop.flavor: He'll make a helm out of a pot if need be.
armorer's workshop.info: Boost 3 adjacent units by 2 and give them 2 Armor.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
armorer's workshop.name: Armorer's Workshop

philippa: blind fury.flavor: Philippa Eilhart, though very attractive, was decidedly very unkind.
philippa: blind fury.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 4, then damage random enemy units by 3,2,1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
philippa: blind fury.name: Philippa: Blind Fury

donimir of troy.flavor: I fought twice at Sodden and lived. I think you can surmise I'm not so bad at this sword thing.
keywords: Defender: Status that prevents the opponent from targeting other cards in this row.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
donimir of troy.name: Donimir of Troy

voymir.flavor: Quietly, on tiptoes, no noise, no fuss. Through the back alleys. In Loxia and the port keep your mouth shut! Go!
voymir.info: Deploy: Boost an allied unit and all its copies by 1 and give them 1 Armor.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
voymir.name: Voymir

mad charge.flavor: You can't stop a galloping cavalry horse. So if things go bad, the only thing to do is to lower your lance, close your eyes and pray to the gods.
mad charge.info:
Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it 2 Armor.
If you control a Knight, also give it Vitality for 3 turns.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
mad charge.name: Mad Charge

radovid's royal guards.flavor: They'll do anything for their king. They know what he'll do to them if they refuse.
radovid's royal guards.info:
Formation.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2.
Inspired: Give it 2 Armor.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
radovid's royal guards.name: Radovid's Royal Guards

redanian archer.flavor: The last thing you'll hear is the twang of the bowstring being let go.
redanian archer.info:
Zeal.
Order (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 1. Charge: 1.
Barricade: At the end of every allied turn, gain 1 Charge.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
redanian archer.name: Redanian Archer

azar javed.flavor: Azar Javed's specialty is the element of fire. The sorcerer not only deftly manipulates the power of fire, it can be said that fire has become a part of his very being.
azar javed.info:
Profit 3.
Deploy: Spawn a Scarab in this row.
Tribute 3: Spawn 2 Scarabs in this row instead.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
azar javed.name: Azar Javed

professor.flavor: I fear our conventicle may end disastrously for you.
professor.info:
Deploy: Put a Bounty on an enemy unit and damage it by 4.
Tribute 3: Ignore a target's Armor.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
professor.name: Professor

savolla.flavor: Witcher mutagens are a forgotten treasure. It's time the world learned of their potential.
savolla.info:
Profit 2.
Tribute 9: Spawn a Savolla's Frightener in this row.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
savolla.name: Savolla

dire mutated hound.flavor: We couldn't decide what to name him and it just kind of came up…
dire mutated hound.info:
Barricade: At the end of every allied turn, boost self by 2.
Fee 4: Gain 1 Armor.
keywords: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
dire mutated hound.name: Dire Mutated Hound

mutated hounds.flavor: Out of man's best friend we made his worst enemy.
mutated hounds.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns.
Deploy (Ranged): Poison a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
mutated hounds.name: Mutated Hounds

assault.flavor: Human life is fragile. Especially in Novigrad.
assault.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 4.
If you control 2 Salamandra units deal 6 damage instead.
assault.name: Assault

salamandra assassin.flavor: A name and bag full of gold. That's all I need.
salamandra assassin.info:
Intimidate.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
salamandra assassin.name: Salamandra Assassin

mutant killer.flavor: You have to keep him on a leash, muzzled and with blinders on, otherwise it'll be trouble.
mutant killer.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Hoard 4: Damage an enemy by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
mutant killer.name: Mutant Killer

mutant.flavor: With the right tools you can shape the human body like wet clay.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
mutant.name: Mutant

kikimore queen.flavor: Many insectoids live in a matriarchy. A bloody one at that.
kikimore queen.info:
Thrive.
Whenever this unit's Thrive is triggered, boost all allied Insectoids in this row by 1.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
kikimore queen.name: Kikimore Queen

cave troll.flavor: Trolls have very tiny brains and huge stomachs. That's a very dangerous combination.
keywords: Defender: Status that prevents the opponent from targeting other cards in this row.
cave troll.name: Cave Troll

yghern.flavor: Its other name is scolopendromorph. Rarely used, as it's hard to say without spitting all over oneself.
yghern.info:
Deploy: Gain Armor equal to the number of cards in your hand.
If this unit has no Armor, destroy self.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
yghern.name: Yghern

endrega queen.flavor: The Endrega Queen can be easily recognized by the specific coloring of its abdomen. Or, more easily, by its monstrous size
endrega queen.info:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit and gain its Armor.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, damage self by 1, then Spawn a Drone in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
endrega queen.name: Endrega Queen

armored arachas.flavor: It can cut half-inch thick metal like a tailor cutting silk.
armored arachas.info: Deploy: Apply Bleeding to an enemy unit equal to its base power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
armored arachas.name: Armored Arachas

endrega larva.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
endrega larva.name: Endrega Larva

endrega warrior.flavor: Where I come from no one was afraid of the Big Bad Wolf or Baba Yaga. Instead, we had an Endrega nest in the shrubs beyond the village.
endrega warrior.info: Deploy: Consume adjacent units. Spawn a Drone in this row for each Insectoid consumed.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
endrega warrior.name: Endrega Warrior

natural selection.flavor: The strongest will survive. So not you.
natural selection.info: Damage an enemy unit by 4, then Spawn a Drone in a random allied row for each point of excess damage dealt.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
natural selection.name: Natural Selection

kikimore worker.flavor: They say it can eat a whole man in armor down to the bone in less than a minute. I'd rather not find out if it's true.
kikimore worker.info:
Melee: Whenever you play an Insectoid, gain 1 Armor.
Exposed: Destroy self.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
kikimore worker.name: Kikimore Worker

endrega eggs.flavor: If you find some it's best to burn the entire forest down. Then run as far away as you can.
endrega eggs.info: Deathwish: Spawn 3 Drones in this row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
endrega eggs.name: Endrega Eggs

affan hillergrand.flavor: Jarre doesn't mention him in his books. Maybe he never heard of him. Maybe he heard too much.
affan hillergrand.info: When moved to the top of your deck, Summon this unit to your Melee row.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
affan hillergrand.name: Affan Hillergrand

ramon tyrconnel.flavor: Colonel Ramon Tyrconnel, the young commander of the Ard Feainn division, whistled softly, staring at a point somewhere off in the distance…
ramon tyrconnel.info: Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze Soldier from your hand and give it 2 Armor.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
ramon tyrconnel.name: Ramon Tyrconnel
