war council.flavor: Nilfgaardians fight every battle twice: first on the map, then in reality.
war council.info: Look at the first 3 cards on the top of your deck and play one of them.
war council.name: War Council

ffion var gaernel.flavor: Everyone will die somehow. I'll die last.
ffion var gaernel.info:
Defender.
Deploy: Spawn and play Battle Preparation.
keywords: Defender: Status that prevents the opponent from targeting other cards in this row.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
ffion var gaernel.name: Ffion var Gaernel

glynnis aep loernach.flavor: She loved every soldier like a son. She cried for each one.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
glynnis aep loernach.name: Glynnis aep Loernach

ard feainn crossbowman.flavor: Many thought that mounted crossbowmen wouldn't work. Until they saw them in action.
ard feainn crossbowman.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Barricade: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 whenever you play a Soldier.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
ard feainn crossbowman.name: Ard Feainn Crossbowman

ard feainn tortoise.flavor: Close formation, clench your sphincters! Left, right, left, steady!
ard feainn tortoise.info: Exposed: Boost an enemy unit with the most power by 3.
keywords: Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
ard feainn tortoise.name: Ard Feainn Tortoise

ard feainn light cavalry.info: Deploy: Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If the target has Armor, damage it by 2 again.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
ard feainn light cavalry.name: Ard Feainn Light Cavalry

ard feainn heavy cavalry.flavor: When Emhyr declared that his cavalry would stomp his enemies into the mud, we thought he was speaking metaphorically. We were wrong.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
ard feainn heavy cavalry.name: Ard Feainn Heavy Cavalry

battle preparation.flavor: Many a knight met an untimely death because of his shoddily tied breastplate coming undone.
battle preparation.info:
Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it 2 Armor.
If it's a Soldier, boost it by 6 and give it 2 Armor instead.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
battle preparation.name: Battle Preparation

dracoturtle.flavor: Oxenfurt monstrologists claim the brain of a dracoturtle is the size of a peanut. Its maw, however, is the size of a wide-open gate.
dracoturtle.info:
Whenever this unit loses Armor, boost it by the amount of Armor lost.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Armor.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
dracoturtle.name: Dracoturtle

covenant of steel.flavor: If you want to give Skelligers a laugh, tell them they're outnumbered.
covenant of steel.info:
Defender.
Berserk 6: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Armor.
keywords: Defender: Status that prevents the opponent from targeting other cards in this row.
Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
covenant of steel.name: Covenant of Steel

morkvarg: heart of terror.flavor: He showed no mercy, didn't respect our laws or our gods. He knew how it must end. And it still didn't stop him.
morkvarg: heart of terror.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Repeat until target is damaged.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
morkvarg: heart of terror.name: Morkvarg: Heart of Terror

raiding fleet.flavor: The rocky Skellige lands, battered by cold winds, give life only to nettles and moss. But the islanders know that there is fertile soil on the other side of the sea…
raiding fleet.info: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 4 turns, then play a random bronze ship from your deck.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
raiding fleet.name: Raiding Fleet

terror of the seas.flavor: All it takes is a small hole for the largest ship to sink.
terror of the seas.info:
Zeal.
Order: Lose all Armor and damage an enemy unit by that amount.
Whenever you play a Pirate gain 1 Armor.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
terror of the seas.name: Terror of the Seas

armored drakkar.flavor: You can't take it upriver… but you can certainly take it to chase the imperial fleet.
armored drakkar.info:
At the end of your turn, if Armored Drakkar has no Armor, gain 2 Armor.
Exposed: Boost self by 1.
Bloodthirst 2: Boost self by 2 instead.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
armored drakkar.name: Armored Drakkar

terror crew plunderer.flavor: They say diamonds are a girl's best friend. But my best friend is a knife. I can use it to get anything else I want.
terror crew plunderer.info:
Deploy: Damage a unit by 2.
If it's an ally, boost self by 4.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
terror crew plunderer.name: Terror Crew Plunderer

boatbuilders.flavor: There's no more respected profession on the islands than boat building. The worst cutthroats bow and ask how things are going…
boatbuilders.info:
Deploy: Give 2 Armor to an allied unit. If you control a Ship gain Zeal.
Order: Give 1 Armor to an allied unit.
Cooldown: 1
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
boatbuilders.name: Boatbuilders

terror crew axe-wielder.flavor: But dear Skelligers, what use do you have for axes? There are no trees in the sea…
terror crew axe-wielder.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Exposed: Damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
terror crew axe-wielder.name: Terror Crew Axe-wielder

stunning blow.flavor: It clanged like hitting a bell. The Redanian fell to the ground unconscious, dark blood gushing from underneath the dented metal…
stunning blow.info: Damage a unit by 5. If it has Armor, increase damage to 6.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
stunning blow.name: Stunning Blow

zoltan: warrior.flavor: I've decided to do tangible good, that is not wasted. I am good to myself and my immediate surroundings.
zoltan: warrior.info:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn 2 Rowdy Dwarves in this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied Rowdy Dwarves by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
zoltan: warrior.name: Zoltan: Warrior

percival schuttenbach.flavor: Underneath the wet hood, instead of a billowy beard, was a long, pointed nose, clearly marking its owner as a member of the old and noble race of gnomes.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
percival schuttenbach.name: Percival Schuttenbach

munro bruys.flavor: Munro dreamed of building steam and water-powered hammerworks. But he ended up as bouncer at the worst bar in Vizima…
munro bruys.info:
Zeal.
Order: Transform 1 allied Rowdy Dwarf into a Dwarf Berserker.
Charges: 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
munro bruys.name: Munro Bruys

figgis merluzzo.flavor: I'm a simple guy. I like drinking, eating, singing lewd songs… And when the party dies down, pissing on the dying bonfire.
figgis merluzzo.info:
Defender.
Deploy: Spawn Rowdy Dwarf in this row.
keywords: Defender: Status that prevents the opponent from targeting other cards in this row.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
figgis merluzzo.name: Figgis Merluzzo

zoltan's company.flavor: They'd follow each other into the fire. And laugh about it.
zoltan's company.info:
Spawn 3 Rowdy Dwarves on an allied row. 
If you control Zoltan, give 1 Armor to all Dwarves on that row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
zoltan's company.name: Zoltan's Company

dwarven chariot.flavor: You can draw anything you like, my dear dwarves. But you can't build it, mark my words.
dwarven chariot.info:
Deploy: Spawn a Rowdy Dwarf on this row.
Order: Give an allied unit 1 Armor.
Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
dwarven chariot.name: Dwarven Chariot

tempering.flavor: Dwarven steel is very tough. Almost as tough as the dwarves themselves.
tempering.info: Boost an ally by 5. If it's a Dwarf, also give it 2 Armor.
keywords: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
tempering.name: Tempering

miner.flavor: Which moron's whistling in the mine?!
miner.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2.
If it's a Dwarf, also give it 2 Armor.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
miner.name: Miner

dryad enchantress.flavor: The dryads used to stay on the sidelines, avoiding the conflict between the races. But times change…
dryad enchantress.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give an allied unit 3 Armor.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality (3).
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
dryad enchantress.name: Dryad Enchantress

dwarf berserker.flavor: I know I'm going to die. So I'm making sure I'll have company.
dwarf berserker.info: Barricade: At the end of your turn, damage self by 1 then damage a random enemy unit by 1.
keywords: Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
dwarf berserker.name: Dwarf Berserker

rowdy dwarf.flavor: Blech! What is this! That's piss, not beer!
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
rowdy dwarf.name: Rowdy Dwarf

radeyah.flavor: You can hide a lot behind a beautiful smile.
radeyah.info:
If your starting deck has no duplicates,
Deploy (Melee): Spawn your faction stratagem in this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Create Neutral stratagem in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
radeyah.name: Radeyah

maraal.flavor: I know how to kill in a thousand and one ways.
maraal.info:
Deploy: Poison an enemy unit.
Order (Melee): Poison an enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
maraal.name: Maraal

matta hu'uri.flavor: Sorceresses use magic to hypnotize. I use dance.
matta hu'uri.info: Deploy (Ranged): If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, they draw the lowest-cost card, and you draw the highest-cost card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
matta hu'uri.name: Matta Hu'uri

dulla kh'amanni.flavor: To know the world is to praise god's name.
dulla kh'amanni.info: Deploy: If you control Runewright, Spawn Desert Treasure in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
dulla kh'amanni.name: Dulla kh'Amanni

runewright.flavor: Great power lies in words. But it's not easy to enchant it into steel.
runewright.info: Deploy: If you control Dulla kh'Amanni, Spawn Desert Treasure in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
runewright.name: Runewright

saer qu'an.flavor: Every tiger is dangerous. Especially one that has taken a liking to human flesh…
saer qu'an.info: After 2 of your turns, boost self by 10 at the end of the turn.
saer qu'an.name: Saer Qu'an

caravan vanguard.flavor: It's not easy to find one's way among the shifting dunes…
caravan vanguard.info:
Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 3.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a base copy of self in this row.
Bonded: Use both abilities.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
caravan vanguard.name: Caravan Vanguard

caravan guard.flavor: There's a lot of ways you can die in the desert. Not just from thirst.
caravan guard.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for each 3 power the target has.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
caravan guard.name: Caravan Guard

king cobra.flavor: As long as I play it'll dance. But when I stop…
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
king cobra.name: King Cobra

ofiri merchant.flavor: I have that which you desire. As well as that which you have never seen before…
ofiri merchant.info: Deploy: Swap the top card of your opponent's deck with yours.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
ofiri merchant.name: Ofiri Merchant

basilisk venom.flavor: People think a basilisk kills with its eyes, but it's the colorless fumes from its venom that cause death…
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
basilisk venom.name: Basilisk Venom

crystal skull.info: Order: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Veil.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
crystal skull.name: Crystal Skull

enchanted armor.flavor: Lean in, listen closely, and you'll hear a whisper…
enchanted armor.info: Order: Boost a unit in your hand by 3 and give it 2 Armor.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
enchanted armor.name: Enchanted Armor

cursed scroll.flavor: The seal states clearly: do not open. But of course… curiosity will win out.
cursed scroll.info: Order: Draw a card of your choice, then put a card from your hand at the bottom of your deck.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
cursed scroll.name: Cursed Scroll

ceremonial dagger.flavor: Decorated like a prince's coronet. Sharp like a butcher's knife.
ceremonial dagger.info: Order: Damage an enemy unit by 3 and give it Bleeding (2).
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
ceremonial dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger

magic lamp.flavor: It's a little tarnished. A little rubbing will make it shiny again.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
magic lamp.name: Magic Lamp

engineering solution.info: Order: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Shield.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
engineering solution.name: Engineering Solution

war elephant.flavor: It's kind of like a fiend, but bald and with a nose that hangs to the ground. What? No, you're making things up!
war elephant.info:
Order: Damage adjacent units by 4, then boost self by 4 for each unit damaged.
Crew: Boost self by 8 instead.
Cooldown: 6
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
war elephant.name: War Elephant

siege.flavor: There's no fortress that can't be taken. There are just fortresses not worth taking.
siege.info:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Siege Engine.
Prologue: Spawn a reinforced Trebuchet on your Ranged row.
Chapter 1: Spawn a Battering Ram on your Ranged row.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Bombardment.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
siege.name: Siege

war chariot.flavor: The chariot drove into the crowd and its enemies fell to the ground like wheat before the scythe…
war chariot.info:
Zeal.
Order (Melee): Give Bleeding for 4 turns to an enemy unit.
Order (Ranged): Move an enemy unit to the other row.
Crew: Combine both Order abilities.
Cooldown: 3.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
war chariot.name: War Chariot

immortals.flavor: Where one falls, another will take his place.
immortals.info:
Shield.
Melee: Whenever this unit loses its Shield, boost it by 2.
At the end of your turn, gain Shield.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
immortals.name: Immortals

siege ladder.flavor: What?! Now you tell me you're afraid of heights?!
siege ladder.info:
Deploy: Move an allied unit to other row.
Crew: Boost it by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
siege ladder.name: Siege Ladder

immortal cavalry.flavor: Maybe camels aren't as swift as horses… but at least they don't die after two days in the desert.
immortal cavalry.info:
Shield.
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit in this row.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
immortal cavalry.name: Immortal Cavalry

carroballista.info:
Deploy, Crew: Gain 2 Armor.
Order (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Cooldown: 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
carroballista.name: Carroballista

boiling oil.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 5.
Deathblow: Purify adjacent units.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
boiling oil.name: Boiling Oil

mask of uroboros.flavor: Time doesn't flow, it goes in circles. The past becomes the future, grandfathers repeat the mistakes of their grandsons.
mask of uroboros.info: Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card and Spawn 2 Crows in your Melee row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
mask of uroboros.name: Mask of Uroboros

gedyneith.flavor: Rulers are crowned in its shadow. Traitors are hanged on its branches.
gedyneith.info:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Druid.
Prologue: Spawn a Crow Clan Preacher on this row.
Chapter 1: Spawn and play Crow's-eye Rhizome.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Mardroeme.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
gedyneith.name: Gedyneith

crowmother.flavor: Some crows learn human words. And some humans learn the language of the crows.
crowmother.info:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Crows in this row.
Whenever you play an Alchemy card, Summon Crowmother from your graveyard to a random allied row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
crowmother.name: Crowmother

gigascorpion decoction.flavor: How much of a dose would be lethal? Any.
gigascorpion decoction.info: Damage a unit by 1 six times.
gigascorpion decoction.name: Gigascorpion Decoction

axel three-eyes.flavor: Though his words contain much wisdom, it is easily drowned out by its madness.
axel three-eyes.info:
Deploy (Melee): Spawn a Crow in this row.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by 1 for each allied Beast.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
axel three-eyes.name: Axel Three-Eyes

crow clan druid.flavor: Wise men claim that animals are mindless automatons. Wise men don't know what they're talking about.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
crow clan druid.name: Crow Clan Druid

crow clan preacher.flavor: A lot of learning awaits you. And a lot of mistakes.
crow clan preacher.info:
Whenever you play an Alchemy card, boost self by 1.
Bonded: Boost self by 2 instead.
keywords: Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
crow clan preacher.name: Crow Clan Preacher

crow's-eye rhizome.flavor: Fatally poisonous. Unless you know how to prepare it…
crow's-eye rhizome.info: Spawn 2 Crows in allied row. If you control a Druid, Spawn 3 Crows instead.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
crow's-eye rhizome.name: Crow's-eye Rhizome

crow messenger.flavor: The Crowmother has a thousand eyes and each one is closely watching.
crow messenger.info:
Deploy: Summon all copies of this unit from your graveyard to this row.
If you hold an Alchemy card, also Summon all copies from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
crow messenger.name: Crow Messenger

urn of shadows.flavor: Everyone carries some darkness in them. Some have learned to bend it to their will…
urn of shadows.info: Order: Trigger Deathwish of an allied unit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
urn of shadows.name: Urn of Shadows

plague maiden.flavor: To bring down humanity, she will awaken her rats and send them to die in the happy city.
plague maiden.info: Deathwish: Spawn 7 Rats in this row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
plague maiden.name: Plague Maiden

penitent.flavor: The places this monster haunts are quickly covered by fog and darkness. Those that get lost in it usually don't return to the living.
penitent.info:
Thrive.
Deathwish: Summon a random 7-cost unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
penitent.name: Penitent

the beast.flavor: The Beast didn't come from nowhere. You all summoned it. With your lust, your greed and your cruelty.
the beast.info: At the end of your turn, if this unit is not the unit with the highest power on the battlefield, boost it by 2.
the beast.name: The Beast

haunt.flavor: If you don't finish your oatmeal, a Haunt will come and eat you!
haunt.info:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a unit with Deathwish.
Prologue: Spawn a Desert Banshee in this row.
Chapter 1: Spawn and play Barghest.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Nightwraith.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
haunt.name: Haunt

barghest.flavor: Some claim they're the vanguard of the Wild Hunt. Others that they're vengeance incarnate. Everyone agrees that barghests have no mercy for the living.
barghest.info:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
Order, Dominance: Consume an allied unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
barghest.name: Barghest

desert banshee.flavor: You're worried you'll die of thirst in the sands? Relax. You won't make it that long.
desert banshee.info:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Whenever you play a unit with the Deathwish ability, boost self by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
desert banshee.name: Desert Banshee

noonwraith.flavor: Contrary to popular belief, farmers don't stop work in the middle of the day to hide from the heat - they hide from the Noonwraith.
noonwraith.info: Deathwish: Spawn 2 Rats in a random enemy row.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
noonwraith.name: Noonwraith

nightwraith.flavor: How much damage can a pale, emaciated woman, entangled in a ripped dress, do? A lot, it turns out.
nightwraith.info:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Rats in this row.
Deathwish: Spawn 2 Rats in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
nightwraith.name: Nightwraith

aen seidhe sabre.flavor: When this blade cuts through the air, you don't hear a swish, you hear music…
aen seidhe sabre.info: Order: Spawn and play Scoia'tael Neophyte.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
aen seidhe sabre.name: Aen Seidhe Sabre

etriel.flavor: People tame wild animals. I talk to them.
etriel.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
If you control Muirlega, damage it by 7 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
etriel.name: Etriel

muirlega.flavor: It has brushes for ears. And human blood on its teeth.
muirlega.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
If you control Etriel, also damage adjacent units by 3.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
muirlega.name: Muirlega

vernossiel.flavor: It turns out that the forest isn't inhabited by, to quote the captain of the guard, some furry fucking thing, but Scoia'tael commandos. They were led by someone named Vernossiel…
vernossiel.info:
Deploy (Melee): Each allied Elven Deadeye damages a random enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes in this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
vernossiel.name: Vernossiel

feign death.flavor: In order to set a trap, you should usually hide. But… there are exceptions to this rule.
feign death.info:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play an elf.
Prologue: Spawn a Vernossiel's Commando in this row.
Chapter 1: Spawn 2 Elven Deadeyes in this row.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Waylay.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
feign death.name: Feign Death

vernossiel's commando.flavor: Only a swish could be heard... Followed by six men tumbling dead to the ground.
vernossiel's commando.info:
At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 if you control only Elf units.
Ignore the condition if you control Vernossiel.
vernossiel's commando.name: Vernossiel's Commando

vrihedd saboteur.flavor: The gates were ordered to be closed… But they didn't budge.
vrihedd saboteur.info: Deploy (Melee): Boost an Elf in your hand by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
vrihedd saboteur.name: Vrihedd Saboteur

nature's rebuke.flavor: Nature has long endured man's excesses. But even she finally ran out of patience…
nature's rebuke.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 5. 
Deathblow: Boost a random allied Treant by 2.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
nature's rebuke.name: Nature's Rebuke

trained hawk.flavor: I whistle once, it comes back. I whistle twice, it comes back with your eyes in its talons.
trained hawk.info:
Harmony.
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Move an enemy unit to their other row.
keywords: Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
trained hawk.name: Trained Hawk

collar.flavor: Those who fall into debt with the Moorlehems have two options: go into slavery or kill themselves. The smart ones choose option number two.
collar.info: Order: Lock an enemy unit and damage it by 3.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
collar.name: Collar

vincent van moorlehem.flavor: Everyone gives the Moorlehems a wide berth. Even tax collectors.
vincent van moorlehem.info: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with status.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vincent van moorlehem.name: Vincent Van Moorlehem

masquerade ball.flavor: Ophelie Van Moorlehem loves throwing huge galas. The fact that some attendees then disappear without a trace doesn't seem to bother anyone…
masquerade ball.info:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play an Aristocrat on your side of the battlefield.
Prologue: Spawn a Thirsty Dame in this row.
Chapter 1: Spawn and play Fangs of the Empire.
Chapter 2: Spawn and play Fangs of the Empire.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
masquerade ball.name: Masquerade Ball

philippe van moorlehem.flavor: It's said that Vincent Van Moorlehem fears only one man. It's not Emhyr var Emreis or Geralt of Rivia - it’s his own son.
philippe van moorlehem.info:
Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 1.
If target has status, damage it by 2 instead.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
philippe van moorlehem.name: Philippe Van Moorlehem

van moorlehem's cupbearer.flavor: My specialty? Tartar. Of what? Ah, that depends on the host's mood…
van moorlehem's cupbearer.info:
Assimilate.
Deploy (Melee): Poison a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Purify a unit.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
van moorlehem's cupbearer.name: Van Moorlehem's Cupbearer

van moorlehem hunter.flavor: Rather than beasts, he prefers to stalk poachers. But they don't come as often anymore into the woods surrounding the palace…
van moorlehem hunter.info:
Deploy (Melee) Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 2 turns.
Deploy (Ranged): Lock a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
van moorlehem hunter.name: Van Moorlehem Hunter

hunting pack.flavor: The hounds of the Van Moorlehems have an extraordinary sense of smell - and extremely sharp teeth.
hunting pack.info: Deploy: If enemy unit has status, Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
hunting pack.name: Hunting Pack

van moorlehem servant.flavor: They say she's served the Moorlehems for thirty years. And she hasn't aged a day…
van moorlehem servant.info: Deploy: Give an allied unit Vitality with duration equal to the number of enemy units with status.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
van moorlehem servant.name: Van Moorlehem Servant

thirsty dame.flavor: My teeth are red? Oh, that's from the wine…
thirsty dame.info: Whenever an enemy unit receives a status, boost self by 1.
thirsty dame.name: Thirsty Dame

tiger's eye.flavor: A diamond the size of a goose egg. And worth a small country.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
tiger's eye.name: Tiger's Eye

collusion.flavor: There's enough gold in this city for everyone. Well, at least for us.
collusion.info:
If you control a unit with the gang category:
Blindeyes - Increase all other effects by 1.
Crownsplitters - Boost an allied unit with the lowest power by 4.
Cutups - Damage an enemy unit with the highest power by 4.
Firesworn - Spawn 2 Firesworn Zealot in a random allied row.
Tidecloaks - Gain 4 Coins.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
collusion.name: Collusion

passiflora.flavor: More pilgrims come here than to the Temple of the Eternal Fire…
passiflora.info:
Doomed.
Scenario: Progress whenever you play a Blindeye.
Prologue: Spawn Passiflora Peaches in this row.
Chapter 1: Gain 6 Coins.
Chapter 2: Spawn Sly Seductress in this row.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
passiflora.name: Passiflora

saul de navarette.flavor: A connoisseur with bottomless pockets and a soul black as tar.
saul de navarette.info:
Hoard 3: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
Hoard 6: At the end of your turn, boost self by 2 instead.
Hoard 9: At the end of your turn, boost self by 3 instead.
keywords: Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
saul de navarette.name: Saul de Navarette

ludovicus brunenbaum.flavor: They say he'd sell his own mother. But no one was buying.
ludovicus brunenbaum.info:
After 3 turns, gain 9 Coins.
Tribute 5: Gain 9 Coins immediately.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
ludovicus brunenbaum.name: Ludovicus Brunenbaum

bloody good friends.flavor: I'll kill you as soon as we kill them!
bloody good friends.info:
Insanity.
Fee 1: Give an enemy unit Bleeding for 1 turn. If it's boosted, damage it by 1 instead.
keywords: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
bloody good friends.name: Bloody Good Friends

street urchins.flavor: When I was five, I stole candy. Now I'm six and I work in robbery.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
street urchins.name: Street Urchins

payroll specialist.flavor: Guards in Novigrad work for very little money, yet live like kings. Just another paradox of the Free City…
payroll specialist.info:
Intimidate.
Tribute 1: Move a unit to the other row.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
payroll specialist.name: Payroll Specialist

passiflora peaches.flavor: They'll mess with your head, break your heart and empty your purse.
passiflora peaches.info: Hoard 4: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keywords: Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
passiflora peaches.name: Passiflora Peaches

scarab.flavor: In Zerrikania, they’re considered a symbol of resurrection. But to be born again, first you have to die.
keywords: Defender: Status that prevents the opponent from targeting other cards in this row.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
scarab.name: Scarab

savolla's frightener.flavor: The witchers thought the Salamandra thugs wouldn't get through Kaer Morhen's walls. The witchers were wrong.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
savolla's frightener.name: Savolla's Frightener

greater brothers.flavor: A battering ram? No need, we'll handle it another way.
greater brothers.info:
Insanity.
Fee 2: Gain 2 Armor.
Exposed: Destroy self.
keywords: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
greater brothers.name: Greater Brothers

lamp djinn.flavor: I lived in a bottle once, but I prefer Ofiri lamps, they're much more comfortable.
lamp djinn.name: Lamp Djinn

rat.flavor: I call the tiny one Yersinia. She's cute, isn't she?
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
rat.name: Rat

crow.flavor: When among crows, you must caw like they do.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
crow.name: Crow

desert treasure.flavor: I definitely prefer digging up treasure to burying it.
desert treasure.info:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Spawn and play a random legendary unit from any faction.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
desert treasure.name: Desert Treasure

overwhelming hunger.info:
Order: Destroy an allied unit, then Spawn an Ekimmara in its row and boost it by the destroyed unit's power.
Charge: 2.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
overwhelming hunger.name: Overwhelming Hunger

imposter.info:
Order: Lock an enemy unit, then Spawn its base copy in the opposite row and boost it by the number of enemy units with a status on the Locked unit's row.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
imposter.name: Imposter

uprising.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charge: 3
Once all Charges are used up, Spawn and play Lyrian Scytheman.

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
uprising.name: Uprising

mahakam forge.info:
Order: Spawn and play Tempering.
All Dwarves in your starting deck get 1 Armor.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
mahakam forge.name: Mahakam Forge

blaze of glory.info:
Order: Move a Skellige unit from your deck to your graveyard, then damage an enemy unit by its power.

This ability adds 16 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
blaze of glory.name: Blaze of Glory

hidden cache.info:
Order: Gain 3 Coins.
At the beginning of the round, refresh this ability.
Your Hoards require 2 less Coins to trigger.

This ability adds 14 provisions to your deck's provision limit.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
hidden cache.name: Hidden Cache

master mirror.flavor: Some figures prefer to always remain hidden while playing the role of shadow in the most crucial events in history. One figure especially, to be precise.
master mirror.info:
Veil.
Deploy: Transform the leftmost card in your hand into a random legendary card from your faction that was not in your starting deck.
Repeat this ability whenever you play the rightmost card from your hand.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
master mirror.name: Master Mirror

ethereal.flavor: Her worst nightmare can easily be yours too.
ethereal.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Gain Zeal.
Order: Transform unit to the right into base copy of self.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
ethereal.name: Ethereal

oneiromancy.flavor: Deciphering the past and the future as they appear in dreams is very difficult, even for a master.
oneiromancy.info:
Echo.
Play any card from your deck.
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
oneiromancy.name: Oneiromancy

siegfried of denesle.flavor: We're on the same side, witcher. You'll realize this one day.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
siegfried of denesle.name: Siegfried of Denesle

allgod.flavor: Make your sacrifices or face divine anger! The food better be good or prepare to face my wrath nonetheless.
allgod.info: Deploy: Boost 3 units in your deck by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
allgod.name: Allgod

marlene de trastamara.flavor: None shall sit and dine with you at your table, no spoon you have shall sate you, never again shall you wish to spy your reflection in the mirror.
marlene de trastamara.info:
Veil.
Order: Give a unit Veil.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
marlene de trastamara.name: Marlene de Trastamara

pact.flavor: Your wishes he grants, as he swears to adore you – Gold, silver, jewels... he lays riches before you – Dues need be repaid, and he will come for you – All to reclaim, no smile to console you!
pact.info: Boost a unit by 6 and give it Doomed.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
pact.name: Pact

will o' the wisp.flavor: Fool's fires... those little shiny thingies that shall lead thee to certain doom.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
will o' the wisp.name: Will o' the wisp

squirrel.flavor: Just one badass squirrel. Nothing less, nothing more.
squirrel.info: Deploy: Banish a card from your opponent's graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
squirrel.name: Squirrel

offering.flavor: Both gods and demons alike can be appeased by a plentiful sacrifice.
offering.info:
Damage a unit by 1.
Deathblow: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
offering.name: Offering

fortune teller.flavor: Her prophecies have never been wrong – mainly because she always predicts something bad to happen.
fortune teller.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give Doomed to a unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Give Veil to a unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
fortune teller.name: Fortune Teller

auberon king.flavor: The end of one world can be the beginning of another.
auberon king.info:
Deploy: Spawn and play a random bronze Wild Hunt unit.
At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
auberon king.name: Auberon King

auberon invader.flavor: If they will not submit, they shall be driven out!
auberon invader.info:
Deploy: Create and play a bronze Wild Hunt unit.
Devotion: At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
auberon invader.name: Auberon Invader

auberon conqueror.flavor: After having lived over six hundred and fifty years, little remains to excite.
auberon conqueror.info:
Veil. Deploy: Create and play a bronze Wild Hunt unit.
Whenever you play a Wild Hunt unit, boost it by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
auberon conqueror.name: Auberon Conqueror

eredin br\u00e9acc glas.info:
Deploy: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns.
Dominance: Increase damage dealt by Frost by 1
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
eredin br\u00e9acc glas.name: Eredin Bréacc Glas

ard gaeth.flavor: Very useful for travels to other dimensions and bringing apocalypse upon the world.
ard gaeth.info:
Echo.
Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 3 turns.
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
ard gaeth.name: Ard Gaeth

winter queen.flavor: Truth is but a shard of ice.
winter queen.info:
Devotion: Thrive.
At the end of your turn, if there is Frost on both enemy rows, Summon this unit from your deck to the Ranged row.
keywords: Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
winter queen.name: Winter Queen

the apiarian phantom.flavor: Who's a good boy? Well, surely not him.
the apiarian phantom.info:
Veil. Zeal.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3.
At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, boost self by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
the apiarian phantom.name: The Apiarian Phantom

red riders.flavor: They paint the sky with snow and the earth with fire.
red riders.info:
Choose one:
Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 4 turns.
Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
red riders.name: Red Riders

wild hunt bruiser.flavor: He considers it an excellent joke - to split the skulls of the living with the skulls of the dead.
wild hunt bruiser.info: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row. If the target moves to a row affected by Frost, damage it by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
wild hunt bruiser.name: Wild Hunt Bruiser

naglfar's crew.flavor: Humans don’t know what powers the Naglfar. What is the source of its magic? For those that discover the truth... Well, it’s already too late for them.
naglfar's crew.info:
Deploy: Spawn Frost for 2 turns on an enemy row.
At the end of your turn, if there is Frost on the opposite row, boost self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
naglfar's crew.name: Naglfar's Crew

naglfar's taskmaster.flavor: She ensures the ship is sustained by squeezing the life essence from those insignificant human vermin.
naglfar's taskmaster.info:
Deploy: Purify an enemy unit.
Dominance: Purify a unit instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
naglfar's taskmaster.name: Naglfar's Taskmaster

aen elle conqueror.flavor: For his noble kind morality is but a whim enjoyed by others. More specifically, those who lose.
aen elle conqueror.info:
Veil.
Deploy: Destroy self.
Devotion: Cancel the Deploy ability.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
aen elle conqueror.name: Aen Elle Conqueror

harald an craite.flavor: His battle with the bear made him a different man, no doubt. But many argue if for the better.
harald an craite.info:
Deploy: Play a bronze Warrior from your graveyard, give it Doomed and damage self by 2.
At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
harald an craite.name: Harald an Craite

harald warmonger.flavor: The grit of constant suffering had festered in him an unstoppable thirst for inflicting the same pain onto others.
harald warmonger.info:
Deploy: Play a bronze Warrior from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
Devotion: At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
harald warmonger.name: Harald Warmonger

harald the cripple.flavor: He did not stop until the islands were his and the head of the old jarl lay on the ground before him.
harald the cripple.info:
Veil.
Deploy: Play a bronze Warrior from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
Whenever you play a Warrior, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
harald the cripple.name: Harald the Cripple

tyrggvi tuirseach.flavor: It’s not betrayal if you side with the winner.
tyrggvi tuirseach.info:
Veteran.
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Rupture.
keywords: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Rupture: At the end of owner's turn, damage this unit equal to its base power, then remove this status.
tyrggvi tuirseach.name: Tyrggvi Tuirseach

blood eagle.flavor: Fly like an eagle – Let my spirit carry me – I want to fly like an eagle.
blood eagle.info:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by 2 then play a Warrior from your deck with a provision cost of 7 or less.
Deathblow: Play a Warrior from your deck instead.
Bloodthirst 3: Always trigger the Deathblow ability.
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
blood eagle.name: Blood Eagle

skjordal drummond.flavor: He believed in honor, and that became his undoing.
skjordal drummond.info:
Devotion: Veteran.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by Skjordal's base power.
keywords: Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
skjordal drummond.name: Skjordal Drummond

herkja drummond.flavor: Faithful to her clan and its jarl, her father – to the very end.
herkja drummond.info:
Veil. Zeal.
Order (Melee): Split 3 damage randomly between enemy units on a row.
At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
herkja drummond.name: Herkja Drummond

war of clans.flavor: Brother against brother, sister against sister. One blood that soaks up the ground.
war of clans.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Play a 4 provision cost Warrior from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
Devotion: Always trigger the Deathblow ability.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
war of clans.name: War of Clans

tuirseach invader.flavor: Mother of four, ya sayeth? Well, then she shouldst been smarter than running 'round with an axe.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
tuirseach invader.name: Tuirseach Invader

an craite raiders.flavor: Cabbage, really? It’s just the worst when there’s nothing good to plunder.
an craite raiders.info:
Veteran.
Deploy, Bloodthirst 3: Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
keywords: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
an craite raiders.name: An Craite Raiders

drummond villager.flavor: The lovely jointress, mother of four, wondrous cook, and last but not least – a fierce warrior.
drummond villager.info: Deploy: Give Bleeding (4) to the unit to the right, then give Bleeding (4) to an enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
drummond villager.name: Drummond Villager

drummond berserker.info:
At the end of your turn, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1. 
Berserk 3: Transform into a Bear Abomination.
keywords: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
drummond berserker.name: Drummond Berserker

jacques miraculous child.flavor: As a child he loved two things: playing with his toy soldiers and a game called “Kill the Elf”.
jacques miraculous child.info:
Profit 4.
Tribute 4: Spawn 2 Firesworn Zealots in this row.
At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
jacques miraculous child.name: Jacques Miraculous Child

jacques de aldersberg.flavor: His visions both terrified Jacques and made him determined to become stronger.
jacques de aldersberg.info:
Profit 4.
Tribute 4: Spawn 2 Flaming Rose Footmen in this row.
Fee 1: Boost self by 1.
Devotion: At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
jacques de aldersberg.name: Jacques de Aldersberg

jacques grand master.flavor: The Grand Master did not hesitate to try anything that could save everything.
jacques grand master.info:
Veil. Profit 4.
Tribute 4: Spawn 2 Flaming Rose Footmen in this row.
Fee 1: Boost self by 1.
Whenever you play a Firesworn card, gain 1 Coin.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
jacques grand master.name: Jacques Grand Master

ulrich.flavor: When the Order was disbanded, those who didn't join the witch hunters formed the Fallen Knights, of which Ulrich became the Grand Master.
ulrich.info:
Intimidate. 
Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of a bronze Firesworn unit from your hand.
Devotion: Boost it by 2.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
ulrich.name: Ulrich

dies irae.flavor: The righteous wrath of the Eternal Fire! Justice of the Flaming Rose!
dies irae.info:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by 3 and boost all allied Firesworn units by 1.
Deathblow: Boost all allied units instead.
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
dies irae.name: Dies Irae

roderick de wett.flavor: Count de Wett is exceptionally loathsome and arrogant, but at least he enjoys a little dice poker on the side.
roderick de wett.info:
Veil. Zeal.
Order (Melee): Spawn a Flaming Rose Footman in this row.
At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, gain 1 Coin.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
roderick de wett.name: Roderick de Wett

lieutenant von herst.flavor: The fall of the Order wasn’t so hard for him like for the others. He is still required to count the goods and manage supplies, only now it has become even easier… Less strict at least.
lieutenant von herst.info:
Hoard 4: At the end of your turn, Spawn a Firesworn Zealot in this row.
Fee 1: Transform a Firesworn Zealot into a Flaming Rose Footman.
keywords: Hoard: Trigger this ability if you possess the specified number of Coins or more.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
lieutenant von herst.name: Lieutenant Von Herst

smuggle.flavor: Whoever said that the dead are good for nothing? They make for such great smuggle-bags.
smuggle.info:
Profit 3.
Spawn a Flaming Rose Footman in an allied row.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
smuggle.name: Smuggle

cleric of the flaming rose.flavor: We have two eyes, two ears, but only one tongue, so that we would look and listen twice more than we speak.
cleric of the flaming rose.info:
Profit 2.
Tribute 2: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot in this row.
Fee 1: Transform a Firesworn Zealot into a Flaming Rose Footman.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
cleric of the flaming rose.name: Cleric of the Flaming Rose

fallen knight.flavor: He abandoned the righteous fight and the flame in him has long gone.
fallen knight.info:
Veil. Intimidate.
Whenever you Spawn a unit on your side of the battlefield, boost self by 1 for each unit Spawned.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
fallen knight.name: Fallen Knight

lonely champion.flavor: So long as he continues the righteous fight, the Order and its flame endure.
lonely champion.info:
Immunity.
Deploy: Destroy all Firesworn Tokens in this row, then boost self by the sum of their power.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
lonely champion.name: Lonely Champion

mutants maker.flavor: I’m a scientist, truly. I can’t help it if the Oxenfurt professors were just too narrow-sighted to appreciate my particular research methods.
mutants maker.info:
Deploy: Destroy an allied unit, then gain 3 Coins.
Devotion: Gain 3 Coins instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
mutants maker.name: Mutants Maker

flaming rose footman.flavor: Anyone can join The Order – a knight, a peasant, even a witcher.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
flaming rose footman.name: Flaming Rose Footman

viraxas prince.flavor: Parents often envy their children's strength and vigor. And children rarely notice it.
viraxas prince.info:
Order: Reset an allied Northern Realms unit's Order ability.
At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
viraxas prince.name: Viraxas Prince

viraxas outcast.flavor: He was banished just for being what Belohun couldn’t be anymore: young, vital, and strong.
viraxas outcast.info:
Formation.
Order: Reset an allied Northern Realms unit's Order ability and give it Zeal.
Devotion: At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
viraxas outcast.name: Viraxas Outcast

viraxas king.flavor: Revenge is a dish that tastes best when served for two.
viraxas king.info:
Veil. Formation.
Order: Reset an allied Northern Realms unit's Order ability and give it Zeal.
Whenever you play a Soldier, boost it by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
viraxas king.name: Viraxas King

ildiko.flavor: The necklace was Ildiko’s gift to king Belohun in honor of their impending marriage. By choking the old fool, it solved that problem quite nicely.
ildiko.info:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 4.
Whenever you play a Northern Realms unit, give it Zeal.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
ildiko.name: Ildiko

amphibious assault.flavor: One ship here, one ship there, and the kingdom will be ours!
amphibious assault.info:
Echo.
Play a Northern Realms unit from your deck with a provision cost of 9 or less. Boost it by 1 for each provision below the limit.
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
amphibious assault.name: Amphibious Assault

king belohun.flavor: The king, quite rightly, didn’t trust anyone. He also didn’t believe anybody capable of outsmarting him. This proved a fatal assumption.
king belohun.info:
Whenever you play a unit with power less than 4, set its power to 4.
Devotion: Increase the power limit to 5.
keywords: Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
king belohun.name: King Belohun

egmund.flavor: Since father has never appreciated nor trusted Egmund, it was but a simple decision to betray him.
egmund.info:
Veil. Zeal.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3.
At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, boost the unit to the right by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
egmund.name: Egmund

smoke them out!.flavor: Fight fire with fire, fight people with fire, fight non-humans with fire... Basically it’s best to fight everything with fire!
smoke them out!.info:
Spawn 2 Volunteers on an allied row. 
If you control a boosted unit, also boost Spawned Volunteers by 1.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
smoke them out!.name: Smoke them out!

kerack frigate.flavor: “I should buy a boat”, said a Kerackian cat once. Or so claims the drunken ballad.
kerack frigate.info:
Order: Spawn a Volunteer in this row.
Crew: At the end of your turn, refresh this ability.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
kerack frigate.name: Kerack Frigate

kerack city guard.flavor: Geralt thought there were no ugly women, but in the guardhouse of Kerack he felt compelled to revise this view.
kerack city guard.info:
Veil.
Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row.
At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, boost self by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
kerack city guard.name: Kerack City Guard

kerack marine.flavor: I spy with my little eye something that is… green. Oh, shite! That’s a dryad!
kerack marine.info:
Zeal. Order: Boost an allied unit by 2.
Devotion: Boost an allied unit by 4 instead.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
kerack marine.name: Kerack Marine

kerack cutthroat.flavor: He massacred that poor dryad’s body to the point that even her own mother would no longer be able to recognize it.
kerack cutthroat.info:
Formation.
Order: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
kerack cutthroat.name: Kerack Cutthroat

volunteer.flavor: For joining the army you shall receive no greater reward than the glory of the battle itself. And gold. Gold is great too.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
volunteer.name: Volunteer

usurper officer.flavor: He was an ordinary soldier until his mind was open to the madness around him.
usurper officer.info:
Deploy: Spawn an Operative in an enemy row and give it Spying.
Zeal. Order: Seize all Spying Operatives.
At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
usurper officer.name: Usurper Officer

usurper general.flavor: The general had a great talent for transforming idiotic orders into brilliantly executed maneuvers.
usurper general.info:
Deploy: Spawn an Operative in each enemy row and give them Spying.
Zeal. Order: Seize all Spying Operatives.
Devotion: At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
