Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
usurper general.name: Usurper General

usurper emperor.flavor: There were but two options: wash the blood born of foolish orders or wash the blood of the fool himself. A simple decision really.
usurper emperor.info:
Veil.
Deploy: Spawn an Operative in each enemy row and give them Spying.
Zeal. Order: Seize all Spying Operatives.
Whenever you play an Agent, boost self by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
usurper emperor.name: Usurper Emperor

braathens.flavor: His name sounded so similar to “urchin” in Nilfgaardian that Braathens decided to turn him into one. Years later Emhyr paid the mage back in kind. Braathens sounds just like “fried” after all.
braathens.info:
Assimilate.
Deploy: Create and play a bronze Disloyal unit from your starting deck.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
braathens.name: Braathens

coup de grace.flavor: Sometimes death is but a simple act of mercy.
coup de grace.info:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by 3.
Deathblow: Spawn and play a base copy of it.
Conspiracy: Always trigger Deathblow ability.
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
coup de grace.name: Coup de Grace

fergus var emreis.flavor: Usurper demanded that the fallen emperor grant legitimacy to the coup, and when Fergus refused, his 13-year-old son, Emhyr, was tortured. But that changed nothing.
fergus var emreis.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Spying.
Devotion: Give 3 enemy units Spying instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
fergus var emreis.name: Fergus var Emreis

urcheon of erlenwald.flavor: This is how I look, which you well knew, Calanthe. King Roegner, in telling you of the oath, would not have omitted such a detail in his tale.
urcheon of erlenwald.info:
Veil. Zeal. 
Order (Melee): Transform self into Duny.
At the end of your turn, boost a random allied unit by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
urcheon of erlenwald.name: Urcheon of Erlenwald

duny.flavor: After the curse was lifted Duny claimed ignorance regarding its origin, or who was responsible. He was lying, of course.
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
duny.name: Duny

amnesty.flavor: You did what to who? To be fair, I can’t even recall the specifics anymore.
amnesty.info:
Seize an enemy unit with 3 power or less.
Conspiracy: Boost it by 2.
Devotion: Always trigger Conspiracy ability.
keywords: Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
amnesty.name: Amnesty

mage torturer.info:
Veil. Assimilate.
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Spying.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
mage torturer.name: Mage Torturer

seditious aristocrats.flavor: They love expensive wine, horse riding, and good old backstabbing.
seditious aristocrats.info:
Deploy: Boost self by 1 for every Spying enemy unit.
Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, boost self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
seditious aristocrats.name: Seditious Aristocrats

mage infiltrator.flavor: In her spare time, she likes playing practical jokes on others. Her favorite gag is switching footwraps and headwear.
mage infiltrator.info:
Disloyal.
Deploy: Damage adjacent units by 3.
Deathblow: Move self to the opposite row and remove Spying.
keywords: Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
mage infiltrator.name: Mage Infiltrator

angry mob.flavor: Wanna know their secret? They are always angry.
angry mob.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Conspiracy: Boost self by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
angry mob.name: Angry Mob

operative.flavor: The tricky part isn’t getting on the roof. It’s how to get down without killing yourself.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
operative.name: Operative

eithn\u00e9 young queen.flavor: She used to instruct her Dryads to warn people two or even three times before shooting with lethal intention. Used to anyhow.
eithn\u00e9 young queen.info:
Deploy: Spawn a Young Dryad in this row.
At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
eithn\u00e9 young queen.name: Eithné Young Queen

eithn\u00e9 mother.flavor: The queen wanted to protect that which was most important - Brokilon and its children. However, it’s sometimes impossible to save everyone.
eithn\u00e9 mother.info:
Deploy: Spawn 2 Young Dryads in this row.
Devotion: At the start of round, while in hand or deck, transform.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
eithn\u00e9 mother.name: Eithné Mother

eithn\u00e9: wrath of the brokilon.flavor: After the Battle of the Ribbon, Morénn's body was so massacred that even Silver-Eyed could not recognize her own daughter.
eithn\u00e9: wrath of the brokilon.info:
Veil. Symbiosis.
Deploy: Spawn 2 Young Dryads in this row.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant in a random allied row and set its power equal to the number of units with Symbiosis you control.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
eithn\u00e9: wrath of the brokilon.name: Eithné: Wrath of the Brokilon

forest protector.flavor: You know today is not your day when you go searching for firewood but the wood ends up seeing you as good fertilizer instead.
forest protector.info: Deploy: Play a bronze Nature card from your graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
forest protector.name: Forest Protector

shaping nature.flavor: You talk to me of kings and princes. Who are they? Those whom I know are white skeletons lying in the necropolises of Craag An, deep in the forest.
shaping nature.info:
Echo.
Choose one:
Boost an allied unit by 6 and give it Veil.
Boost an allied unit by 8.
Boost an allied unit by 5 and give it Vitality (5).
keywords: Echo: At the beginning of the round, move this card from the graveyard to the top of its owner's deck. Give it Doomed.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
shaping nature.name: Shaping Nature

freixenet.flavor: He was only meant to be a breeding stud to her. But in the end, they fell in love regardless.
freixenet.info:
Deploy (Melee): Boost a Dryad in your hand by 2.
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a Young Dryad in this row.
Devotion: Use both abilities.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
freixenet.name: Freixenet

dunca.flavor: She does no warning shot, always aims to kill. No mercy, even for the little ones.
dunca.info:
Veil. Zeal.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 3. 
At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, boost a random Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
dunca.name: Dunca

circle of life.flavor: Those who want to destroy Brokilon, who try to burn its trees and kill all the living things in it, will soon enough become nourishment for its soil.
circle of life.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 3, then boost a random Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 2.
Deathblow: Boost Scoia'tael unit in your hand instead.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
circle of life.name: Circle of Life

hamadryad.flavor: Hamadryads form a deep life-long bond with their tree – and its squirrels, of course.
hamadryad.info:
Symbiosis.
At the end of your turn, if this unit has Vitality, boost self by 1.
keywords: Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant in a random allied row and set its power equal to the number of units with Symbiosis you control.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
hamadryad.name: Hamadryad

du\u00e9n canell guardian.flavor: You have conquered the world, d'hoine, you are everywhere, everywhere you bring with you what you call progress. But we don't want you or your progress here.
du\u00e9n canell guardian.info:
Veil. Symbiosis.
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant in a random allied row and set its power equal to the number of units with Symbiosis you control.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
du\u00e9n canell guardian.name: Duén Canell Guardian

oakcritters.flavor: They especially like to chew on fingers, which to them are just like juicy carrots.
oakcritters.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3).
Deploy (Ranged): Spawn a base copy of self in this row.
Devotion: Use both abilities.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
oakcritters.name: Oakcritters

abandoned girl.flavor: People believe that sick girls will spread their illness among the dryads, but in reality, Brokilon protects its children. Abandoned ones, too.
abandoned girl.info: Order: Transform into a Young Dryad without changing power, and gain Vitality equal to the number of Dryads on this row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
abandoned girl.name: Abandoned Girl

young dryad.flavor: She can share her arrows with you, but not her apple.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Symbiosis: Whenever you play a Nature card, Spawn a Wandering Treant in a random allied row and set its power equal to the number of units with Symbiosis you control.
young dryad.name: Young Dryad

shaping nature: veil.flavor: You talk to me of kings and princes. Who are they? Those whom I know are white skeletons lying in the necropolises of Craag An, deep in the forest.
shaping nature: veil.info: Boost an allied unit by 6 and give it Veil.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
shaping nature: veil.name: Shaping Nature: Veil

shaping nature: boost.flavor: You talk to me of kings and princes. Who are they? Those whom I know are white skeletons lying in the necropolises of Craag An, deep in the forest.
shaping nature: boost.name: Shaping Nature: Boost

shaping nature: vitality.flavor: You talk to me of kings and princes. Who are they? Those whom I know are white skeletons lying in the necropolises of Craag An, deep in the forest.
shaping nature: vitality.info: Boost an allied unit by 5 and give it Vitality (5).
keywords: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
shaping nature: vitality.name: Shaping Nature: Vitality

red riders: precision.flavor: They paint the sky with snow and the earth with fire.
red riders: precision.info: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 4 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
red riders: precision.name: Red Riders: Precision

red riders: spread.flavor: They paint the sky with snow and the earth with fire.
red riders: spread.info: Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
red riders: spread.name: Red Riders: Spread

dana m\u00e9adbh.flavor: And thus she reveals herself, the Fairhaired Lady, adorned in flowers full. All life, both plant and beast, follows closely her step, clinging in earnest to her being.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Harmony: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit, whose primary category is unique among all of your units.
dana m\u00e9adbh.name: Dana Méadbh

woodland spirit.flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
woodland spirit.name: Woodland Spirit

morvran voorhis.flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.
morvran voorhis.info:
Doomed.
Deploy: Draw up to 3 cards, then put the same number of cards on top of your deck.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
morvran voorhis.name: Morvran Voorhis

alzur.flavor: A rebel… outcast... knight… even sorcerer if you can believe that.
alzur.info:
Whenever you play a Spell card, Spawn a random unit with the same provision cost on this row.
Counter: 3.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
alzur.name: Alzur

snowdrop.flavor: There’s more to life than song and dance, probably...
snowdrop.info:
Zeal.
Order: Draw up to 2 cards, then shuffle the same number of cards back to your deck.
Whenever you draw a card, boost self by 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
snowdrop.name: Snowdrop

cosimo malaspina.flavor: Children keep asking him for gifts. He doesn’t know why, but it really helps with finding subjects for his experiments.
cosimo malaspina.info: Deploy: Transform adjacent units into random units that cost 1 provision more.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cosimo malaspina.name: Cosimo Malaspina

idarran of ulivo.flavor: They say beauty is in the eye of the beholder, but no one wants to see what Idarran considers beautiful...
idarran of ulivo.info: The first time you Spawn a unit on your side of the battlefield each turn, Spawn a 1-power copy of it on this row, then give it Doomed.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
idarran of ulivo.name: Idarran of Ulivo

geralt: quen.flavor: Geralt, feeling the iron taste of blood in his mouth, shouted a spell, throwing his hand out in front of him with his fingers open in the Quen Sign.
geralt: quen.info:
Shield. 
Deploy: Play a Witcher card from your deck.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Give it Shield.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
geralt: quen.name: Geralt: Quen

selective mutation.flavor: We can destroy what we have created, but we cannot uncreate it.
selective mutation.info: Draw a card with Adrenaline of your choice, then shuffle back a card from your hand to your deck. Spawn a Witcher Student on each allied row.
keywords: Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
selective mutation.name: Selective mutation

triangle within a triangle.flavor: Adepts of magic often confuse it with a pentacle, which can lead to an infernal disaster.
triangle within a triangle.info: Boost an ally by its provision cost or damage an enemy by its provision cost.
triangle within a triangle.name: Triangle Within a Triangle

berengar.flavor: Talking the vodyanoi out of sacrificing the prize-winning cow wasn’t an easy task.
berengar.info: At the end of your turn, destroy this card if it's the only Witcher on this row.
berengar.name: Berengar

leo.flavor: He would have caught the arrow if he only had some heads-up.
leo.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for every Witcher you control.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
leo.name: Leo

maxii van dekkar.flavor: Magic doesn’t work on her, as she is a proud daughter of the Black Sun—and a bounty hunter that has her eyes on some very powerful sorcerers.
maxii van dekkar.info:
Deploy: Look at your deck in order from top to bottom.
You may shuffle your deck, then put a card on the bottom of it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
maxii van dekkar.name: Maxii Van Dekkar

witcher student.flavor: Four out of ten boys survive… at most.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
witcher student.name: Witcher Student

blue mutagen.info: Poison an allied unit and gain 5 Coins.
keywords: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
blue mutagen.name: Blue Mutagen

green mutagen.flavor: I’ve a green mutagen for you.
green mutagen.info: Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Veil.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
green mutagen.name: Green Mutagen

ivar evil-eye.flavor: There’s a terrible tale behind each and every scar⁠—you’d be surprised just how many are true.
ivar evil-eye.info:
Deploy: Swap this unit's power with an enemy unit.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
ivar evil-eye.name: Ivar Evil-Eye

vypper.flavor: Vicious, cunning. Known to wait patiently for hours before striking their prey. Once it uncoils to strike, there is no escape. Death is inevitable. ⁠— Ivar Evil-Eye
vypper.info:
At the end of the round, put this card in the opponent's graveyard. 
At the end of your turn, while in graveyard, Banish the lowest-cost card from it.
If Vypper is the only card in the graveyard, give it Doomed and Spying, then Summon it to your opponent's random row.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
vypper.name: Vypper

gorthur gvaed.flavor: There were many scrolls and manuscripts about the legend of the Wild Hunt in the stronghold—and for a good reason.
gorthur gvaed.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Viper Witcher Adept, Viper Witcher, Viper Witcher Mentor or Viper Witcher Alchemist.
Order: Move a card from your opponent's graveyard to the top of their deck.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
gorthur gvaed.name: Gorthur Gvaed

kolgrim.flavor: Fortune only smiled upon him if it was accompanied by a stroke of very bad luck.
kolgrim.info: Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: At the end of your turn, boost self by the difference between the number of cards in players' decks.
keywords: Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
kolgrim.name: Kolgrim

warritt the all-seeing.flavor: By slightly modifying the Supirre sign, Warritt gained the ability to see... everything.
warritt the all-seeing.info:
Deploy (Melee): Put the highest cost card in your opponent's deck on the top of it.
Deploy (Ranged): Put the lowest cost card in your opponent's deck on the top of it.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
warritt the all-seeing.name: Warritt The All-Seeing

viper witcher.flavor: Viper Witchers are trained to fight with twin blades, often referred to as “fangs”. This style focuses on fast and furious strikes aimed to overwhelm their target, be it monster or man.
viper witcher.info:
Deploy: Give Bleeding (2) to an enemy unit.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: If it's not a Token, Spawn a base copy of that unit at the top of opponent's deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
viper witcher.name: Viper Witcher

viper witcher mentor.flavor: Viper mentors are especially cold and ruthless in order to prepare their students for the harsh life that awaits them.
viper witcher mentor.info:
Deploy: Set the power of this card to match the provision cost of the top card in your opponent's deck.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Set the power of this card to match the provision cost of the highest-cost card in your opponent's deck instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
viper witcher mentor.name: Viper Witcher Mentor

viper witcher alchemist.flavor: What doesn’t kill you makes you stronger. Or weaker. It depends, really.
viper witcher alchemist.info: Deploy (Melee): Reveal a random unit from your opponent's deck and boost self by its power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
viper witcher alchemist.name: Viper Witcher Alchemist

viper witcher adept.flavor: Each student is given a pet to raise during their stay at Gorthur Gvaed, in order to form a strong emotional bond throughout their training. Years later, before becoming a fully-fledged witcher, they are ordered to slaughter their companion in cold blood.
viper witcher adept.info: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 if your opponent has more cards in the deck than you.
viper witcher adept.name: Viper Witcher Adept

coated weapons.flavor: No need to strike deep when but a scratch will prove fatal.
coated weapons.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 5.
Deathblow: If it wasn't a Token, Banish it and Spawn a base copy of it on top of opponent's deck.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
coated weapons.name: Coated Weapons

gezras of leyda.flavor: “Take a contract from Aen Seidhe over a dh'oine any day, as you’re far less likely to receive a knife between the ribs in place of coin.” ⁠— Gezras
gezras of leyda.info:
Melee: At the end of your turn, move self to the Ranged row and boost a random allied unit on this row by 1.
Ranged: At the end of your turn, move self to the Melee row and damage a random enemy unit on the opposite row by 1.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Instead of a random unit, affect all other units in a row.
keywords: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
gezras of leyda.name: Gezras of Leyda

saber-tooth tiger.flavor: The prized possession of a royal menagerie, until a commando of Scoia'tael assaulted the exhibition, released the beast, and set it upon its cruel masters. Since that day, it has acquired a selective taste for human flesh.
saber-tooth tiger.info: Zeal. Order: Transform self into Saber-Tooth Tiger: Stealth.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
saber-tooth tiger.name: Saber-Tooth Tiger

stygga castle.flavor: The Feline witchers did not stay in Stygga Castle for long. Nor anywhere else, actually.
stygga castle.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Cat Witcher Adept, Cat Witcher, Cat Witcher Mentor or Cat Witcher Saboteur.
Order: Move 3 allied units to the other row.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
stygga castle.name: Stygga Castle

brehen.flavor: Known as the Cat of Iello. A moniker earned not from origins, but as a result of slaughtering peasants there. More of a massacre, really.
brehen.info:
Deploy: Destroy the rightmost unit on an enemy row with at least 5 units.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Destroy the rightmost unit on an enemy row with at least 3 units instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
brehen.name: Brehen

gaetan.flavor: “Murder me just to save few crowns? I’m supposed to protect whoresons like that?” ⁠— Gaetan
gaetan.info:
Deploy: Move the other cards from this row to the other row.
Damage a random enemy unit for each card moved by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
gaetan.name: Gaetan

cat witcher.flavor: Members of the School of the Cat are ill-famed due to their penchant for frenzy and bloodlust in the heat of battle. Even when their enemies capitulate, beg for mercy... Cats never stop killing.
cat witcher.info:
At the end of your turn, move self to the other row and damage a random enemy unit on the opposite row by 1.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Damage it by 2 instead.
keywords: Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
cat witcher.name: Cat Witcher

cat witcher mentor.flavor: If you fall, it’s over. Your nine lives are up, kid.
cat witcher mentor.info:
Deploy: Boost self by the number of the other cards on this row. 
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Whenever a card appears in this row, boost self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
cat witcher mentor.name: Cat Witcher Mentor

cat witcher saboteur.flavor: “Needless to say, the ill fame of their deeds hangs like a dark cloud over our reputation to this day.” ⁠— Vesemir
cat witcher saboteur.info: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the left-most position on its row and damage it by 1. Increase the damage by 1 for every card it passed.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
cat witcher saboteur.name: Cat Witcher Saboteur

cat witcher adept.flavor: Cat students hone their balance by walking a tightrope blindfolded. Failure is easy to shrug off at first, but throughout their training, the walk gets higher⁠—and more perilous⁠—as they work toward their final Trial, where failure is not so forgiving.
cat witcher adept.info:
Deploy (Melee): Give an enemy unit Bleeding with duration equal to the number of units on that unit's row.
Deploy (Ranged): Give an allied unit Vitality with duration equal to the number of units on that unit's row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
cat witcher adept.name: Cat Witcher Adept

making a bomb.flavor: You’ll probably want to follow the instructions…
making a bomb.info: Move an enemy unit to the other row, give it Bleeding (4). If it's the only unit on that row, damage it by 4 instead.
keywords: Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
making a bomb.name: Making a Bomb

arnaghad.flavor: “A witcher’s job is to kill monsters and collect coin. No more, no less.” ⁠— Arnaghad
arnaghad.info:
Deploy: Gain 1 Armor for every damaged unit.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: When your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage that unit by Arnaghad's power and damage Arnaghad by that unit's power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
arnaghad.name: Arnaghad

dire bear.flavor: After countless attempts to slay the savage beast, one could now easily consider it… a mobile armory.
dire bear.info:
Units in this and opposite row can't be boosted.
Berserk 7: Affects only the opposite row.
keywords: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
dire bear.name: Dire Bear

haern caduch.flavor: Carved into the icy rock of the Amell Mountains, hidden amid jagged crags and snowdrifts, the location of the long-abandoned School of the Bear remains a well-kept secret.
haern caduch.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Bear Witcher Adept, Bear Witcher, Bear Witcher Mentor or Bear Witcher Quartermaster.
Order: Heal adjacent units by 2.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
haern caduch.name: Haern Caduch

gerd.flavor: He was contracted to slay a dragon, a siren, and a striga. He was also being pursued by a vengeful knight, bounty hunters, and bandits. Despite all this, he still found time for a round of Gwent.
gerd.info:
Deploy: Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row and damage all units on that row by 1.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row and damage it by 1 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
gerd.name: Gerd

junod of belhaven.flavor: Rumour has it he was born of an unusual love between a lady giant and one VERY brave dwarf.
junod of belhaven.info: Deploy: Destroy a damaged enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
junod of belhaven.name: Junod of Belhaven

bear witcher.flavor: Life alone on the road can be tough⁠—be sure to bring all the bare necessities.
bear witcher.info:
Deploy: Damage self by 3.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Damage self and an enemy unit by 3 instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
bear witcher.name: Bear Witcher

bear witcher mentor.flavor: If you’re unsure of the way, just keep a lookout for markers⁠—the frozen corpses of would-be witchers.
bear witcher mentor.info:
Deploy: Boost self by 1 for every damaged allied unit.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Boost self by 1 for every damaged unit instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
bear witcher mentor.name: Bear Witcher Mentor

bear witcher quartermaster.flavor: Supply him with enough Mahakam mead, and he might just tell you a tale of how a bear took his shield and arm too!
bear witcher quartermaster.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage an allied unit by 1, then Spawn a Witcher Student on this row.
Charges: 2.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
bear witcher quartermaster.name: Bear Witcher Quartermaster

bear witcher adept.flavor: To become a Bear Witcher, all students must pass the Trial of the Mountain. This requires venturing to the peak of Mount Gorgon to retrieve a special runestone as proof of ascent—an especially brutal challenge, as many boys freeze to death long before they find the summit.
bear witcher adept.info:
Deploy: Damage self by 4.
At the end of your turn, Heal self by 1. While not damaged, gain 1 Armor instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
bear witcher adept.name: Bear Witcher Adept

armor up.flavor: Why try to sidestep the blow, when you can easily bear the brunt?
armor up.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Spawn 3 Witcher Students on the opposite row, damage them by 1, then give them 1 Armor.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
armor up.name: Armor Up

erland of larvik.flavor: Erland founded the School of the Griffin, and hoped his emphasis on knightly values would help elevate the reputation of witchers among the common folk. Alas, his efforts would go in vain.
erland of larvik.info:
Deploy: Boost all units in your deck by 1.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Also gain Immunity.
Order: Remove boosts from all units in your deck, then boost this unit by the same amount.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
erland of larvik.name: Erland of Larvik

archgriffin.flavor: Considered the embodiment of courage, loyalty and fighting spirit, the very essence of what Griffin Witchers are known for. However, the School of the Griffin was actually named after a knight errant known as Gryphon, who had long ago instilled these values into its founder.
archgriffin.info: At the end of the round, shuffle this card back to your deck, keeping its boosts.
archgriffin.name: Archgriffin

kaer seren.flavor: Kaer Seren’s literary collection was its greatest treasure and the envy of a group of overzealous mages. In their attempt to seize it for themselves, they destroyed the very thing they desired most.
kaer seren.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Griffin Witcher Adept, Griffin Witcher, Griffin Witcher Mentor or Griffin Witcher Ranger.
Order: Boost a unit in your deck by 3.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
kaer seren.name: Kaer Seren

co\u00ebn.flavor: “There is no such thing as a fair fight. Every advantage and every opportunity that arises is used in combat.” ⁠— Coën
co\u00ebn.info: Zeal. Order: Boost all other units with power equal to Coën's power by the amount Coën is boosted.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
co\u00ebn.name: Coën

keldar.flavor: “You blunt, brainless humanoids! What do you mean by ‘I don't know?’. You would go hunt the vampires with the Lebioda idol, smeared in garlic!” ⁠— Keldar
keldar.info:
Resupply: Spawn a Witcher Student on this row.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: At the end of your turn, Spawn a Witcher Student on this row.
keywords: Resupply: Trigger this ability whenever you play a Warfare card.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
keldar.name: Keldar

griffin witcher.flavor: Silver swords are great, yeah. But have you ever tried silver-plated arrowheads?
griffin witcher.info:
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit by 3 and Lock self.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
griffin witcher.name: Griffin Witcher

griffin witcher mentor.flavor: Knowledge will keep you alive far longer than might, dear boy.
griffin witcher mentor.info:
Deploy: Draw your top unit, then shuffle a card from your hand back to your deck.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Boost the unit you've drawn by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
griffin witcher mentor.name: Griffin Witcher Mentor

griffin witcher ranger.flavor: Griffin Witcher Rangers are unparalleled masters in the art of tracking and hunting, even amid the most inhospitable of environments. No matter the trail, they won’t rest until their prey is captured, or killed.
griffin witcher ranger.info:
Formation.
Deploy: Boost self by 1 for every unit on an enemy row.
Order: Transfer all boosts from self to an allied unit.
keywords: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
griffin witcher ranger.name: Griffin Witcher Ranger

griffin witcher adept.flavor: At Kaer Seren, students are afforded the luxury of choice when it comes to their final Trial. They either locate and retrieve a griffin’s egg, or recite the entirety of Liber Tenebrarum verbatim. To Old Keldar’s dismay, no one has ever chosen the latter.
griffin witcher adept.info:
Shield.
Order: Transform an allied Witcher into a base copy of Griffin Witcher Adept.
keywords: Shield: Status that blocks the next instance of damage dealt to a unit.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
griffin witcher adept.name: Griffin Witcher Adept

target practice.flavor: Most Griffins can split an apple in two from a hundred paces. Just make sure you don’t move.
target practice.info: Boost an allied unit by 4. If there is a Witcher on the boosted unit's row, also Spawn a Witcher Student on that row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
target practice.name: Target Practice

viy.flavor: What has a million legs and can eat a city whole?
viy.info: Deathwish: Shuffle Viy back to your deck then increase its base power by 3.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
viy.name: Viy

koshchey.flavor: If I tell you koshchey is death, you'll go to the creek anyway, right?
koshchey.info:
Thrive.
Whenever this unit's Thrive is triggered, Spawn a Drone in this row.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Whenever this unit's Thrive is triggered, Spawn an Endrega Larva in this row instead.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
koshchey.name: Koshchey

dol dhu lokke.flavor: A monster lair unlike any other. Home to countless horrors and monstrosities. Even a witcher would think twice about setting foot near this hellhole.
dol dhu lokke.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Succubus, Phooca, Chimera or Hybrid.
Order: Move the highest power unit to the top of your deck and Spawn a Drone on both sides of this card.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
dol dhu lokke.name: Dol Dhu Lokke

idr.info:
Order (Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}): Consume all Tokens on this row and gain Immunity.
Whenever you Consume one or more units, Spawn a Drone in this row.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
idr.name: Idr

wererat.flavor: As a child, Idarran lived in the canals of Vizima. He was a natural-born genius, and at the age of five, he had already started experimenting on sewer rats.
wererat.info:
Order: Reset this unit's power and Spawn a number of Rats in this row equal to the amount of boost it lost.
Cooldown: 1.
At the end of your turn, Consume a unit to the right.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
wererat.name: Wererat

succubus.info:
Deathwish: At the end of your turn, if there is another Succubus in your graveyard, Summon self from your graveyard to a random row and gain Doomed.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Don't gain Doomed.
keywords: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
succubus.name: Succubus

phooca.flavor: Particularly troublesome are the larger, stronger breed—a rare kind of nekker known as phoocas. If you see one, run.
keywords: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power.
phooca.name: Phooca

chimera.flavor: At first, Cosimo combined genes of a fiend and a griffin. Then he added some traces of insectoid and wyvern to the pool, resulting in a creature far worse than the sum of its parts.
chimera.info:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Boost all copies of Consumed unit in that unit's row by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
chimera.name: Chimera

spontaneous evolution.flavor: Professor Malaspina accidentally added an extra ingredient to the concoction—compound X.
spontaneous evolution.info:
Boost an allied unit by 4 and gain an additional effect based on the unit's category.

Insectoid - Spawn 3 Drones on the boosted unit's row.
Beast -  Boost that unit by 8 instead.
Ogroid - Give all Ogroids in your hand 2 Armor.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
spontaneous evolution.name: Spontaneous Evolution

fallen rayla.flavor: Slain by the arrows of those she had hunted. Or so many thought. The Salamandra had different plans for her.
fallen rayla.info:
Profit 3.
Tribute 3: Gain Veil.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Whenever you pay a Tribute ability, boost self by that Tribute's cost.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
fallen rayla.name: Fallen Rayla

salamander.flavor: Despite their cute little faces, it's best to avoid petting them, as the salamander, when threatened, secretes a deadly toxin that boils the very skin it comes into contact with.
salamander.info:
Profit 1.
Deploy: Poison a unit. 
Tribute 9: Poison all units on the battlefield instead.
Increase the Profit by 1 for every allied Salamandra unit.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
salamander.name: Salamander

salamandra hideout.flavor: Those who go lurking in the sewers beneath Vizima better watch out, as there are things far worse than rats hidden amid the darkness of the city’s underbelly.
salamandra hideout.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Failed Experiment, Salamandra Abomination, Salamandra Mage or Salamandra Lackey.
Order: Move Poison from an ally to another unit.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
salamandra hideout.name: Salamandra Hideout

roland bleinheim.flavor: “How's my brother doing in the sewers, I wonder...” ⁠— Roland
roland bleinheim.info: Whenever a unit gains Poison, gain 2 Coins.
keywords: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
roland bleinheim.name: Roland Bleinheim

gellert bleinheim.flavor: “How's my brother doing in the woods, I wonder...” ⁠— Gellert
gellert bleinheim.info:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Poison an allied unit and boost it by 2.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Cooldown: 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
gellert bleinheim.name: Gellert Bleinheim

salamandra lackey.flavor: Lackeys are expected to perform their first five jobs for no pay, demonstrating their passion for the gig.
salamandra lackey.info: The first time you gain a Coin each turn, boost self by 1.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
salamandra lackey.name: Salamandra Lackey

salamandra abomination.flavor: Salamandra’s scientists were so preoccupied with whether they could, they never once considered if they should.
salamandra abomination.info:
Tribute 1: Poison self.
Whenever this unit is Poisoned, boost self by 2.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: At the end of your turn, Purify self.
keywords: Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
Purify: Remove all statuses.
salamandra abomination.name: Salamandra Abomination

salamandra mage.flavor: Building a fire warms people for a day, but setting them on fire…
salamandra mage.info:
Tribute 4: Damage 3 adjacent enemy units by 2.
Whenever you pay a Tribute ability, gain 1 Coins.
Adrenaline {Adrenaline-1}: Gain 2 Coins instead.
keywords: Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Adrenaline: Trigger this ability if you have specified number or fewer cards in your hand. Cards with Adrenaline are highlighted when their effect is stronger.
salamandra mage.name: Salamandra Mage

failed experiment.flavor: Even failed experiments can serve a purpose. How else would one be expected to push the boundaries of knowledge?
failed experiment.info:
At the end of your turn, lose 1 Coin. If you have no Coins, damage self by 1 instead.
While Poisoned, disable this ability.
keywords: Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.
failed experiment.name: Failed Experiment

stolen mutagens.flavor: Like organ harvesting—but far more lucrative.
stolen mutagens.info:
Pick a mutagen:

Red -  Damage an enemy unit by 4.
Blue -  Poison an allied unit and gain 5 Coins.
Green - Boost an allied unit by 4 and give it Veil.

If you control at least 2 Salamandra units, Profit 3.
keywords: Poison: Status - if a unit receives two instances of Poison, destroy it.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
stolen mutagens.name: Stolen Mutagens

hybrid.flavor: When one head just isn’t enough.
hybrid.info: Whenever you Consume one or more units, boost self by 1.
keywords: Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
hybrid.name: Hybrid

saber-tooth tiger: stealth.flavor: The prized possession of a royal menagerie, until a commando of Scoia'tael assaulted the exhibition, released the beast, and set it upon its cruel masters. Since that day, it has acquired a selective taste for human flesh.
saber-tooth tiger: stealth.info: At the start of your turn, damage all enemy units that are alone on their row by 2 and transform self into Saber-Tooth Tiger.
saber-tooth tiger: stealth.name: Saber-Tooth Tiger: Stealth

madoc.flavor: In a flash, Madoc pulled out a leathery orb with a fuse, ignited it with a snap of his fingers, and tossed it at the feet of the caterwauling behemoth.
madoc.info:
Whenever you play a Bomb card, Summon this card from your deck or graveyard to random allied row.
Order: Spawn Cataclysm for 1 turn on the opposite row, then destroy self.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Cataclysm: At the start of the owner's turn, split 3 damage randomly between units in this row.
madoc.name: Madoc

anna henrietta.flavor: As head of state, I must judge her fairly. But she is my sister, thus my heart bleeds for her…
anna henrietta.info: Deploy (Ranged): Replace your leader ability with a base copy of your opponent's leader ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
anna henrietta.name: Anna Henrietta

emhyr var emreis.flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.
emhyr var emreis.info:
Zeal.
Deploy: Draw a card, then move a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
Whenever your opponent plays a unit, give it Spying.
Order: Seize a 1-power enemy unit with Spying.
Devotion: At the end of your turn, refresh this card's Order.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
emhyr var emreis.name: Emhyr var Emreis

crach an craite.flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!
crach an craite.info:
Deploy: Give 2 Armor to 3 Pirates or Ships in your hand.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2
Whenever you play a Pirate or Ship next to Crach, damage it and the lowest power enemy unit by each others power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
crach an craite.name: Crach an Craite

eist tuirseach.flavor: Eist came to Cintra to help Crach an Craite win the hand of Princess Pavetta, yet wound up winning her mother's heart for himself.
eist tuirseach.info:
Veteran.
Deploy, Bloodthirst 3: Draw a card, then Discard a card.
Whenever you Discard a Skellige unit during your turn, Summon it from your graveyard to this row.
Counter: 2.
Devotion: Also works whenever a Skellige unit enters your graveyard during your turn.
keywords: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
eist tuirseach.name: Eist Tuirseach

brouver hoog.flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!
brouver hoog.info:
Deploy: Gain 1 Armor for every Dwarf in your hand.
Barricade: At the end of your turn, boost all Dwarves with Armor on this row by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
Barricade: Trigger this ability if the unit has armor.
brouver hoog.name: Brouver Hoog

eldain.flavor: The king once dispatched an envoy to Eldain… despite my advice to the contrary. Found the envoy the next day, eyes gouged out, shaft of his white flag jammed down his throat.
eldain.info:
Deploy: Transform all your face-up Traps into Elven Deadeyes.
Devotion: Also transform your other artifacts.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
eldain.name: Eldain

king foltest.flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.
king foltest.info:
The first time a bronze unit on your side of the battlefield is boosted each turn, Spawn a base copy of it at the bottom of your deck.
Devotion: Also boost the Spawned copy by 1.
At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
king foltest.name: King Foltest

queen meve.flavor: We're at war, when rulers don't strive nor choose. When rulers grasp sword and shield and ride out to defend their subjects.
queen meve.info:
Inspired: At the end of your turn, lower the Counter by 1.
Counter: 3
When the Counter reaches 0, boost all allied units by 1 and reset the Counter.
Whenever this unit receives a boost, gain 1 Armor.
keywords: Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
queen meve.name: Queen Meve

dettlaff van der eretein.flavor: He did not love like a man, but like an animal. Madly, deeply, unconditionally. Wildly.
dettlaff van der eretein.info:
Deploy: Spawn Blood Moon on an enemy row for 2 turns. Increase the duration by 1 for every adjacent Vampire.
Order: Damage an enemy unit with Bleeding by 1.
Deathblow: Spawn an Ekimmara on this row.
Cooldown: 1
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Blood Moon: At the start of the owner's turn, give a random unit in this row Bleeding (2). If the unit is already Bleeding, damage it by 2 instead.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
dettlaff van der eretein.name: Dettlaff van der Eretein

unseen elder.flavor: No one, not even among the higher vampires, knows exactly how old the Unseen Elder is. They only know they should never, under any circumstances, defy his will.
unseen elder.info:
Deploy: Give Bleeding (4) to an enemy unit.
At the end of your turn, give Bleeding (2) to a random enemy unit without Bleeding.
Devotion: Bleeding on enemy units also triggers at the end of your turn.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
unseen elder.name: Unseen Elder

cleaver.flavor: Me hogs willnae go hungry th' day thanks to ye.
cleaver.info:
Intimidate.
Deploy: Spawn and play Shakedown.
Increase this card's Intimidate by 1 for every adjacent Crownsplitter.
Fee 4: Spawn a Cleaver's Muscle on this row.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
cleaver.name: Cleaver

whoreson junior.flavor: A war with Whoreson will see Novigrad's gutters run red with blood.
whoreson junior.info:
Insanity.
Deploy: Damage a boosted enemy unit by 6. Gain a Coin for every point of excess damage dealt.
Devotion: Damage an enemy unit instead.
Fee 3: Destroy an enemy unit with 3 power or less.
keywords: Insanity: If you have insufficient Coins, damage this unit by its Fee amount, ignoring its Armor, to trigger its Fee ability.\nNote: Insanity cannot be used if it would destroy the unit and works only if damage is inflicted.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
whoreson junior.name: Whoreson Junior

rience.flavor: “I, Rience, taught her pain. With these hands, with these fingers. And I promised her that should you fall into my hands, princess, I would also teach you pain. With these hands, with these fingers…” - Rience
rience.info:
Deploy: Look at the top 3 units in your deck. Move 1 to your graveyard, then destroy an enemy unit with power equal to that unit's power
Order: Set the power of a unit to match the number of cards in your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
rience.name: Rience

dead man's tongue.flavor: They say the dead tell no tales. Truth is, they speak no lies.
dead man's tongue.info:
Banish a card from your deck. If it was a bronze, Banish another bronze card from your deck.
Boost an allied unit by the combined provision cost of Banished cards.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
dead man's tongue.name: Dead Man's Tongue

blightmaker.flavor: In an attempt to manufacture a superior grapevine, the empire’s botanists stumbled upon the creation of a malignant alchemical, and thus was sown the seed of a scheme most sinister.
blightmaker.info:
Deploy: Move a card in your deck to the top of it. If it was a Mage, Spawn The Guardian in this row.
If it was a special card, Spawn and play a Cow Carcass.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
blightmaker.name: Blightmaker

mage assassin.flavor: Somewhere deep within Nilfgaard’s imperial archives is a manuscript titled “Forty-Seven Ways to Kill a Man”. It’s a surprisingly jovial read.
mage assassin.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
If moved to the top of your deck during your turn, Summon self to a random allied row and damage a random enemy unit by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
mage assassin.name: Mage Assassin

fulmar.flavor: “Praise the Goddess for all the paths that she opens before you, and turn your greedy gaze away from those She closes in her wisdom” - Fulmar
fulmar.info:
Deploy: Spawn and play Tears of Siren.
Order: Replace Rain on an enemy row with Storm of the same duration.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
fulmar.name: Fulmar

bride of the sea.flavor: Chosen from among the descendants of Rioghan the Undying. A man whose deeds have cast a dark shadow over his kin for decades.
bride of the sea.info: Deploy: Play an Alchemy from your graveyard with provision cost 4 or less. Increase the cost by the total duration of Rain and Storm on your opponent's side.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
bride of the sea.name: Bride of the Sea

melusine cultist.flavor: But we can still eat fish, can't we?
melusine cultist.info:
Order: Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row.
At the end of your turn, if there is Rain on the opposite row, boost the unit to the right by 1. If there is Storm on the opposite row, boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
melusine cultist.name: Melusine Cultist

tears of siren.flavor: It is said they only cry for love lost. A pity they only love once in a lifetime…
tears of siren.info: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on the opposite row.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
tears of siren.name: Tears of Siren

francesca findabair.flavor: Francesca Findabair's blue elven eyes were as impenetrable and hard as glass. When he was introduced to her, the Daisy of the Valleys smiled. The smile, though incredibly beautiful, filled the witcher with terror.
francesca findabair.info:
Veil.
Whenever you play a Special card, remove one Counter.
Counter: 3.
When Counter reaches 0, Spawn and play a copy of the last Special card you played. If it is Neutral, give it Doomed.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
francesca findabair.name: Francesca Findabair

vanad\u00e1in.flavor: It’s better to first gag humans, then listen to what they have to say.
vanad\u00e1in.info:
Deploy: Move up to 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck. Add Waylay to your hand for each card moved that way.
Whenever you play Waylay, Spawn an Elven Deadeye on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
vanad\u00e1in.name: Vanadáin

sorceress of dol blathanna.flavor: Whilst you are mesmerized by the fishes, a different elf moves to cut your throat.
sorceress of dol blathanna.info: Order: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this card's power.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
sorceress of dol blathanna.name: Sorceress of Dol Blathanna

whisperer of dol blathanna.flavor: You won't find more fertile land than in the Valley of Flowers, and with a little magic you can count on a ripe harvest up to three times a year.
whisperer of dol blathanna.info:
Veil.
When you play a special card, Spawn a base copy of self on this row and remove a Counter.
Counter: 1.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
whisperer of dol blathanna.name: Whisperer of Dol Blathanna

gerhart of aelle.flavor: Gerhart of Aelle, otherwise known as Hen Gedymdeith, was the oldest living sorcerer. That is, until his death on Thanedd Island during the coup, where his heart, feeble from inconceivable age, simply gave out among the ruckus.
gerhart of aelle.info:
Zeal. Patience.
Order: Create and play a [4] provision Spell.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
gerhart of aelle.name: Gerhart of Aelle

istredd.flavor: Love can make one do crazy things. The loss of love, even more so.
istredd.info:
Zeal. Patience.
Order: Draw up to [1] card(s), then shuffle the same number of cards back to your deck.
Whenever you draw a unit card, boost it by 1, if it's not a unit, boost self by 1 instead.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
istredd.name: Istredd

casting contest.flavor: Tales of Yennefer of Vengerberg have spurred many an inebriated attempt to replicate her fabled foot-casting. It never ends well.
casting contest.info: Boost an allied unit by 5. If it's bronze, reset its Order ability and give it Zeal.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
casting contest.name: Casting Contest

ban ard student.flavor: Kaedweni Intelligence considers Ban Ard a hot spot for recruitment, and expelled students⁠—of which there are many⁠—often find themselves swiftly enlisted within the secret service.
ban ard student.info:
Patience.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by [0].
keywords: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
ban ard student.name: Ban Ard Student

she who knows.flavor: She knows well what kind of clay her daughters are made of. After all, she kneaded it herself.
she who knows.info: Sabbath: At the end of round, give Resilience to the highest base power unit on your side of the battlefield.
keywords: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
she who knows.name: She Who Knows

rat catcheress.flavor: The witch grabbed the bells and started to play a lively melody that attracted small rodents and children alike.
rat catcheress.info:
Whenever this unit is damaged, reduce its base power by 1.
Sabbath: Cancel the ability above.
Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
keywords: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
rat catcheress.name: Rat Catcheress

gan ceann.flavor: A head in the hands is worth two on the neck.
gan ceann.info: Deploy: Increase this unit's base power by 2 for each adjacent Relict.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
gan ceann.name: Gan Ceann

witch apprentice.flavor: Mistress said I would have to toss it on the spit after I finish my studies, but she was just kidding. Right...?
witch apprentice.info: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 2.
keywords: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
witch apprentice.name: Witch Apprentice

the witchfinder.flavor: Woe to all those who find themselves on the wrong side of Octavia Hale, the self-proclaimed world-renowned finder⁠—and punisher⁠—of witches, warlocks, and were-things.
the witchfinder.info:
Deploy: Spawn 3 Syndicate Crowns.
At the end of your turn, if no enemy unit has a Bounty, place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
the witchfinder.name: The Witchfinder

syndicate crown.info:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Gain 1 Coin and Banish self.
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
syndicate crown.name: Syndicate Crown

fabian hale.flavor: Fabian takes great pride in his work, with each “victory” etched upon his skin as a permanent reminder of memories most pleasant.
fabian hale.info:
Intimidate.
Deploy: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit. If there already was an enemy unit with a Bounty, gain Coins equal to its base power.
keywords: Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
