Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
fabian hale.name: Fabian Hale

hysteria.flavor: Somebody’s poisoned the waterhole! With innards!
hysteria.info: Place a Bounty on an enemy unit and damage it by 3. If it already has a Bounty, double the damage.
keywords: Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
hysteria.name: Hysteria

vigilantes.flavor: The alderman’s wife worked all night on these here costumes⁠—you should be damned grateful, you swines!
vigilantes.info: Whenever a Bounty is placed on an enemy unit, damage it by 2.
keywords: Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
vigilantes.name: Vigilantes

teleportation.flavor: There was a flash and he stopped seeing, hearing or feeling anything⁠—apart from cold. Cold was the only thing felt inside the black nothingness, amid silence, amorphousness and timelessness, because the teleport dulled and extinguished all other senses.
teleportation.info: Reset an allied unit's power. If it's a bronze unit, replay it instead.
teleportation.name: Teleportation

megascope.flavor: In order to communicate at a distance, one must construct a magical artefact⁠—a megascope⁠—using magic.
megascope.info: Deploy: Pick a bronze allied unit. After 2 turns, Spawn its base copy on the right of Megascope.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
megascope.name: Megascope

left fucking flank.flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
left fucking flank.name: Left Fucking Flank

right fucking flank.flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?
keywords: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
right fucking flank.name: Right Fucking Flank

artaud terranova.info:
Assimilate.
Deploy: Spawn and play a base copy of any non-Disloyal unit you gave Spying to during this game, excluding self.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Disloyal: This card is played on the opposite side of the battlefield, then gains Spying.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
artaud terranova.name: Artaud Terranova

sunset wanderers.flavor: It seemed like Dandelion meant to journey with the witcher, even to the edge of the world.
sunset wanderers.info:
This card starts in the leftmost position of your hand.
At the beginning of your turn, while in hand, move self one position to the right then boost self by 1.
At the end of your turn, if you haven't passed and there are no cards to the right of this card, Summon self from your hand to a random allied row, then draw a card.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
sunset wanderers.name: Sunset Wanderers

fercart.flavor: Pawns will never know of the unseen hands, maneuvering them toward certain doom.
fercart.info:
Deploy: Play a special card from your hand, then draw a card.
Whenever you play a special card, give Spying to a random non-Spying enemy unit.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
fercart.name: Fercart

master of puppets.info:
Order: Seize a bronze enemy unit, then move self to the opposite row.
Cooldown: 2
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Seize: Move an enemy unit to the opposite row and give it Spying. If it already had Spying, remove Spying instead.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
master of puppets.name: Master of Puppets

thanedd turncoat.flavor: Hell hath no fury like a sorceress scorned.
thanedd turncoat.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Spying.
Order, Conspiracy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Whenever an enemy unit gains Spying, reduce this unit's Cooldown by 1.
Cooldown: 2
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spying: Status with no additional effect. Can be used by other cards and abilities.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Conspiracy: Trigger this ability if target unit has Spying status.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
thanedd turncoat.name: Thanedd Turncoat

melusine.flavor: The Lady sits on her throne, devouring our offerings and demanding more. Yet, She does not try to rule over us in any particular way, so She is actually better than any jarl.
melusine.info:
Veil.
Order: Spawn Rain on an enemy row for 2 turns then damage self by 2.
At the end of your turn damage adjacent units by 1, then gain 1 base power for every unit damaged. If any unit damaged was a Cultist, refresh Melusine's Order.
keywords: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
melusine.name: Melusine

offering to the sea.flavor: Cultists proclaim that the maidens are offered to the sea, not eaten by its monsters. Yet, for the latter, the semantics makes no difference.
offering to the sea.info: Damage all units on the battlefield by 1, then Spawn a Deafening Siren on a random allied row and boost it by the number of allied targets.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
offering to the sea.name: Offering to the Sea

havfrue singer.flavor: No human can match sirens in singing. Some, however, are talented enough to compel sirens to listen.
havfrue singer.info:
Deploy: Heal an allied unit by 2.
The first time you Heal an allied unit during your turn, Spawn a Deafening Siren on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
havfrue singer.name: Havfrue Singer

hermit.flavor: Oh, good Lady, bless your faithful servant with a fat flounder.
hermit.info:
Deploy: Damage self by 4.
Berserk 6: At the end of your turn, damage the unit to the right by 1 then Heal self by 2.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
hermit.name: Hermit

simlas finn aep dabairr.flavor: I am a Sage. Naturally I know more than you do.
simlas finn aep dabairr.info: Deploy: Play all copies of a bronze special card from your deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
simlas finn aep dabairr.name: Simlas Finn aep Dabairr

saov ainmhi'dh.flavor: Expecto pa⁠— No, wait. That’s not right.
saov ainmhi'dh.info: Boost an allied unit by 5. When this card enters your graveyard, transform self into Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity.
saov ainmhi'dh.name: Saov Ainmhi'dh

orb of insight.flavor: It shows only one of many possible futures.
orb of insight.info:
Boost an allied unit by 2 and give it Vitality (2).
While in your graveyard, remove the Counter by 1 whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, play this card and give it Doomed.
Counter: 3
keywords: Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
orb of insight.name: Orb of Insight

elven seer.flavor: I predict a bad future for your race, dh’oine.
elven seer.info:
When you target this unit with a bronze special card, Spawn and play a copy of that special card.
Counter: 1.
keywords: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
elven seer.name: Elven Seer

tissaia de vries.flavor: “They will not enter here. No one invited those royalist lackeys, who carry out the orders of their short-sighted kings!” - Tissaia de Vries
tissaia de vries.info: Deploy: At the end of this turn, reset the Order of all allied Mages that used their Order during this turn.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
tissaia de vries.name: Tissaia de Vries

leticia charbonneau.flavor: “You cannot control what the world throws at you, but you can decide on how to react.” - Leticia Charbonneau
leticia charbonneau.info:
Patience.
Order (Ranged): At the end of this turn, the Patience value of allied units is increased by [1] instead.
keywords: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
leticia charbonneau.name: Leticia Charbonneau

practice makes perfect.flavor: A lesson a day keeps mediocrity away.
practice makes perfect.info:
Shuffle an allied bronze mage to your deck, then play a random bronze mage from your deck. Boost the unit you played by 0.
Increase the boost by 1 for each unit with Patience you played this game.
keywords: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
practice makes perfect.name: Practice Makes Perfect

aretuza student.flavor: Knowledge beyond measure is a sorceress’s greatest treasure.
aretuza student.info:
Patience.
Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by [0].
keywords: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
aretuza student.name: Aretuza Student

bloody mistress.flavor: Once the effigy is on a tree, even the most virtuous of souls will find themselves inexplicably drawn toward her domain.
bloody mistress.info: Sabbath: At the end of your turn, Spawn Gernichora's Fruit on both sides of this unit and transform self into Gernichora without changing power.
keywords: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
bloody mistress.name: Bloody Mistress

gernichora.flavor: Once the effigy is on a tree, even the most virtuous of souls will find themselves inexplicably drawn toward her domain.
gernichora.info:
At the end of your turn, transform self into Bloody Mistress without changing power.
Sabbath: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1 for each allied Gernichora's Fruit instead.
keywords: Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
gernichora.name: Gernichora

mammuna.info:
Zeal.
Order: Banish a bronze unit from your graveyard and boost self by its power, then Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row.
Sabbath: Play the copy instead.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
mammuna.name: Mammuna

selfeater.info:
Order: Halve this unit's base power, then Spawn a copy with the same base power on this row.
Whenever you play a Relict, increase this unit's base power by 1.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
selfeater.name: Selfeater

bleeding effigy.flavor: A drop of blood, a hair from the head, a fragment of a nail…
bleeding effigy.info:
Banish a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard, then boost an allied unit by its power.
If you control Bloody Mistress or Gernichora, you may target gold units.
keywords: Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.
bleeding effigy.name: Bleeding Effigy

the scoundrel.flavor: There have been sightings of a slender, sinister-looking man slipping in and out of shadow⁠. The Hales must be in town.
the scoundrel.info:
Deploy: Summon the top bronze unit from your opponent's deck to the opposite row, then place a Bounty on it.
Tribute 2: Choose a bronze unit to Summon instead, then place a Bounty on it.
Fee 1: Damage the enemy unit with Bounty by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
the scoundrel.name: The Scoundrel

ignatius hale.info:
Deploy: Damage this unit by its Tribute cost.
Tribute {Tribute-B.P.BB_Bounty}: Cancel the Deploy ability.
Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, reduce this unit's Tribute cost by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
ignatius hale.name: Ignatius Hale

confession extractor.flavor: Whether they spit lies or cry truths, it matters not⁠—the Extractor always gets its confession.
confession extractor.info:
Profit 5.
While in your graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 1 whenever you place a Bounty on it.
Counter: 3
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
confession extractor.name: Confession Extractor

scapegoat.flavor: Fact often gives way to fiction.
scapegoat.info:
Deploy: If there is no Bounty on the battlefield, damage self by 3.
Whenever an enemy unit with Bounty is damaged, Heal self by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
scapegoat.name: Scapegoat

bearification.info: Transform an artifact into an Elder Bear. If it's on your side of the battlefield, boost it by 4.
bearification.name: Bearification

dwimveandra.flavor: There are those who stay at home and those who leave.
dwimveandra.info:
Deploy (Melee): Set an allied Scenario to the final chapter.
Deploy (Ranged): Refresh the Order of an allied Location.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
dwimveandra.name: Dwimveandra

saov ainmhi'dh: unity.flavor: Expecto pa⁠— No, wait. That’s not right.
saov ainmhi'dh: unity.info:
While in your graveyard, remove a Counter whenever you play a special card. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from your graveyard to your Ranged row.
Counter: 3
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
saov ainmhi'dh: unity.name: Saov Ainmhi'dh: Unity

vilgefortz: renegade.flavor: Four times, Geralt struck. To the temple, to the neck, under the arm, to the thigh. Each blow should have been fatal. Yet each was parried by the mage.
vilgefortz: renegade.info: Deploy: Swap a card from your opponent's graveyard with a card in your hand.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
vilgefortz: renegade.name: Vilgefortz: Renegade

lydia van bredevoort.flavor: Whether by brush or by sorcery, there was no event, emotion, or scene beyond Lydia's power to depict. Apart from joy.
lydia van bredevoort.info:
Deploy (Melee): Create and play a bronze special card from your opponent's faction.
Deploy (Ranged): Play a bronze special card from your opponent's graveyard.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
lydia van bredevoort.name: Lydia van Bredevoort

imperial practitioner.flavor: The body is a slab of wet clay. One need only use the correct tools to shape it into something... more.
imperial practitioner.info:
Assimilate.
Order: Spawn a base copy of the last card that went to your opponent's graveyard on top of your deck.
keywords: Assimilate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a card that is not from your starting deck.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
imperial practitioner.name: Imperial Practitioner

illusionist.flavor: “When you are few, make them believe you are many. If they still attack, well... you were fucked either way.” ⁠- Unnamed Nilfgaardian strategist
illusionist.info:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard on the right of this card and set its power to 1.
Bonded: Don't set its power to 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
illusionist.name: Illusionist

fucusya.flavor: Like mermaids, the sea witches can experience true love only once in a lifetime. And Fucusya wasted her only time on a human.
fucusya.info: Deploy: Play a Skellige unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 10 or less and give it Doomed, then Spawn Rain on the opposite row with a duration equal to unused provisions.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
fucusya.name: Fucusya

rioghan the undying.flavor: “Your life will burn as bright as the love between us.” - Fucusya
rioghan the undying.info:
This card starts in your graveyard. 
When played or Summoned from the graveyard, trigger all remaining Rain and Storm on the opponent's side of the battlefield.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
rioghan the undying.name: Rioghan the Undying

messenger of the sea.info: Whenever Rain or Storm damages enemy units, boost self by the damage dealt.
keywords: Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
Storm: At the start of the owner's turn, damage all units on this row by 1.
messenger of the sea.name: Messenger of the Sea

little havfrue.flavor: They will not hesitate to shower you with gifts and affection. They will proudly profess their unwavering adoration and unyielding devotion. Yet, I ask you, when has a man ever given up his legs for love? Hmm?
little havfrue.info:
Deploy (Bonded): Increase this card's base power by 2.
Order: Damage self by 4 and Spawn Rain for 2 turns on an enemy row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Rain: At the start of the owner's turn, damage 2 random units in this row by 1.
little havfrue.name: Little Havfrue

filavandrel a\u00e9n fidh\u00e1il.flavor: He has pride⁠—the pride of someone who has never had to bow.
filavandrel a\u00e9n fidh\u00e1il.info:
Deploy (Melee): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to this unit's power.
Deploy (Ranged): Create and play a Scoia'tael special card with a provision cost equal to or lower than this unit's power.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
filavandrel a\u00e9n fidh\u00e1il.name: Filavandrel aén Fidháil

torque.flavor: Where an elf cannot go himself, he sends a devil.
torque.info:
Whenever this card is boosted in your hand, boost a random different unit in your hand by the same amount.
Devotion: This card always starts in your hand.
keywords: Devotion: Trigger this ability if your starting deck has no neutral cards.
torque.name: Torque

bountiful harvest.flavor: Never have we tilled nor torn up the land, unlike you dh'oine with your hoes and ploughs. You wrest bloody tributes from the Queen of the Fields, while we celebrate her every gift.
bountiful harvest.info: Create and play a bronze Scoia'tael Elf, then, depending on the position of chosen unit, boost the left-most, random, or the right-most unit in your hand by 2.
keywords: Create: Spawn one of three randomly selected cards from the specified source.
bountiful harvest.name: Bountiful Harvest

watcher of the valley.flavor: He notched his staff for every interloper who thought to try their luck. Soon, the notches, much like the intruders, could no longer be distinguished.
watcher of the valley.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding equal to the amount of boost on this card.
Bonded: Damage it instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
watcher of the valley.name: Watcher of the Valley

chapter of wizards.flavor: In the wake of the Novigradian Union, the Chapter of the Gift and the Art sought to ensure all magic was adequately regulated. Yet, some mages refused to be restrained by the fetters of absolute authority, choosing instead to practice their craft away from prying eyes. Deemed 'enemies of the institution', these renegades were promptly hunted down and punished.
chapter of wizards.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play Runeword.
Order: Spawn a base copy of the last played allied bronze Mage on this row.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
chapter of wizards.name: Chapter of Wizards

raffard\u2019s vengeance.flavor: Step 1. Lock the long arm lever to the hook trigger, and place the load into the sling harness.\nStep 2. Set the counterweight to no less than eighty times the load, and line the glide track with pyrite.\nStep 3. Conjure and align the portal to target location, and unleash hell.
raffard\u2019s vengeance.info:
Order: Play a bronze unit from your hand, then draw a card.
Cooldown: 5
Crew: Whenever you play a unit next to this card, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
Mages contribute to this card's Crew ability.
keywords: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
raffard\u2019s vengeance.name: Raffard’s Vengeance

alumni.flavor: Deep down, they had both been waiting for this moment for a long time. Live targets had been a bit of a taboo in academia.
alumni.info:
Deploy: If both values are equal to or higher than 4, gain Zeal.
Order (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by {Damage+B.P.BB_MaxPatienceBanArd}.
Order (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by {Boost+B.P.BB_MaxPatienceAretuza}.
Values correspond to the highest Patience achieved by your Ban Ard Student or Aretuza Student cards.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
alumni.name: Alumni

meditating mage.flavor: To become one with air, think away the ground.
meditating mage.info:
Patience.
Order: Gain Vitality for [0] turns.
Bonded: Also gain Resilience.
keywords: Patience: At the end of your turn, if Order is not used, permanently increase the card's specified value by 1.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
meditating mage.name: Meditating Mage

yaga.flavor: The Witch Queen sat upon her throne of bones, gorging herself on all and sucking the life out of everything that came her way. For centuries, she feasted, until one day, she could no longer stand at all. And so, she ate some more.
yaga.info:
Deploy (Sabbath): Gain Zeal.
Order: Consume a 4 provision unit, then increase the provision value by 1.
Cooldown: 2
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Sabbath: Trigger this ability if at least one of your rows has a total of 25 or more points.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
yaga.name: Yaga

witches' sabbath.flavor: For the sabbath, at least three witches are required. With two, it’s only a quarrel.
witches' sabbath.info: Summon up to 3 highest-power units from your opponent's graveyard to an enemy row, then Summon as many highest-power Monster units from your graveyard to the opposite row and give them Doomed.
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
witches' sabbath.name: Witches' Sabbath

incubus.info: Deploy: Summon a bronze unit from your opponent's graveyard to the opposite row, then Summon a bronze unit of equal or less provisions from your graveyard to this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
incubus.name: Incubus

lesser witch.flavor: Less powerful, but no less terrible.
lesser witch.info:
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self in your graveyard.
Bonded: Spawn a base copy of self on this row instead.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
lesser witch.name: Lesser Witch

the brute.flavor: He’s a slayer of all things wicked, a saviour of the common folk, and a very good boy. At least, that’s what his mum tells him.
the brute.info:
Profit {B.P.BB_Bounty+profit}.
Deploy: Boost self by {B.P.BB_LastBountyClaimed+boost}.
Boost is equal to the base power of the last destroyed enemy unit with a Bounty.
Whenever you place a Bounty on an enemy unit, increase this unit's Profit by 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
the brute.name: The Brute

octavia hale.flavor: A mother is more than just the sum of her children.
octavia hale.info: Deploy: Draw up to 2 of Octavia's sons to your hand, then shuffle back the same number of cards.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
octavia hale.name: Octavia Hale

purge.flavor: Thought you could outrun justice, did you, you heathen swine?
purge.info:
Damage an enemy unit by 3. Increase the damage by 1 for every Witch Hunter on your side of the battlefield.
Deathblow: Place a Bounty on the highest-power enemy unit.
keywords: Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Bounty: When a unit with this status is destroyed or banished, opponent gains coins equal to its base power. There can be only one unit with Bounty status on each side of the board at given time.
purge.name: Purge

savvy huckster.flavor: Good sir, half a crown per stone!? That’s a crime! I’ll take twenty.
savvy huckster.info:
Profit 1.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1.
Bonded: Increase Profit and damage by 1.
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
savvy huckster.name: Savvy Huckster

the mushy truffle.flavor: Some drink to celebrate. Others, to forget. But here? Here we don't need no reason.
the mushy truffle.info:
Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn and play a Bonded unit from your starting deck.
Order: Spawn and play Golden Froth.
keywords: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Bonded: Trigger this ability if you control a copy of this card.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
the mushy truffle.name: The Mushy Truffle

alissa henson.flavor: You either die a hero, or live long enough to be exposed as a villain.
alissa henson.info: Deploy: Shuffle a special card from your graveyard to your deck. If it was a bronze also shuffle one additional copy of that special.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
alissa henson.name: Alissa Henson

saskia: commander.flavor: We won't be fighting mere minions, but their King! And the King himself will have to recognize our victory! Could a soldier dream of better than defeating a monarch?
saskia: commander.info:
Immunity.
Deploy: If you have at least 10 different primary categories in your starting deck, Summon a random bronze Scoia'tael unit with a primary category that is not on your side of the battlefield from your deck to this row.
At the end of your turn, lower the Counter by 1. When the Counter reaches 0, reset it and repeat the Deploy ability.
Counter: 3
keywords: Immunity: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
saskia: commander.name: Saskia: Commander

king radovid v.flavor: “They say it’s the game of kings. That chess teaches one to think strategically. What a load of rubbish! Both sides have identical pieces, the rules stay invariably the same. How does that mirror real life?”
king radovid v.info:
Deploy: If the base version of your leader ability has more than 1 Charge, give it an additional Charge.
Order: Repeat the Deploy ability.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
king radovid v.name: King Radovid V

jan calveit.flavor: “To prepare for the future, it’s best to first know it.”
jan calveit.info:
Deploy: Sort the cards in your deck from the highest to the lowest provision cost.
At the start of the game, move self up by one position in the deck for each Tactic in your starting deck.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
jan calveit.name: Jan Calveit

arachas queen.info:
Deploy: Consume an allied unit. If it's an Insectoid, Spawn and play Arachas Nest.
Deathwish: Spawn a base copy of the Consumed unit on this row.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
arachas queen.name: Arachas Queen

ardal aep dahy.flavor: “In my home, in the civilized world, a general commands his forces. He does not rush and thrash about like some rabid hound.”
ardal aep dahy.info: Deploy (Ranged): If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, move a non-Doomed enemy unit with power up to the number of Tactics in your starting deck (0) to your opponent's hand, then draw a card.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game when it leaves the battlefield.
ardal aep dahy.name: Ardal aep Dahy

king bran.flavor: He lived life on his own terms—died on them, too.
king bran.info:
Veteran.
Deploy: Boost self by {B.P.BB_ExcessDamage+Boost}. Increase the value by 1 whenever excess damage is dealt to enemy units.
At the start of the game, trigger the Veteran ability of your units.
keywords: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
king bran.name: King Bran

cerys: fearless.flavor: “If you want something done, send your best man. If you want something done right, send a woman.”
cerys: fearless.info:
After you've dealt damage to allied units 9 times, Summon self from your deck to your Ranged row.
Zeal. Order: Fully Heal an allied unit and damage another allied unit by the amount Healed.
Cooldown: 1
keywords: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
cerys: fearless.name: Cerys: Fearless

milva: sharpshooter.flavor: Rarely did Milva hunt beasts larger than red deer or armor-clad men.
milva: sharpshooter.info:
Zeal. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Shuffle self back to your deck.
Whenever you move an enemy unit, Summon self from your deck to the opposite row, then damage it by 1.
keywords: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
Deathblow: Trigger this ability if this card destroys a unit.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
milva: sharpshooter.name: Milva: Sharpshooter

king henselt.flavor: Fuck with the unicorn and you get the horn.
king henselt.info:
Deploy: Play a Crew unit from your deck.
Whenever an adjacent unit's Cooldown decreases, boost self by the same amount.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
king henselt.name: King Henselt

regis: reborn.flavor: “You surround your dead with veneration, you dream of immortality, and in your myths and legends someone is always being resurrected—conquering death itself. But were your revered late great-grandfather to spring from his grave and order a beer, hysteria would surely ensue.”
regis: reborn.info:
Deploy: Drain an enemy unit by 3.
At the end of your turn, while in hand or deck, if there is an enemy unit with Bleeding, increase own base power by 1.
keywords: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Drain: Damage ignoring the target's armor, then boost self by the damage dealt.
Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
regis: reborn.name: Regis: Reborn

king of beggars.flavor: You say tribute, I say taxes. ⁠— Francis Bedlam
king of beggars.info:
Fee 1: Boost self by 1.
While in deck, whenever you pay a Tribute, remove a Counter for each Coin paid. For each removed Counter, gain 1 Coin back.
When the Counter reaches 0, Summon self from the deck to a random allied row.
Counter: 9
keywords: Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.

Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
king of beggars.name: King of Beggars

cyrus engelkind hemmelfart.flavor: Behind the Hierarch's pious pageant, his luxurious silks and exotic wines, his whores and slaves, beneath all that lust, greed, and vanity, stands an honorable man.
cyrus engelkind hemmelfart.info:
Profit 4.
Deploy: Spawn and play Congregation.
Fee 2: Destroy an allied Firesworn Token, then Summon a bronze Firesworn unit from your graveyard to the same position.
Cooldown: 1
keywords: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins.
Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
Spawn: Add a card to the game.
Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
cyrus engelkind hemmelfart.name: Cyrus Engelkind Hemmelfart
